title: SOFA.org Overview
body: SOFA.org Overview What is SOFA.org? SOFA.org is a decentralized, non-profit organization focused on advancing the DeFi ecosystem. Our modus operandi is to promote the highest DeFi standards, support high-quality projects, and promote adoption of blockchain technologies across mainstream finance. SOFA.org will operate as a DAO concentrating on three key areas in DeFi üìö Education & Tech Advancement: Innovate and share knowledge across participants. üî¨ Research & Innovation: Develop new DeFi solutions with tangible value-add. üõ° Industry Standards: Establish best practices for protocol safety and capital efficiency. üó≥ $SOFA Governance Token $SOFA is the governance token that allows holders to participate in the decision-making process for the SOFA.org ecosystem. Holders of $SOFA have voting rights on key proposals, helping to shape the future of our burgeoning ecosystem. This token encourages community ownerhsip and ensures that the community has a direct say in the platform‚Äôs development and management. SOFA.org has amassed an all-star cast of founding members and project partners to jump-start our protocol and TVL growth right from the get-go. DAO Members and Supporting Members as of Early May 2024 What is SOFA.org building? SOFA.org will build and support protocol projects that will bolster DeFi's growth as an integral infrastructure of conventional finance. The inaugural project will focus on providing a transparent, scalable, and decentralized clearing solution handling crypto structured products on-chain. Users will be able to purchase a variety of structured products from a limitless number of market makers on our open dAPP to earn attractive yields, with executed transactions automatically settled via our standardized vaults to remove all counterparty risks. Furthermore, platform users are directly rewarded through the native utility token $RCH, a fixed supply deflationary token which can only be earned via protocol usage. Finally, to ensure incentive-alignment, all protocol earnings will be recycled to burn $RCH tokens daily, decreasing total float and accruing all profits to our user-token holders over the long-run. ü§ë $RCH Utility Token $RCH is the core utility token within the SOFA ecosystem. It is designed to reward users for transacting within the ecosystem and participating in its growth. $RCH has a total supply of 37 million tokens, with 25 million (~67%) pre-minted and locked in a Uniswap liquidity pool. The remaining 12mm (33%) are earmarked to be airdropped to protocol users and supporters. The long-term deflationary design ensures that the token value appreciates hand-in-hand with rising transaction volumes. üöÄ EARN WITH US $SOFA tokens can be earned through contributions to the community and participation in governance activities. Users can also burn $RCH to get $SOFA. Remember, users earn $RCH through daily airdrops based on their transaction volume, allowing active users to earn substantial airdrops, on top of the potential yield they receive from purchasing structured products.** üó£ Broker Referral Program (dApp) We recognize that there is strength in numbers, so we have designed a broker referral reward mechanism aimed at enabling the accessibility and infrastructure of the SOFA ecosystem. Participating brokers who build and enable end-user access to the underlying SOFA protocols, such as through the development of supporting dAPPs, will be entitled to receive 5% of the end user's airdrop rewards, paid directly from the protocol. Come join the SOFA.org Community today! Twitter | Discord | Telegram | Medium | Contact us

title: Pr√©sentation de SOFA.org
body: Aper√ßu de SOFA.org Qu'est-ce que SOFA.org ? SOFA.org est une organisation d√©centralis√©e √† but non lucratif ax√©e sur l'avancement de l'√©cosyst√®me DeFi. Notre modus operandi est de promouvoir les normes DeFi les plus √©lev√©es, de soutenir des projets de haute qualit√© et de favoriser l'adoption des technologies blockchain dans la finance traditionnelle. SOFA.org fonctionnera comme une DAO se concentrant sur trois domaines cl√©s dans DeFi üìö √âducation et Avancement Technologique : Innover et partager des connaissances entre les participants. üî¨ Recherche et Innovation : D√©velopper de nouvelles solutions DeFi avec une valeur ajout√©e tangible. üõ° Normes de l'Industrie : √âtablir des meilleures pratiques pour la s√©curit√© des protocoles et l'efficacit√© du capital. üó≥ Jeton de Gouvernance $SOFA $SOFA est le jeton de gouvernance qui permet aux d√©tenteurs de participer au processus d√©cisionnel de l'√©cosyst√®me SOFA.org. Les d√©tenteurs de $SOFA ont des droits de vote sur des propositions cl√©s, contribuant √† fa√ßonner l'avenir de notre √©cosyst√®me en pleine expansion. Ce jeton encourage la propri√©t√© communautaire et garantit que la communaut√© a un mot √† dire direct dans le d√©veloppement et la gestion de la plateforme. SOFA.org a rassembl√© une √©quipe de membres fondateurs et de partenaires de projet de premier plan pour donner un coup d'envoi √† notre protocole et √† la croissance de la TVL d√®s le d√©part. Membres de la DAO et Membres de Soutien depuis d√©but mai 2024 Que construit SOFA.org ? SOFA.org va construire et soutenir des projets de protocole qui renforceront la croissance de la DeFi en tant qu'infrastructure int√©grale de la finance conventionnelle. Le projet inaugural se concentrera sur la fourniture d'une solution de compensation transparente, √©volutive et d√©centralis√©e pour g√©rer des produits structur√©s en crypto sur la cha√Æne. Les utilisateurs pourront acheter une vari√©t√© de produits structur√©s aupr√®s d'un nombre illimit√© de teneurs de march√© sur notre dAPP ouverte pour gagner des rendements attractifs, avec des transactions ex√©cut√©es automatiquement r√©gl√©es via nos coffres normalis√©s pour √©liminer tous les risques de contrepartie. De plus, les utilisateurs de la plateforme sont directement r√©compens√©s par le jeton utilitaire natif $RCH, un jeton d√©flationniste √† offre fixe qui ne peut √™tre gagn√© que par l'utilisation du protocole. Enfin, pour garantir l'alignement des incitations, tous les b√©n√©fices du protocole seront recycl√©s pour br√ªler des jetons $RCH quotidiennement, r√©duisant ainsi l'offre totale et accumulant tous les profits pour nos d√©tenteurs de jetons-utilisateurs √† long terme. ü§ë Jeton Utilitaire $RCH $RCH est le jeton utilitaire principal au sein de l'√©cosyst√®me SOFA. Il est con√ßu pour r√©compenser les utilisateurs pour leurs transactions au sein de l'√©cosyst√®me et leur participation √† sa croissance. $RCH a une offre totale de 37 millions de jetons, dont 25 millions (~67%) pr√©-min√©s et verrouill√©s dans une pool de liquidit√©s Uniswap. Les 12 millions restants (33%) sont destin√©s √† √™tre distribu√©s par airdrop aux utilisateurs et supporters du protocole. Le design d√©flationniste √† long terme garantit que la valeur du jeton s'appr√©cie en m√™me temps que les volumes de transactions augmentent. üöÄ GAGNEZ AVEC NOUS Les jetons $SOFA peuvent √™tre gagn√©s gr√¢ce aux contributions √† la communaut√© et √† la participation aux activit√©s de gouvernance. Les utilisateurs peuvent √©galement br√ªler $RCH pour obtenir $SOFA. N'oubliez pas que les utilisateurs gagnent $RCH gr√¢ce √† des airdrops quotidiens bas√©s sur leur volume de transactions, permettant aux utilisateurs actifs de recevoir des airdrops substantiels, en plus du rendement potentiel qu'ils obtiennent en achetant des produits structur√©s.** üó£ Programme de R√©f√©rence de Courtier (dApp) Nous reconnaissons qu'il y a de la force dans le nombre, c'est pourquoi nous avons con√ßu un m√©canisme de r√©compense de r√©f√©rence de courtier visant √† faciliter l'accessibilit√© et l'infrastructure de l'√©cosyst√®me SOFA. Les courtiers participants qui construisent et permettent l'acc√®s des utilisateurs finaux aux protocoles SOFA sous-jacents, par exemple par le d√©veloppement de dAPPs de soutien, auront droit √† 5% des r√©compenses d'airdrop de l'utilisateur final, pay√©es directement par le protocole. Rejoignez la communaut√© SOFA.org d√®s aujourd'hui ! Twitter | Discord | Telegram | Medium | Contactez-nous

title: SOFA.org Overview
body: SOFA.org Conspectus Quid est SOFA.org? SOFA.org est organisatio decentralizata, non lucrativa quae in promovendo DeFi ecosystema versatur. Nostra modus operandi est promovendi summos DeFi normas, sustinere altae qualitatis propositum, et promovendi adoptionem technologiarum blockchain in finibus mainstream. SOFA.org operabitur ut DAO in tribus principalibus areis in DeFi üìö Educatio & Technologia Progressus: Innovare et communicare scientiam inter participes. üî¨ Investigatio & Innovatio: Evolvere novas solutiones DeFi cum valore tangibili. üõ° Normae Industriae: Stabilire optimas praxim pro protocollo securitatis et efficientiae capitis. üó≥ $SOFA Governance Token $SOFA est token gubernationis qui permittit tenentibus participare in processu decisionis pro ecosystemate SOFA.org. Tenentes $SOFA iura suffragii habent in propositis principalibus, adiuvantes ad formandum futurum nostrae emergentis ecosystematis. Hic token communitatis possessionem promovet et curat ut communitas directe dicat in evolutione et administratione platformae. SOFA.org congregavit stellarum castum membrorum fundatorum et sociorum propositi ut nostram protocolum et TVL incrementum ab initio acceleret. Membrorum DAO et Membrorum Supportantium ad Initium Maii 2024 Quid aedificat SOFA.org? SOFA.org aedificabit et sustentabit protocollo propositum quae augent DeFi incrementum ut infrastructura integralis conventionalis financiae. Propositum inaugurale in praebendo solutionem purgandi transparentem, scalable, et decentralizatam versabitur quae producta structura crypto in catena tractat. Usores poterit emere varietatem productorum structorum ab infinitis mercatoribus in nostro aperto dAPP ad lucrandum fructus attractivos, cum transactionibus exsecutis automatice per nostras vaults standardizatas ad tollendum omnia pericula contrapartium. Praeterea, usores platformae directe remunerantur per native utilitatis token $RCH, token deflationarium cum supply fixo quod tantum per usum protocollo mereri potest. Denique, ut incentivorum concordiam curent, omnia merces protocollo recyclabuntur ad comburendum $RCH tokens quotidie, minuendo totalem fluitationem et accumulando omnia lucrum ad nostros tenentes token-usorum in longo tempore. ü§ë $RCH Utility Token $RCH est nucleus utilitatis token in SOFA ecosystemate. Designatum est ad recompensandum usores pro transactionibus intra ecosystemate et participatione in eius incremento. $RCH habet totam copiam 37 million token, cum 25 million (~67%) prae-mintata et inclusa in Uniswap liquido piscina. Reliqui 12mm (33%) destinantur ad airdropandum usoribus et fautoribus protocol. Longum-term deflationarium consilium curat ut valor token augescat simul cum augendis transactionum voluminibus. üöÄ MERCEDES CUM NOBIS $SOFA token mereri possunt per contributiones ad communitatem et participationem in actionibus gubernationis. Usores etiam $RCH comburere possunt ut $SOFA accipiant. Memento, usores $RCH merentur per airdrops quotidianos secundum eorum transactionum volumen, permittentes usoribus activis merere substantiales airdrops, supra potentialem fructum quem accipiunt ex emptionibus productorum structorum.** üó£ Programma Referendi Brokerorum (dApp) Agimus quod vis in numeris est, ita consilium fecimus mechanismum praemiorum referendi brokerorum ad faciendam accessibilitatem et infrastructuram SOFA ecosystematis. Brokeri participes qui construunt et permittunt accessum usoris finalis ad subiacentes SOFA protocol, sicut per evolutionem dAPPs sustentantium, ius habebunt ad recipiendum 5% praemiorum airdrop usoris finalis, directe a protocol solutorum. Veni ad communitatem SOFA.org hodie! Twitter | Discord | Telegram | Medium | Contact us

title: Innovating the Next Wave of DeFi
body: Innovating the Next Wave of DeFi Counterparty Defaults Served a Stark Reminder to the Importance of Decentralisation 2022 provided a harsh reality check for crypto, with the demise of Genesis, Celsius, 3AC, and FTX shocking the very core of our ecosystem, and reminded us of the importance of decentralisation that many of us had forgotten in our pursuit of profits. Traditional finance went through a similar reckoning with the demise of Lehman, where a chain of (over-indebted) counterparty failures nearly brought down the global financial system. As a result, the post-GFC era legislated the use of centralized clearing houses and tri-party clearing arrangements, effectively segregating and concentrating asset custody risk into well-funded (and highly regulated) 3rd party entities. Regulators had deemed that it was safer and more efficient to manage collateral risks within focused points of contact, as well as preventing bad actor intermediaries from playing 'fast-and-loose' with balance sheet management. Fast forward to today, imagine if the world had a widely available technology solution that provided immutable data records, traceable transactions, definable parameters, operational transparency, and exceptional network security; surely a technology like that would provide the ideal solution for a global settlement depository, wouldn't it? Rekindling the 'Trustless' Spirit as the Core Value of Blockchain Decentralization. Transparency. Immutability. Exensibility. Authenticity. These are some of the common words most often uttered as the main advantages provided by blockchain. However, we feel that 'Trustless' offers the best personification of crypto's core values, as blockchain has enabled complete strangers to execute valid transactions without the reliance on arbitrary middleman or gated privileged groups. Furthermore, smart contract immutability allows one to place their absolute faith in code instead of the goodwill of your counterparty. As such, the foundation of trustlessness is built on the uncompromisable pillars of 1) contract immutability and 2) on-chain asset settlement. These core principles will be our driving force in developing a protocol that can truly be free from the confines of centralization. However, let's be clear that the decentralization spirit should be about promoting user access and participation, rather than absolving responsibility in some extreme form of financial anarchy. While blockchain executions could be anonymous, there is still usually a social human being at the other end of your transaction that we should treat with respect. The development of the collective SOFA protocols is our attempt to promote the trustless decentralisation spirit, but it's equally important for us to establish a set of 'best practices' guidelines to uphold professional accountability, even if they are self-imposed or self-regulated. Every part of our protocol design, including contract transparency, vault classification, and fair-launch tokenomics demonstrate our resolve and commitment to building a more responsible DeFi. Through leading by example, we hope to show the world that there is a better way forward, with trustless decentralization being a key cornerstone of that future. Risk Tokenization At their core, financial instruments are ultimately nothing more than monetary contracts against a counterparty on some claims of payments and ownership. They are governed by various man-made (& centralised) layers of regulation, and legally memorialized by physical and electronic paperwork. Unsurprisingly, we can substitute a lot of the preceding words with "digital" and "blockchain ledger" without losing the essence of their meanings. Crypto has made tremendous progress in the area of on-chain safety, 'code is law' smart contract frameworks, transferrable digital currencies, and tokenization of RWAs. We are taking the last part one step further with our innovative product vaults, where we are recording not just the notional amount, but also transcribing other vital instrument parameters on-chain, so that they can be authentically replicated and referenced upon in a process we call Risk Tokenization. The resulting output will be contained in something called 'Position Tokens', which can be thought of as ownership claims on chain-locked assets, but can be freely transferred between users like a standard ERC-20 tokens. A Sustainable Tokenomics Model with Usage Driven Rewards Look, money makes the world go-around, and the maximization of self-interest as a stable equilibrium outcome is a core driving force behind DeFi. However, in the past cycle, we have seen a number of (very) high profile failures of once promising projects due to poorly constructed tokenomics. Whether it's due to exit-liquidity dumps (by insiders & VCs), gimmicky inflationary experiments, price-reflexive demand models, or an over-focus on short-term gains, there is still a lot of work to do to promote a more sustainable monetary model. In response, SOFA.org will be deploying a 100% fair-launch tokenomics model, with a fixed-supply deflationary utility token that can only be earned via protocol usage. Furthermore, all protocol earnings will be used for daily token burn operations, ensuring that all profits are directly recycled back into the pockets of our core users and hodlers. Over the long-run, the token price shall be a fundamental representation of how much (settlement) value our protocols have contributed to the ecosystem. 'Trade to Earn', anyone? Decentralized Clearing as a New Settlement Foundation With the wisdom gained from the past cycle, we are directly addressing some of the structural shortcomings in DeFi while iterating on its key innovations. Specifically, the creation of SOFA.org's decentralized clearing vaults is our ambitious attempt to establish standards of how financial assets can be atomically settled on-chain, while simultaneously catalyzing DeFi capital liquidity through transferrable Position Tokens. By recording relevant instrument details directly on the smart contract, not only can we settle these assets on-chain, but the protocol can also mint matching Position Tokens as a definitive digital proof of claim. Furthermore, these Positions Token can be pledged to other DeFi protocols and even CeFi platforms as secure collateral, greatly enhancing capital velocity across the entire ecosystem. Finally, by having our thoroughly designed DeFi vaults as a secure, transparent, and 'neutral' settlement option on the blockchain, we have eliminated asset custody concerns across crypto intermediaries, offering users complete ease of mind to focus on return ON capital rather than return OF capital.

body: Îã§Ïùå DeFi ÌòÅÏã†Ïùò Î¨ºÍ≤∞ ÏÉÅÎåÄÎ∞©Ïùò ÎîîÌè¥Ìä∏Îäî Î∂ÑÏÇ∞ÌôîÏùò Ï§ëÏöîÏÑ±ÏùÑ ÏùºÍπ®ÏõåÏ£ºÎäî Í∞ïÎ†•Ìïú Í≤ΩÍ≥†ÏòÄÎã§ 2022ÎÖÑÏùÄ Ï†úÎÑ§ÏãúÏä§, ÏÖÄÏãúÏö∞Ïä§, 3AC, FTXÏùò Î™∞ÎùΩÏúºÎ°ú ÏïîÌò∏ÌôîÌèêÏóê ÎåÄÌïú Í∞ÄÌòπÌïú ÌòÑÏã§ÏùÑ Ï†úÍ≥µÌñàÏúºÎ©∞, Ïù¥Îäî Ïö∞Î¶¨ ÏÉùÌÉúÍ≥ÑÏùò ÌïµÏã¨ÏùÑ Ï∂©Í≤©Ïóê Îπ†Îú®Î†∏Í≥†, ÎßéÏùÄ ÏÇ¨ÎûåÎì§Ïù¥ Ïù¥ÏùµÏùÑ Ï∂îÍµ¨ÌïòÎäî Í≥ºÏ†ïÏóêÏÑú ÏûäÍ≥† ÏûàÏóàÎçò Î∂ÑÏÇ∞ÌôîÏùò Ï§ëÏöîÏÑ±ÏùÑ ÏÉÅÍ∏∞ÏãúÏº∞ÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ï†ÑÌÜµ Í∏àÏúµÎèÑ Î†àÎ®º Î∏åÎùºÎçîÏä§Ïùò Î™∞ÎùΩÍ≥º Ìï®Íªò Ïú†ÏÇ¨Ìïú Í∞ÅÏÑ±ÏùÑ Í≤™ÏóàÏúºÎ©∞, Í≥ºÎèÑÌïòÍ≤å Î∂ÄÏ±ÑÎ•º ÏßÄÍ≥† ÏûàÎäî ÏÉÅÎåÄÎ∞©Ïùò Ïã§Ìå®Í∞Ä Í∏ÄÎ°úÎ≤å Í∏àÏúµ ÏãúÏä§ÌÖúÏùÑ Í±∞Ïùò Î∂ïÍ¥¥ÏãúÌÇ¨ ÎªîÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Í∑∏ Í≤∞Í≥º, GFC Ïù¥ÌõÑ ÏãúÎåÄÏóêÎäî Ï§ëÏïô ÏßëÏ§ëÌòï Ï≤≠ÏÇ∞ÏÜåÏôÄ ÏÇºÏûê Ï≤≠ÏÇ∞ Î∞©ÏãùÏùò ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïù¥ Î≤ïÏ†úÌôîÎêòÏñ¥ ÏûêÏÇ∞ Î≥¥Í¥Ä ÏúÑÌóòÏùÑ Ïûò ÏûêÍ∏à ÏßÄÏõêÎêòÍ≥† (Í∑∏Î¶¨Í≥† Í≥†ÎèÑÎ°ú Í∑úÏ†úÎêú) Ï†ú3Ïûê Í∏∞Í¥ÄÏúºÎ°ú Ìö®Í≥ºÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Î∂ÑÎ¶¨ÌïòÍ≥† ÏßëÏ§ëÏãúÏº∞ÏäµÎãàÎã§. Í∑úÏ†ú ÎãπÍµ≠ÏùÄ ÏßëÏ§ëÎêú Ï†ëÏ¥â ÏßÄÏ†ê ÎÇ¥ÏóêÏÑú Îã¥Î≥¥ ÏúÑÌóòÏùÑ Í¥ÄÎ¶¨ÌïòÎäî Í≤ÉÏù¥ Îçî ÏïàÏ†ÑÌïòÍ≥† Ìö®Ïú®Ï†ÅÏù¥ÎùºÍ≥† ÌåêÎã®ÌñàÏúºÎ©∞, ÎÇòÏÅú ÌñâÏúÑÏûê Ï§ëÍ∞úÏù∏Ïù¥ Ïû¨Î¨¥ Í¥ÄÎ¶¨ÏóêÏÑú 'Îπ†Î•¥Í≥† ÎäêÏä®ÌïòÍ≤å' ÌñâÎèôÌïòÎäî Í≤ÉÏùÑ Î∞©ÏßÄÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïò§ÎäòÎÇ†Î°ú Îπ®Î¶¨ ÎÑòÏñ¥Í∞Ä Î≥¥Í≤†ÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÎßåÏïΩ ÏÑ∏ÏÉÅÏóê Î∂àÎ≥ÄÏùò Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ Í∏∞Î°ù, Ï∂îÏ†Å Í∞ÄÎä•Ìïú Í±∞Îûò, Ï†ïÏùò Í∞ÄÎä•Ìïú Îß§Í∞úÎ≥ÄÏàò, Ïö¥ÏòÅ Ìà¨Î™ÖÏÑ± Î∞è Îõ∞Ïñ¥ÎÇú ÎÑ§Ìä∏ÏõåÌÅ¨ Î≥¥ÏïàÏùÑ Ï†úÍ≥µÌïòÎäî Í¥ëÎ≤îÏúÑÌïòÍ≤å ÏÇ¨Ïö© Í∞ÄÎä•Ìïú Í∏∞Ïà† ÏÜîÎ£®ÏÖòÏù¥ ÏûàÎã§Î©¥; Í∑∏Îü∞ Í∏∞Ïà†ÏùÄ Í∏ÄÎ°úÎ≤å Í≤∞Ï†ú ÏòàÏπòÏÜåÏóê ÎåÄÌïú Ïù¥ÏÉÅÏ†ÅÏù∏ ÏÜîÎ£®ÏÖòÏùÑ Ï†úÍ≥µÌï† Í≤É ÏïÑÎãôÎãàÍπå? Î∏îÎ°ùÏ≤¥Ïù∏Ïùò ÌïµÏã¨ Í∞ÄÏπòÎ°úÏÑú 'Ïã†Î¢∞ ÏóÜÎäî' Ï†ïÏã†ÏùÑ ÎêòÏÇ¥Î¶¨Í∏∞ Î∂ÑÏÇ∞Ìôî. Ìà¨Î™ÖÏÑ±. Î∂àÎ≥ÄÏÑ±. ÌôïÏû•ÏÑ±. ÏßÑÏ†ïÏÑ±. Ïù¥Îì§ÏùÄ Î∏îÎ°ùÏ≤¥Ïù∏Ïù¥ Ï†úÍ≥µÌïòÎäî Ï£ºÏöî Ïû•Ï†êÏúºÎ°ú Í∞ÄÏû• ÏûêÏ£º Ïñ∏Í∏âÎêòÎäî ÏùºÎ∞òÏ†ÅÏù∏ Îã®Ïñ¥Îì§ÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Í∑∏Îü¨ÎÇò Ïö∞Î¶¨Îäî 'Ïã†Î¢∞ ÏóÜÎäî'Ïù¥ ÏïîÌò∏ÌôîÌèêÏùò ÌïµÏã¨ Í∞ÄÏπòÎ•º Í∞ÄÏû• Ïûò ÌëúÌòÑÌïúÎã§Í≥† ÎäêÎÇçÎãàÎã§. Î∏îÎ°ùÏ≤¥Ïù∏ÏùÄ ÏôÑÏ†ÑÌïú ÎÇØÏÑ† ÏÇ¨ÎûåÎì§Ïù¥ ÏûÑÏùòÏùò Ï§ëÍ∞úÏù∏Ïù¥ÎÇò ÌäπÍ∂å Í∑∏Î£πÏóê ÏùòÏ°¥ÌïòÏßÄ ÏïäÍ≥† Ïú†Ìö®Ìïú Í±∞ÎûòÎ•º ÏàòÌñâÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÍ≤å Ìï¥Ï£ºÏóàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÎçîÏö±Ïù¥, Ïä§ÎßàÌä∏ Í≥ÑÏïΩÏùò Î∂àÎ≥ÄÏÑ±ÏùÄ ÏÉÅÎåÄÎ∞©Ïùò ÏÑ†Ïùò ÎåÄÏã† ÏΩîÎìúÏóê Ï†àÎåÄÏ†ÅÏù∏ Ïã†Î¢∞Î•º ÎëêÍ≤å Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. Îî∞ÎùºÏÑú Ïã†Î¢∞ ÏóÜÎäî Í∏∞Î∞òÏùÄ 1) Í≥ÑÏïΩÏùò Î∂àÎ≥ÄÏÑ±Í≥º 2) Ïò®Ï≤¥Ïù∏ ÏûêÏÇ∞ Ï†ïÏÇ∞Ïù¥ÎùºÎäî ÌÉÄÌòëÌï† Ïàò ÏóÜÎäî Í∏∞Îë• ÏúÑÏóê ÏÑ∏ÏõåÏßëÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥Îü¨Ìïú ÌïµÏã¨ ÏõêÏπôÏùÄ Ï§ëÏïô ÏßëÏ§ëÌôîÏùò Ï†úÏïΩÏóêÏÑú ÏßÑÏ†ïÏúºÎ°ú ÏûêÏú†Î°úÏö¥ ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏùÑ Í∞úÎ∞úÌïòÎäî Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò ÏõêÎèôÎ†•Ïù¥ Îê† Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Í∑∏Îü¨ÎÇò Î∂ÑÏÇ∞Ìôî Ï†ïÏã†ÏùÄ Ï±ÖÏûÑÏùÑ Î©¥Ï†úÌïòÎäî Í∑πÎã®Ï†ÅÏù∏ ÌòïÌÉúÏùò Í∏àÏúµ Î¨¥Ï†ïÎ∂Ä ÏÉÅÌÉúÍ∞Ä ÏïÑÎãàÎùº ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê Ï†ëÍ∑ºÍ≥º Ï∞∏Ïó¨Î•º Ï¥âÏßÑÌïòÎäî Í≤ÉÏóê Í¥ÄÌïú Í≤ÉÏûÑÏùÑ Î∂ÑÎ™ÖÌûà Ìï¥Ïïº Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. Î∏îÎ°ùÏ≤¥Ïù∏ Ïã§ÌñâÏùÄ ÏùµÎ™ÖÏùº Ïàò ÏûàÏßÄÎßå, Í±∞ÎûòÏùò Îã§Î•∏ Ï™ΩÏóêÎäî Ïó¨Ï†ÑÌûà Ïö∞Î¶¨Í∞Ä Ï°¥Ï§ëÌï¥Ïïº Ìï† ÏÇ¨ÌöåÏ†Å Ïù∏Í∞ÑÏù¥ Ï°¥Ïû¨Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ÏßëÎã® SOFA ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏùò Í∞úÎ∞úÏùÄ Ïã†Î¢∞ ÏóÜÎäî Î∂ÑÏÇ∞Ìôî Ï†ïÏã†ÏùÑ Ï¥âÏßÑÌïòÎ†§Îäî Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò ÏãúÎèÑÏù¥Î©∞, Ï†ÑÎ¨∏Ï†ÅÏù∏ Ï±ÖÏûÑÏùÑ Ïú†ÏßÄÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌïú 'Î™®Î≤î ÏÇ¨Î°Ä' Í∞ÄÏù¥ÎìúÎùºÏù∏ÏùÑ ÏÑ§Ï†ïÌïòÎäî Í≤ÉÎèÑ ÎòëÍ∞ôÏù¥ Ï§ëÏöîÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú ÏÑ§Í≥ÑÏùò Î™®Îì† Î∂ÄÎ∂Ñ, Í≥ÑÏïΩ Ìà¨Î™ÖÏÑ±, Í∏àÍ≥† Î∂ÑÎ•ò Î∞è Í≥µÏ†ï Ï∂úÏãú ÌÜ†ÌÅ¨ÎÖ∏ÎØπÏä§Îäî Îçî Ï±ÖÏûÑ ÏûàÎäî DeFiÎ•º Íµ¨Ï∂ïÌïòÎ†§Îäî Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò Í≤∞ÏùòÏôÄ ÌóåÏã†ÏùÑ Î≥¥Ïó¨Ï§çÎãàÎã§. Î™®Î≤îÏùÑ Î≥¥ÏûÑÏúºÎ°úÏç®, Ïö∞Î¶¨Îäî Ïã†Î¢∞ ÏóÜÎäî Î∂ÑÏÇ∞ÌôîÍ∞Ä Í∑∏ ÎØ∏ÎûòÏùò ÌïµÏã¨ Ï¥àÏÑùÏù¥ ÎêòÎäî Îçî ÎÇòÏùÄ Í∏∏Ïù¥ ÏûàÎã§Îäî Í≤ÉÏùÑ ÏÑ∏ÏÉÅÏóê Î≥¥Ïó¨Ï£ºÍ∏∞Î•º Ìù¨ÎßùÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Î¶¨Ïä§ÌÅ¨ ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞Ìôî Î≥∏ÏßàÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Í∏àÏúµ ÏÉÅÌíàÏùÄ Í∂ÅÍ∑πÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú ÏÉÅÎåÄÎ∞©Ïóê ÎåÄÌïú ÏßÄÎ∂à Î∞è ÏÜåÏú†Í∂å Ï£ºÏû•Ïóê ÎåÄÌïú ÌôîÌèê Í≥ÑÏïΩÏóê Î∂àÍ≥ºÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥Îì§ÏùÄ Îã§ÏñëÌïú Ïù∏ÏúÑÏ†Å(& Ï§ëÏïôÏßëÏ§ëÌôîÎêú) Í∑úÏ†ú Ï∏µÏóê ÏùòÌï¥ ÏßÄÎ∞∞ÎêòÎ©∞, Î¨ºÎ¶¨Ï†Å Î∞è Ï†ÑÏûêÏ†Å ÏÑúÎ•òÎ°ú Î≤ïÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Í∏∞ÎÖêÎê©ÎãàÎã§. ÎÜÄÎûçÏßÄ ÏïäÍ≤åÎèÑ, Ïö∞Î¶¨Îäî ÏïûÏÑú Ïñ∏Í∏âÌïú ÎßéÏùÄ Îã®Ïñ¥Î•º "ÎîîÏßÄÌÑ∏" Î∞è "Î∏îÎ°ùÏ≤¥Ïù∏ ÏõêÏû•"ÏúºÎ°ú ÎåÄÏ≤¥Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏúºÎ©∞, Í∑∏ ÏùòÎØ∏Ïùò Î≥∏ÏßàÏùÑ ÏûÉÏßÄ ÏïäÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÏïîÌò∏ÌôîÌèêÎäî Ïò®Ï≤¥Ïù∏ ÏïàÏ†ÑÏÑ±, 'ÏΩîÎìúÎäî Î≤ï' Ïä§ÎßàÌä∏ Í≥ÑÏïΩ ÌîÑÎ†àÏûÑÏõåÌÅ¨, Ï†ÑÏÜ° Í∞ÄÎä•Ìïú ÎîîÏßÄÌÑ∏ ÌÜµÌôî Î∞è RWAÏùò ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞Ìôî Î∂ÑÏïºÏóêÏÑú ÏóÑÏ≤≠ÎÇú Î∞úÏ†ÑÏùÑ Ïù¥Î£®ÏóàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïö∞Î¶¨Îäî ÌòÅÏã†Ï†ÅÏù∏ Ï†úÌíà Í∏àÍ≥†Î•º ÌÜµÌï¥ ÎßàÏßÄÎßâ Î∂ÄÎ∂ÑÏùÑ Ìïú Îã®Í≥Ñ Îçî Î∞úÏ†ÑÏãúÌÇ§Í≥† ÏûàÏúºÎ©∞, Ïó¨Í∏∞ÏÑú Ïö∞Î¶¨Îäî Î™ÖÎ™© Í∏àÏï°ÎøêÎßå ÏïÑÎãàÎùº Ïò®Ï≤¥Ïù∏ÏóêÏÑú Îã§Î•∏ Ï§ëÏöîÌïú Í∏àÏúµ ÏÉÅÌíà Îß§Í∞úÎ≥ÄÏàòÎ•º Í∏∞Î°ùÌïòÏó¨, Ïù¥Î•º ÌÜµÌï¥ 'Î¶¨Ïä§ÌÅ¨ ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞Ìôî'ÎùºÎäî Í≥ºÏ†ïÏóêÏÑú ÏßÑÏ†ïÏúºÎ°ú Î≥µÏ†úÎêòÍ≥† Ï∞∏Ï°∞Îê† Ïàò ÏûàÎèÑÎ°ù ÌïòÍ≥† ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Í∑∏ Í≤∞Í≥ºÎ¨ºÏùÄ 'Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞'Ïù¥ÎùºÎäî Í≤ÉÏúºÎ°ú, Ïù¥Îäî Ï≤¥Ïù∏Ïóê Ïû†Í∏¥ ÏûêÏÇ∞Ïóê ÎåÄÌïú ÏÜåÏú†Í∂å Ï£ºÏû•ÏúºÎ°ú ÏÉùÍ∞ÅÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏßÄÎßå, ÌëúÏ§Ä ERC-20 ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞Ï≤òÎüº ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê Í∞ÑÏóê ÏûêÏú†Î°≠Í≤å Ï†ÑÏÜ°Îê† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÏÇ¨Ïö© Í∏∞Î∞ò Î≥¥ÏÉÅÏùÑ Í∞ñÏ∂ò ÏßÄÏÜç Í∞ÄÎä•Ìïú ÌÜ†ÌÅ¨ÎÖ∏ÎØπÏä§ Î™®Îç∏ Î≥¥ÏÑ∏Ïöî, ÎèàÏùÄ ÏÑ∏ÏÉÅÏùÑ ÎèåÍ≤å ÌïòÍ≥†, ÏûêÍ∏∞ Ïù¥ÏùµÏùò Í∑πÎåÄÌôîÎäî DeFiÏùò ÌïµÏã¨ Ï∂îÏßÑÎ†•ÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Í∑∏Îü¨ÎÇò ÏßÄÎÇú ÏÇ¨Ïù¥ÌÅ¥ÏóêÏÑúÎäî ÏûòÎ™ª ÏÑ§Í≥ÑÎêú ÌÜ†ÌÅ¨ÎÖ∏ÎØπÏä§ ÎïåÎ¨∏Ïóê ÌïúÎïå Ïú†ÎßùÌñàÎçò ÌîÑÎ°úÏ†ùÌä∏Îì§Ïù¥ (Îß§Ïö∞) Í≥†ÌîÑÎ°úÌïÑ Ïã§Ìå®Î•º Í≤™Îäî Í≤ÉÏùÑ Î≥¥ÏïòÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÎÇ¥Î∂ÄÏûê Î∞è VCÏóê ÏùòÌïú Ï∂úÍµ¨ Ïú†ÎèôÏÑ± Îç§ÌîÑ, Í∏∞Î∞úÌïú Ïù∏ÌîåÎ†àÏù¥ÏÖò Ïã§Ìóò, Í∞ÄÍ≤© Î∞òÏùë ÏàòÏöî Î™®Îç∏, Îã®Í∏∞ Ïù¥ÏùµÏóê ÎåÄÌïú Í≥ºÎèÑÌïú ÏßëÏ§ë Îì±ÏúºÎ°ú Ïù∏Ìï¥, Îçî ÏßÄÏÜç Í∞ÄÎä•Ìïú ÌÜµÌôî Î™®Îç∏ÏùÑ Ï¥âÏßÑÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ Ìï¥Ïïº Ìï† ÏùºÏù¥ Ïó¨Ï†ÑÌûà ÎßéÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥Ïóê ÎåÄÌïú ÎåÄÏùëÏúºÎ°ú, SOFA.orgÎäî ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏùÑ ÌÜµÌï¥ÏÑúÎßå ÏñªÏùÑ Ïàò ÏûàÎäî Í≥†Ï†ï Í≥µÍ∏âÏùò ÎîîÌîåÎ†àÏù¥ÏÖò Ïú†Ìã∏Î¶¨Ìã∞ ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÏùÑ Í∞ñÏ∂ò 100% Í≥µÏ†ï Ï∂úÏãú ÌÜ†ÌÅ¨ÎÖ∏ÎØπÏä§ Î™®Îç∏ÏùÑ Î∞∞Ìè¨Ìï† Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. ÎòêÌïú, Î™®Îì† ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú ÏàòÏùµÏùÄ ÏùºÏùº ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ ÏÜåÍ∞Å ÏûëÏóÖÏóê ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÎêòÏñ¥ Î™®Îì† Ïù¥ÏùµÏù¥ ÏßÅÏ†ëÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò ÌïµÏã¨ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÏôÄ ÌôÄÎçîÏùò Ï£ºÎ®∏ÎãàÎ°ú Ïû¨ÌôúÏö©ÎêòÎèÑÎ°ù Î≥¥Ïû•Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. Ïû•Í∏∞Ï†ÅÏúºÎ°ú, ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ Í∞ÄÍ≤©ÏùÄ Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏù¥ ÏÉùÌÉúÍ≥ÑÏóê Í∏∞Ïó¨Ìïú (Ï†ïÏÇ∞) Í∞ÄÏπòÏùò Í∑ºÎ≥∏Ï†ÅÏù∏ ÌëúÌòÑÏù¥ Îê† Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. 'Í±∞ÎûòÎ•º ÌÜµÌï¥ ÏñªÍ∏∞', Ïñ¥ÎñªÏäµÎãàÍπå? ÏÉàÎ°úÏö¥ Ï†ïÏÇ∞ Í∏∞Î∞òÏúºÎ°úÏÑúÏùò Î∂ÑÏÇ∞ Ï≤≠ÏÇ∞ ÏßÄÎÇú ÏÇ¨Ïù¥ÌÅ¥ÏóêÏÑú ÏñªÏùÄ ÏßÄÌòúÎ•º Î∞îÌÉïÏúºÎ°ú, Ïö∞Î¶¨Îäî DeFiÏùò Íµ¨Ï°∞Ï†Å Îã®Ï†êÏùÑ ÏßÅÏ†ë Ìï¥Í≤∞ÌïòÎ©¥ÏÑú Í∑∏ ÌïµÏã¨ ÌòÅÏã†ÏùÑ Î∞òÎ≥µÌïòÍ≥† ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Íµ¨Ï≤¥Ï†ÅÏúºÎ°ú, SOFA.orgÏùò Î∂ÑÏÇ∞ Ï≤≠ÏÇ∞ Í∏àÍ≥†Ïùò ÏÉùÏÑ±ÏùÄ Í∏àÏúµ ÏûêÏÇ∞Ïù¥ Ïò®Ï≤¥Ïù∏ÏóêÏÑú ÏõêÏûêÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Ï†ïÏÇ∞Îê† Ïàò ÏûàÎäî Í∏∞Ï§ÄÏùÑ ÏÑ§Ï†ïÌïòÎ†§Îäî Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò ÏïºÏã¨Ï∞¨ ÏãúÎèÑÏù¥Î©∞, ÎèôÏãúÏóê Ï†ÑÏÜ° Í∞ÄÎä•Ìïú Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÏùÑ ÌÜµÌï¥ DeFi ÏûêÎ≥∏ Ïú†ÎèôÏÑ±ÏùÑ Ï¥âÏßÑÌïòÎäî Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Í¥ÄÎ†®Îêú Í∏∞Í∏∞ ÏÑ∏Î∂Ä Ï†ïÎ≥¥Î•º Ïä§ÎßàÌä∏ Í≥ÑÏïΩÏóê ÏßÅÏ†ë Í∏∞Î°ùÌï®ÏúºÎ°úÏç®, Ïö∞Î¶¨Îäî Ïù¥Îü¨Ìïú ÏûêÏÇ∞ÏùÑ Ïò®Ï≤¥Ïù∏ÏóêÏÑú Ï†ïÏÇ∞Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏùÑ ÎøêÎßå ÏïÑÎãàÎùº, ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏùÄ ÏùºÏπòÌïòÎäî Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÏùÑ Î∞úÌñâÌïòÏó¨ ÌôïÏ†ïÏ†ÅÏù∏ ÎîîÏßÄÌÑ∏ Ï≤≠Íµ¨ Ï¶ùÎ™ÖÏúºÎ°ú ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÎòêÌïú, Ïù¥Îü¨Ìïú Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÏùÄ Îã§Î•∏ DeFi ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú Î∞è Ïã¨ÏßÄÏñ¥ CeFi ÌîåÎû´ÌèºÏóê ÏïàÏ†ÑÌïú Îã¥Î≥¥Î°ú Îã¥Î≥¥Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏñ¥, Ï†ÑÏ≤¥ ÏÉùÌÉúÍ≥ÑÏóêÏÑú ÏûêÎ≥∏ Ïú†ÎèôÏÑ±ÏùÑ ÌÅ¨Í≤å Ìñ•ÏÉÅÏãúÌÇµÎãàÎã§. ÎßàÏßÄÎßâÏúºÎ°ú, Ïö∞Î¶¨Í∞Ä Ï≤†Ï†ÄÌûà ÏÑ§Í≥ÑÎêú DeFi Í∏àÍ≥†Î•º Î∏îÎ°ùÏ≤¥Ïù∏ÏóêÏÑú ÏïàÏ†ÑÌïòÍ≥† Ìà¨Î™ÖÌïòÎ©∞ 'Ï§ëÎ¶ΩÏ†ÅÏù∏' Ï†ïÏÇ∞ ÏòµÏÖòÏúºÎ°ú Ï†úÍ≥µÌï®ÏúºÎ°úÏç®, Ïö∞Î¶¨Îäî ÏïîÌò∏Ìôî Ï§ëÍ∞úÏù∏ Í∞ÑÏùò ÏûêÏÇ∞ Î≥¥Í¥Ä Ïö∞Î†§Î•º ÏóÜÏï†Í≥†, ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÏóêÍ≤å ÏûêÎ≥∏Ïùò ÏàòÏùµÎ•†Ïù¥ ÏïÑÎãå ÏûêÎ≥∏Ïùò Î∞òÌôòÏóê ÏßëÏ§ëÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÎäî ÏôÑÏ†ÑÌïú ÎßàÏùåÏùò ÌèâÌôîÎ•º Ï†úÍ≥µÌï©ÎãàÎã§.

title: Innover la prochaine vague de DeFi
body: Innover la Prochaine Vague de DeFi Les D√©faillances des Contreparties ont Servi de Rappel Brut √† l'Importance de la D√©centralisation 2022 a fourni un rude rappel de la r√©alit√© pour la crypto, avec la chute de Genesis, Celsius, 3AC et FTX choquant le c≈ìur m√™me de notre √©cosyst√®me, et nous a rappel√© l'importance de la d√©centralisation que beaucoup d'entre nous avaient oubli√©e dans notre qu√™te de profits. La finance traditionnelle a travers√© un examen similaire avec la chute de Lehman, o√π une cha√Æne de d√©faillances de contreparties (trop endett√©es) a failli faire s'effondrer le syst√®me financier mondial. En cons√©quence, l'√®re post-GFC a l√©gif√©r√© l'utilisation de chambres de compensation centralis√©es et d'arrangements de compensation tripartites, isolant et concentrant effectivement le risque de garde d'actifs dans des entit√©s tierces bien financ√©es (et hautement r√©glement√©es). Les r√©gulateurs avaient jug√© qu'il √©tait plus s√ªr et plus efficace de g√©rer les risques de garantie au sein de points de contact cibl√©s, tout en emp√™chant les interm√©diaires malveillants de jouer 'fast-and-loose' avec la gestion des bilans. Avan√ßons jusqu'√† aujourd'hui, imaginez si le monde avait une solution technologique largement disponible qui fournissait des enregistrements de donn√©es immuables, des transactions tra√ßables, des param√®tres d√©finissables, une transparence op√©rationnelle et une s√©curit√© r√©seau exceptionnelle ; une technologie comme celle-l√† fournirait s√ªrement la solution id√©ale pour un d√©p√¥t de r√®glement mondial, n'est-ce pas ? Raviver l'Esprit 'Sans Confiance' comme Valeur Fondamentale de la Blockchain D√©centralisation. Transparence. Immutabilit√©. Extensibilit√©. Authenticit√©. Ce sont quelques-uns des mots couramment prononc√©s comme les principaux avantages offerts par la blockchain. Cependant, nous pensons que 'Sans Confiance' offre la meilleure personnification des valeurs fondamentales de la crypto, car la blockchain a permis √† des √©trangers complets d'ex√©cuter des transactions valides sans d√©pendre d'un interm√©diaire arbitraire ou de groupes privil√©gi√©s. De plus, l'immuabilit√© des contrats intelligents permet de placer sa foi absolue dans le code plut√¥t que dans la bonne volont√© de votre contrepartie. En tant que tel, la fondation de la confiance est construite sur les piliers intransigeants de 1) l'immuabilit√© des contrats et 2) le r√®glement des actifs sur la cha√Æne. Ces principes fondamentaux seront notre force motrice dans le d√©veloppement d'un protocole qui peut vraiment √™tre lib√©r√© des contraintes de la centralisation. Cependant, soyons clairs que l'esprit de d√©centralisation doit viser √† promouvoir l'acc√®s et la participation des utilisateurs, plut√¥t qu'√† absoudre la responsabilit√© dans une forme extr√™me d'anarchie financi√®re. Bien que les ex√©cutions de blockchain puissent √™tre anonymes, il y a g√©n√©ralement un √™tre humain social √† l'autre bout de votre transaction que nous devrions traiter avec respect. Le d√©veloppement des protocoles collectifs SOFA est notre tentative de promouvoir l'esprit de d√©centralisation sans confiance, mais il est tout aussi important pour nous d'√©tablir un ensemble de lignes directrices de 'meilleures pratiques' pour maintenir la responsabilit√© professionnelle, m√™me si elles sont auto-impos√©es ou auto-r√©gul√©es. Chaque partie de notre conception de protocole, y compris la transparence des contrats, la classification des coffres et la tokenomics de lancement √©quitable, d√©montre notre d√©termination et notre engagement √† construire une DeFi plus responsable. En montrant l'exemple, nous esp√©rons montrer au monde qu'il existe une meilleure voie √† suivre, avec la d√©centralisation sans confiance comme pierre angulaire de cet avenir. Tokenisation des Risques Au fond, les instruments financiers ne sont finalement rien d'autre que des contrats mon√©taires contre une contrepartie sur certaines revendications de paiements et de propri√©t√©. Ils sont r√©gis par diverses couches de r√©glementation humaines (& centralis√©es), et l√©galement m√©moris√©s par des documents physiques et √©lectroniques. Sans surprise, nous pouvons substituer beaucoup des mots pr√©c√©dents par "num√©rique" et "grand livre blockchain" sans perdre l'essence de leurs significations. La crypto a fait d'√©normes progr√®s dans le domaine de la s√©curit√© sur la cha√Æne, des cadres de contrats intelligents 'le code est la loi', des monnaies num√©riques transf√©rables et de la tokenisation des RWAs. Nous faisons un pas de plus avec nos coffres de produits innovants, o√π nous enregistrons non seulement le montant notionnel, mais aussi transcrivons d'autres param√®tres vitaux des instruments sur la cha√Æne, afin qu'ils puissent √™tre authentiquement reproduits et r√©f√©renc√©s dans un processus que nous appelons la Tokenisation des Risques. Le r√©sultat sera contenu dans quelque chose appel√© 'Tokens de Position', qui peuvent √™tre consid√©r√©s comme des revendications de propri√©t√© sur des actifs verrouill√©s sur la cha√Æne, mais peuvent √™tre librement transf√©r√©s entre utilisateurs comme des tokens ERC-20 standard. Un Mod√®le de Tokenomics Durable avec des R√©compenses Bas√©es sur l'Utilisation Regardez, l'argent fait tourner le monde, et la maximisation de l'int√©r√™t personnel comme r√©sultat d'√©quilibre stable est une force motrice fondamentale derri√®re la DeFi. Cependant, lors du dernier cycle, nous avons vu un certain nombre d'√©checs (tr√®s) m√©diatis√©s de projets autrefois prometteurs en raison de tokenomics mal construites. Que ce soit √† cause de dumps de liquidit√© de sortie (par des initi√©s et des VC), d'exp√©riences inflationnistes gimmick, de mod√®les de demande r√©flexifs de prix, ou d'un trop grand accent sur les gains √† court terme, il reste encore beaucoup de travail √† faire pour promouvoir un mod√®le mon√©taire plus durable. En r√©ponse, SOFA.org d√©ploiera un mod√®le de tokenomics de lancement √©quitable √† 100 %, avec un token utilitaire d√©flationniste √† offre fixe qui ne peut √™tre gagn√© que par l'utilisation du protocole. De plus, tous les b√©n√©fices du protocole seront utilis√©s pour des op√©rations de br√ªlage de tokens quotidiennes, garantissant que tous les profits sont directement recycl√©s dans les poches de nos utilisateurs et hodlers principaux. √Ä long terme, le prix du token sera une repr√©sentation fondamentale de la valeur (de r√®glement) que nos protocoles ont contribu√© √† l'√©cosyst√®me. '√âchanger pour Gagner', quelqu'un ? Compensation D√©centralis√©e comme Nouvelle Fondation de R√®glement Avec la sagesse acquise lors du dernier cycle, nous abordons directement certaines des lacunes structurelles de la DeFi tout en it√©rant sur ses innovations cl√©s. Plus pr√©cis√©ment, la cr√©ation des coffres de compensation d√©centralis√©s de SOFA.org est notre tentative ambitieuse d'√©tablir des normes sur la mani√®re dont les actifs financiers peuvent √™tre r√©gl√©s de mani√®re atomique sur la cha√Æne, tout en catalysant simultan√©ment la liquidit√© du capital DeFi gr√¢ce √† des Tokens de Position transf√©rables. En enregistrant les d√©tails pertinents des instruments directement sur le contrat intelligent, non seulement nous pouvons r√©gler ces actifs sur la cha√Æne, mais le protocole peut √©galement frapper des jetons de position correspondants en tant que preuve num√©rique d√©finitive de r√©clamation. De plus, ces jetons de position peuvent √™tre engag√©s aupr√®s d'autres protocoles DeFi et m√™me de plateformes CeFi en tant que garantie s√©curis√©e, am√©liorant consid√©rablement la v√©locit√© du capital dans l'ensemble de l'√©cosyst√®me. Enfin, en ayant nos coffres DeFi soigneusement con√ßus comme une option de r√®glement s√©curis√©e, transparente et 'neutre' sur la blockchain, nous avons √©limin√© les pr√©occupations li√©es √† la garde des actifs √† travers les interm√©diaires crypto, offrant aux utilisateurs une tranquillit√© d'esprit totale pour se concentrer sur le retour SUR le capital plut√¥t que sur le retour DE capital.

title: Innovatio Proxima Unda DeFi
body: Innovatio Proxima Unda DeFi Defectus Partium Contrahentium Memoriam Dedit de Momentum Decentralisationis 2022 dura veritatis recognitio pro crypto praebuit, cum interitus Genesis, Celsius, 3AC, et FTX ipsam essentiam nostrae ecosystematis concussit, et meminimus momentum decentralisationis quod multi ex nobis in quaestione lucrorum obliti eramus. Financia tradita similem recognitio perierunt cum interitu Lehman, ubi catena defectuum partium contrahentium (super-indebtorum) fere systema financiale globale deiecit. Ut consequens, aera post-GFC usum domorum centralium purgationis et dispositionum tri-partitarum legibus sancivit, reapse segregando et concentrando periculum custodiae bonorum in entitatibus tertiae partis bene fundatis (et valde regulatis). Regulatoribus visum est tutius et efficacius esse pericula collateralium in punctis contactus concentratis administrare, ne intermediarii mali 'celeriter et laxissime' cum administratione rationum agerent. Adhuc hodie, imaginemus si mundus solutionem technologicam late praesto haberet quae immutabilia data recorda, transactiones traceabiles, parametra definibilia, transparentiam operationalem, et exceptionalem securitatem retis praebebat; certe talis technologia idealis solutio pro deposito globali solutionis esset, nonne? Reviviscens 'Spiritus Sine Fide' ut Core Valor Blockchain Decentralisatio. Transparentia. Immutabilitas. Extensibilitas. Authenticitas. Haec sunt quaedam ex verbis communibus plerumque proferendis ut praecipua commoda a blockchain praebita. Tamen, sentimus quod 'Sine Fide' optimam personificationem valorum core crypto praebet, cum blockchain permiserit ignotis ad validas transactiones peragendas sine fiducia in intermediariis arbitrariis aut coetibus privilegiatis. Praeterea, immutabilitas contractuum sapientium sinit unum suam fidem absolutam in codice ponere potius quam in bona voluntate tuae partis contrahentis. Ita, fundamentum sine fide a pillaribus intransigibilibus 1) immutabilitate contractuum et 2) solutione bonorum in catena aedificatur. Haec principia core erunt nostra vis agendi in protocollo evolvendo quod vere liberum esse potest a limitationibus centralisationis. Tamen, sit clarum quod spiritus decentralisationis de promovendo accessu et participatione usorum agere debet, potius quam absolvendo responsabilitatem in aliqua extrema forma anarchiae financialis. Dum executiones blockchain anonymae esse possunt, adhuc plerumque homo socialis ad alteram partem transactionis tuae est quem debemus cum respectu tractare. Evolutio protocolorum collectivorum SOFA est nostra conatus ad promovendum spiritum decentralisationis sine fide, sed aeque momenti est nobis constituere normam 'optimorum usuum' ad sustinendam professionalem responsabilitatem, etiam si sint auto-impositae aut auto-regulatae. Quaelibet pars consilii nostri protocollo, incluso transparentia contractuum, classificatione thesaurorum, et aequa-launch tokenomics, nostram determinationem et commitmentum ad construendum DeFi magis responsabilem demonstrat. Per exemplum ducens, speramus ostendere mundo meliorem viam esse, cum decentralisatione sine fide esse clavis lapidis illius futuri. Tokenizatio Periculi In sua essentia, instrumenta financialia nihil aliud sunt quam contractus monetarii contra partem contrahentem de quibusdam postulationibus solutionum et proprietatis. Reguntur variis stratis regulationis humanorum (& centralis), et legaliter memorializantur per documenta physica et electronica. Non mirum est, multa ex praecedentibus verbis cum "digitali" et "ledger blockchain" substituere posse sine essentia significandi amittenda. Crypto ingentem progressum in area securitatis in catena, 'lex est lex' structurae contractuum sapientium, monetae digitales transferibiles, et tokenizatione RWAs fecit. Ultimum partem unam gradum ulterius capimus cum nostris innovativis thesauris productorum, ubi non solum quantitatem notionalem, sed etiam alia vitalia instrumentorum parametra in catena transcribimus, ut possint authentice replicari et referenda in processu quem vocamus Tokenizationem Periculi. Exitus resultant in re quodam 'Position Tokens' appellatur, quod cogitari potest ut postulationes proprietatis in bonis in catena clausis, sed inter usores libere transferibilibus sicut standard ERC-20 tokens. Modelum Tokenomics Sustentabile cum Praemiis Usus Agente Ecce, pecunia orbem circumagere facit, et maximatio sui commodi ut stabilis aequilibrium exitus est core vis agendi post DeFi. Tamen, in praeterito cyclo, vidimus plures (valde) notabiles defectus olim promissorum propositorum ob male constructas tokenomics. Sive ob exitus-liquiditatis dumps (ab internis & VCs), experimenta inflatoria gimmickosa, exemplaria postulationis reflexivae pretii, aut nimiam attentionem ad lucrum brevis temporis, multum operis adhuc est faciendum ad promovendum modelum monetarium magis sustentabile. Ad respondendum, SOFA.org modelum tokenomics 100% aequum-lancium adhibebit, cum utilitatis token deflationario cum fixo-supplicio qui solum per usum protocollo mereri potest. Praeterea, omnia mercedis protocollo ad operationes quotidianas combustiones tokenorum adhibebuntur, curantes ut omnia lucra directe in sinum nostrorum usorum et hodlerum core redeant. In longo tempore, pretium tokenum fundamentale repraesentatio erit quanti (solutionis) valoris nostrae protocollo ad ecosystema contulerint. 'Trade to Earn', quisquam? Purificatio Decentralizata ut Nova Fundamenta Solutionis Cum sapientia ex praeterito cyclo acquisita, quaedam structurae defectus in DeFi directe aggredimur dum in eius innovationibus clavis iteramus. Specifice, creatio thesaurorum purgationis decentralizatorum SOFA.org est nostra ambitiosa conatus ad constituenda signa quomodo bona financialia atomice in catena solvenda sint, dum simul DeFi capitalis liquiditatem per Position Tokens transferibiles catalyzing. Per recording relevant instrument details directly on the smart contract, non solum possumus haec bona in catena solvenda, sed etiam protocolum potest creari Position Tokens congruentes ut definitivum digitale testimonium vindicationis. Praeterea, haec Position Tokens possunt pignori dari ad alia DeFi protocol et etiam CeFi platforms ut securum collaterale, multum augens velocitatem capitis per totum ecosystem. Denique, habendo nostra diligenter designata DeFi vaults ut securum, transparentem, et 'neutrum' solutionem in blockchain, eliminavimus curas de custodia bonorum per crypto intermediarios, offerens usoribus plenam tranquillitatem ad focus in reditu ON capitis potius quam reditu OF capitis.

ŸÖŸÜ ÿÆŸÑÿßŸÑ ÿ™ÿ≥ÿ¨ŸäŸÑ ÿ™ŸÅÿßÿµŸäŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿØŸàÿßÿ™ ÿ∞ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿµŸÑÿ© ŸÖÿ®ÿßÿ¥ÿ±ÿ©Ÿã ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿπŸÇÿØ ÿßŸÑÿ∞ŸÉŸäÿå ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜŸÜÿß ŸÑŸäÿ≥ ŸÅŸÇÿ∑ ÿ™ÿ≥ŸàŸäÿ© Ÿáÿ∞Ÿá ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿµŸàŸÑ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ©ÿå ŸàŸÑŸÉŸÜ ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜ ŸÑŸÑÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑ ÿ£Ÿäÿ∂Ÿãÿß ÿ≥ŸÉ ÿ±ŸÖŸàÿ≤ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ±ÿßŸÉÿ≤ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ∑ÿßÿ®ŸÇÿ© ŸÉÿØŸÑŸäŸÑ ÿ±ŸÇŸÖŸä ŸÜŸáÿßÿ¶Ÿä ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ∑ÿßŸÑÿ®ÿ©. ÿπŸÑÿßŸàÿ© ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿ∞ŸÑŸÉÿå ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜ ÿ±ŸáŸÜ Ÿáÿ∞Ÿá ÿßŸÑÿ±ŸÖŸàÿ≤ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ±ÿßŸÉÿ≤ ŸÑÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑÿßÿ™ DeFi ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿÆÿ±Ÿâ Ÿàÿ≠ÿ™Ÿâ ŸÖŸÜÿµÿßÿ™ CeFi ŸÉÿ∂ŸÖÿßŸÜ ÿ¢ŸÖŸÜÿå ŸÖŸÖÿß Ÿäÿπÿ≤ÿ≤ ÿ®ÿ¥ŸÉŸÑ ŸÉÿ®Ÿäÿ± ÿ≥ÿ±ÿπÿ© ÿ±ÿ£ÿ≥ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿßŸÑ ÿπÿ®ÿ± ÿßŸÑŸÜÿ∏ÿßŸÖ ÿßŸÑÿ®Ÿäÿ¶Ÿä ÿ®ÿ£ŸÉŸÖŸÑŸá. ÿ£ÿÆŸäÿ±Ÿãÿßÿå ŸÖŸÜ ÿÆŸÑÿßŸÑ Ÿàÿ¨ŸàÿØ ÿÆÿ≤ÿßÿ¶ŸÜ DeFi ÿßŸÑŸÖÿµŸÖŸÖÿ© ÿ®ÿπŸÜÿßŸäÿ© ŸÉÿÆŸäÿßÿ± ÿ™ÿ≥ŸàŸäÿ© ÿ¢ŸÖŸÜ Ÿàÿ¥ŸÅÿßŸÅ Ÿà'ŸÖÿ≠ÿßŸäÿØ' ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ®ŸÑŸàŸÉÿ¥ŸäŸÜÿå ŸÇŸÖŸÜÿß ÿ®ÿ•ÿ≤ÿßŸÑÿ© ŸÖÿÆÿßŸàŸÅ ÿ≠Ÿäÿßÿ≤ÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿµŸàŸÑ ÿπÿ®ÿ± ÿßŸÑŸàÿ≥ÿ∑ÿßÿ° ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿπŸÖŸÑÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ¥ŸÅÿ±ÿ©ÿå ŸÖŸÖÿß ŸäŸàŸÅÿ± ŸÑŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖŸäŸÜ ÿ±ÿßÿ≠ÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ®ÿßŸÑ ÿßŸÑŸÉÿßŸÖŸÑÿ© ŸÑŸÑÿ™ÿ±ŸÉŸäÿ≤ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿπÿßÿ¶ÿØ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿ±ÿ£ÿ≥ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿßŸÑ ÿ®ÿØŸÑÿßŸã ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿπÿßÿ¶ÿØ ŸÖŸÜ ÿ±ÿ£ÿ≥ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿßŸÑ.

title: üåè Welcome To the SOFA Protocols üåè
body: üåè Welcome To the SOFA Protocols üåè üèóÔ∏è What‚Äôs A Structured Product? In a nutshell, a Structured Product is a hybrid derivative that combines the features of multiple financial products into one. Think of it as a financial smoothie. It blends different financial goodies (like bonds and options) into one tasty package. It offers protection and potential profits based on market conditions. ü§î Why Should You Care? ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Custom Payoffs: Get returns tailored to your preferences. ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Simple Management: One product, no hassle. ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Flexibility: Customize your purchases based on your risk tolerance. ‚ñ∂Ô∏è High Yields: Crypto‚Äôs volatility means potentially higher returns. ‚õìÔ∏è Going On-Chain In the traditional finance world, getting access to structured products is like navigating a maze filled with gatekeepers who care more about making money off you than helping you grow your savings. This process is opaque, expensive, and exclusive to the wealthy. Transparency: No more middlemen; clear pricing for all. Fairness: Accessible to everyone, not just the big players. Ethereum and Beyond: Launching on Ethereum and other blockchains. The SOFA protocols will be launched on Ethereum and other L1 EVM blockchains to start. üîÅ How a Trade Works in the SOFA Protocols 1Ô∏è‚É£ Market Prices: Supporting market makers stream live prices for different products. 2Ô∏è‚É£ User Buys: You pick and buy a product at the shown price. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Lock Assets: Both your assets and the market maker's assets are locked in the Vault. 4Ô∏è‚É£ Tokens Minted: You and the market maker get tokens that represent your positions. 5Ô∏è‚É£ Earnings: For most products, your collateral earns interest. 6Ô∏è‚É£ Claim Payout: After the product expires, you can claim your payout. üõ°Ô∏è Position Token Standards and Product Vaults ERC-1155 Tokens The SOFA protocols will use the ERC-1155 standard to manage multiple token types within one contract. These tokens can be merged or split, and transferred easily, like ERC-20 tokens. They store key details like expiry and prices. Product Vaults SOFA‚Äôs product vaults also use ERC-1155 to support tokens with the same parameters, offering flexibility and efficiency. They can support various product types and collateral, with a distinction on principal risk tolerance.. ü™ô Position Tokens Unlocking Assets Position Tokens make locked assets movable, boosting liquidity in DeFi. Secondary Trading You can trade Position Tokens like regular tokens. Owners of the position tokens will always have final ownership of the assets in the vault. This offers you the flexibility to pledge your locked funds for new opportunities. üè¶ A New Standard for Vault Design The SOFA protocols offer a new way to handle crypto by making transactions clear and safe. It lets you earn based on benefits without worrying about asset safety. All details are recorded transparently on the blockchain, supporting various products. Tokenized positions improve capital efficiency and can be used across DeFi and centralized platforms. Using ERC-1155 tokens saves on costs, and the system is designed to be sustainable and user-friendly. As our inaugural proof-of-concept, we will initially focus on three popular product structures called Rangebound, Bull Trend, and Bear Trend. All of these products are available in either 'Earn' or 'Surge' formats. Moreover, additional product types will be continually added based on user demand and ecosystem feedback. Rangebound Product Overview A Rangebound product helps you make money if an asset, like Bitcoin, stays between two set prices during the observation period. If the price stays within this range, you get an extra profit. You can customize the range: a narrow range means more profit but more risk, while a wider range means less profit but higher chances of winning. If the asset goes outside the range, you still get a guaranteed minimum yield. Trend Product Overview (Bullish/Bearish) A Trend product helps you make money if an asset, like Bitcoin, moves smoothly within a set price range. You set a lower and upper price limit with a certain direction (bullish / bearish). If the asset stays within this range at the end, you get a profit based on where the price falls. This product works for both bullish (price going up) and bearish (price going down) scenarios. It also offers some base protection if the price doesn't move as expected. ‚öñÔ∏è Risk Preference Earn If you don't like risk, choose this protocol. Take comfort with maximum downside protection while your deposit earns a steady interest, while enjoying a bonus profit if the market moves in your favor. What's there not to like? Surge If you like taking risks, this protocol offers higher rewards but with the chance of losing your entire deposit. If the market stays within your chosen range, you earn a lot. If not, you lose your purchase amount. Go big or go home?

title: üåè SOFA ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏóê Ïò§Ïã† Í≤ÉÏùÑ ÌôòÏòÅÌï©ÎãàÎã§ üåè
body: üåè SOFA ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏóê Ïò§Ïã† Í≤ÉÏùÑ ÌôòÏòÅÌï©ÎãàÎã§ üåè üèóÔ∏è Íµ¨Ï°∞Ìôî ÏÉÅÌíàÏù¥ÎûÄ Î¨¥ÏóáÏù∏Í∞ÄÏöî? Í∞ÑÎã®Ìûà ÎßêÌï¥, Íµ¨Ï°∞Ìôî ÏÉÅÌíàÏùÄ Ïó¨Îü¨ Í∏àÏúµ ÏÉÅÌíàÏùò ÌäπÏßïÏùÑ Í≤∞Ìï©Ìïú ÌïòÏù¥Î∏åÎ¶¨Îìú ÌååÏÉùÏÉÅÌíàÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥Î•º Í∏àÏúµ Ïä§Î¨¥ÎîîÎ°ú ÏÉùÍ∞ÅÌï¥ Î≥¥ÏÑ∏Ïöî. Îã§ÏñëÌïú Í∏àÏúµ ÏÉÅÌíà(Ï±ÑÍ∂åÍ≥º ÏòµÏÖò Îì±)ÏùÑ ÌïòÎÇòÏùò ÎßõÏûàÎäî Ìå®ÌÇ§ÏßÄÎ°ú ÌòºÌï©Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ÏãúÏû• ÏÉÅÌô©Ïóê Îî∞Îùº Î≥¥Ìò∏ÏôÄ Ïû†Ïû¨Ï†ÅÏù∏ ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ Ï†úÍ≥µÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ü§î Ïôú Í¥ÄÏã¨ÏùÑ Í∞ÄÏ†∏Ïïº Ìï†ÍπåÏöî? ‚ñ∂Ô∏è ÎßûÏ∂§Ìòï ÏàòÏùµ: Í∑ÄÌïòÏùò ÏÑ†Ìò∏Ïóê ÎßûÏ∂ò ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ ÏñªÏúºÏÑ∏Ïöî. ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Í∞ÑÌé∏Ìïú Í¥ÄÎ¶¨: ÌïòÎÇòÏùò ÏÉÅÌíà, Î≤àÍ±∞Î°úÏõÄ ÏóÜÏùå. ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Ïú†Ïó∞ÏÑ±: ÏúÑÌóò Í∞êÏàò ÏÑ±Ìñ•Ïóê Îî∞Îùº Íµ¨Îß§Î•º ÎßûÏ∂§ ÏÑ§Ï†ïÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî. ‚ñ∂Ô∏è ÎÜíÏùÄ ÏàòÏùµÎ•†: ÏïîÌò∏ÌôîÌèêÏùò Î≥ÄÎèôÏÑ±ÏùÄ Ïû†Ïû¨Ï†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Îçî ÎÜíÏùÄ ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ ÏùòÎØ∏Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ‚õìÔ∏è Ïò®Ï≤¥Ïù∏ÏúºÎ°ú Í∞ÄÍ∏∞ Ï†ÑÌÜµ Í∏àÏúµ ÏÑ∏Í≥ÑÏóêÏÑú Íµ¨Ï°∞Ìôî ÏÉÅÌíàÏóê Ï†ëÍ∑ºÌïòÎäî Í≤ÉÏùÄ ÎãπÏã†Ïùò Ï†ÄÏ∂ïÏùÑ ÏÑ±Ïû•ÏãúÌÇ§Í∏∞Î≥¥Îã§Îäî ÎãπÏã†ÏóêÍ≤åÏÑú ÎèàÏùÑ Î≤åÎ†§Îäî Í≤åÏù¥Ìä∏ÌÇ§ÌçºÎì§Î°ú Í∞ÄÎìù Ï∞¨ ÎØ∏Î°úÎ•º ÌÉêÏÉâÌïòÎäî Í≤ÉÍ≥º Í∞ôÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥ Í≥ºÏ†ïÏùÄ Î∂àÌà¨Î™ÖÌïòÍ≥†, ÎπÑÏã∏Î©∞, Î∂ÄÏú†Ìïú ÏÇ¨ÎûåÎì§ÏóêÍ≤åÎßå ÎèÖÏ†êÏ†ÅÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Ìà¨Î™ÖÏÑ±: Îçî Ïù¥ÏÉÅ Ï§ëÍ∞úÏù∏Ïù¥ ÏóÜÏúºÎ©∞, Î™®Îì† ÏÇ¨ÎûåÏùÑ ÏúÑÌïú Î™ÖÌôïÌïú Í∞ÄÍ≤©. Í≥µÏ†ïÏÑ±: ÎåÄÌòï ÌîåÎ†àÏù¥Ïñ¥ÎøêÎßå ÏïÑÎãàÎùº Î™®Îì† ÏÇ¨ÎûåÏù¥ Ï†ëÍ∑ºÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥ÎçîÎ¶¨ÏõÄ Î∞è Í∑∏ Ïù¥ÏÉÅ: Ïù¥ÎçîÎ¶¨ÏõÄ Î∞è Í∏∞ÌÉÄ Î∏îÎ°ùÏ≤¥Ïù∏ÏóêÏÑú Ï∂úÏãúÎê©ÎãàÎã§. SOFA ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏùÄ Ïù¥ÎçîÎ¶¨ÏõÄ Î∞è Í∏∞ÌÉÄ L1 EVM Î∏îÎ°ùÏ≤¥Ïù∏ÏóêÏÑú ÏãúÏûëÎê† Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. üîÅ SOFA ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏóêÏÑú Í±∞ÎûòÍ∞Ä ÏûëÎèôÌïòÎäî Î∞©Ïãù 1Ô∏è‚É£ ÏãúÏû• Í∞ÄÍ≤©: ÏßÄÏõêÌïòÎäî ÏãúÏû• Ï°∞ÏÑ±ÏûêÍ∞Ä Îã§ÏñëÌïú ÏÉÅÌíàÏóê ÎåÄÌïú Ïã§ÏãúÍ∞Ñ Í∞ÄÍ≤©ÏùÑ Ï†úÍ≥µÌï©ÎãàÎã§. 2Ô∏è‚É£ ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê Íµ¨Îß§: ÌëúÏãúÎêú Í∞ÄÍ≤©ÏúºÎ°ú ÏÉÅÌíàÏùÑ ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌïòÍ≥† Íµ¨Îß§Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. 3Ô∏è‚É£ ÏûêÏÇ∞ Ïû†Í∏à: Í∑ÄÌïòÏùò ÏûêÏÇ∞Í≥º ÏãúÏû• Ï°∞ÏÑ±ÏûêÏùò ÏûêÏÇ∞Ïù¥ Í∏àÍ≥†Ïóê Ïû†ÍπÅÎãàÎã§. 4Ô∏è‚É£ ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ Î∞úÌñâ: Í∑ÄÌïòÏôÄ ÏãúÏû• Ï°∞ÏÑ±ÏûêÎäî Í∑ÄÌïòÏùò Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖòÏùÑ ÎÇòÌÉÄÎÇ¥Îäî ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÏùÑ Î∞õÏäµÎãàÎã§. 5Ô∏è‚É£ ÏàòÏùµ: ÎåÄÎ∂ÄÎ∂ÑÏùò ÏÉÅÌíàÏóê ÎåÄÌï¥ Í∑ÄÌïòÏùò Îã¥Î≥¥Îäî Ïù¥ÏûêÎ•º ÏñªÏäµÎãàÎã§. 6Ô∏è‚É£ Ï≤≠Íµ¨ ÏßÄÍ∏â: Ï†úÌíàÏù¥ ÎßåÎ£åÎêú ÌõÑ, ÏßÄÍ∏âÏùÑ Ï≤≠Íµ¨Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. üõ°Ô∏è Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ ÌëúÏ§Ä Î∞è Ï†úÌíà Í∏àÍ≥† ERC-1155 ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ SOFA ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏùÄ ÌïòÎÇòÏùò Í≥ÑÏïΩ ÎÇ¥ÏóêÏÑú Ïó¨Îü¨ ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ Ïú†ÌòïÏùÑ Í¥ÄÎ¶¨ÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ ERC-1155 ÌëúÏ§ÄÏùÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ìï† Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥ ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÏùÄ ERC-20 ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞Ï≤òÎüº ÏâΩÍ≤å Î≥ëÌï©ÌïòÍ±∞ÎÇò Î∂ÑÌï†ÌïòÍ≥† Ï†ÑÏÜ°Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÎßåÎ£åÏùº Î∞è Í∞ÄÍ≤©Í≥º Í∞ôÏùÄ Ï£ºÏöî ÏÑ∏Î∂Ä Ï†ïÎ≥¥Î•º Ï†ÄÏû•Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. Ï†úÌíà Í∏àÍ≥† SOFAÏùò Ï†úÌíà Í∏àÍ≥†Îäî ÎèôÏùºÌïú Îß§Í∞úÎ≥ÄÏàòÎ•º Í∞ÄÏßÑ ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÏùÑ ÏßÄÏõêÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ ERC-1155Î•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÏó¨ Ïú†Ïó∞ÏÑ±Í≥º Ìö®Ïú®ÏÑ±ÏùÑ Ï†úÍ≥µÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Îã§ÏñëÌïú Ï†úÌíà Ïú†ÌòïÍ≥º Îã¥Î≥¥Î•º ÏßÄÏõêÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏúºÎ©∞, ÏõêÍ∏à ÏúÑÌóò Í∞êÎÇ¥ÎèÑÏóê Îî∞Îùº Íµ¨Î∂ÑÎê©ÎãàÎã§. ü™ô Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ ÏûêÏÇ∞ Ïû†Í∏à Ìï¥Ï†ú Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÏùÄ Ïû†Í∏¥ ÏûêÏÇ∞ÏùÑ Ïù¥Îèô Í∞ÄÎä•ÌïòÍ≤å ÌïòÏó¨ DeFiÏùò Ïú†ÎèôÏÑ±ÏùÑ ÎÜíÏûÖÎãàÎã§. 2Ï∞® Í±∞Îûò Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÏùÄ ÏùºÎ∞ò ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞Ï≤òÎüº Í±∞ÎûòÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞Ïùò ÏÜåÏú†ÏûêÎäî Ìï≠ÏÉÅ Í∏àÍ≥† ÎÇ¥ ÏûêÏÇ∞Ïùò ÏµúÏ¢Ö ÏÜåÏú†Í∂åÏùÑ Í∞ÄÏßëÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥Îäî Ïû†Í∏¥ ÏûêÍ∏àÏùÑ ÏÉàÎ°úÏö¥ Í∏∞ÌöåÏóê Îã¥Î≥¥Î°ú Ï†úÍ≥µÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÎäî Ïú†Ïó∞ÏÑ±ÏùÑ Ï†úÍ≥µÌï©ÎãàÎã§. üè¶ Í∏àÍ≥† ÏÑ§Í≥ÑÎ•º ÏúÑÌïú ÏÉàÎ°úÏö¥ ÌëúÏ§Ä SOFA ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏùÄ Í±∞ÎûòÎ•º Î™ÖÌôïÌïòÍ≥† ÏïàÏ†ÑÌïòÍ≤å Ï≤òÎ¶¨ÌïòÎäî ÏÉàÎ°úÏö¥ Î∞©Î≤ïÏùÑ Ï†úÍ≥µÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ÏûêÏÇ∞ ÏïàÏ†ÑÏóê ÎåÄÌïú Í±±Ï†ï ÏóÜÏù¥ ÌòúÌÉùÏóê Îî∞Îùº ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ ÏñªÏùÑ Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Î™®Îì† ÏÑ∏Î∂Ä ÏÇ¨Ìï≠ÏùÄ Î∏îÎ°ùÏ≤¥Ïù∏Ïóê Ìà¨Î™ÖÌïòÍ≤å Í∏∞Î°ùÎêòÏñ¥ Îã§ÏñëÌïú Ï†úÌíàÏùÑ ÏßÄÏõêÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÌôîÎêú Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖòÏùÄ ÏûêÎ≥∏ Ìö®Ïú®ÏÑ±ÏùÑ Í∞úÏÑ†ÌïòÍ≥† DeFi Î∞è Ï§ëÏïô ÏßëÏ§ëÏãù ÌîåÎû´ÌèºÏóêÏÑú ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ERC-1155 ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÏùÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÎ©¥ ÎπÑÏö©ÏùÑ Ï†àÍ∞êÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏúºÎ©∞, ÏãúÏä§ÌÖúÏùÄ ÏßÄÏÜç Í∞ÄÎä•ÌïòÍ≥† ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê ÏπúÌôîÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú ÏÑ§Í≥ÑÎêòÏóàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò Ï≤´ Î≤àÏß∏ Í∞úÎÖê Ï¶ùÎ™ÖÏúºÎ°ú, Ïö∞Î¶¨Îäî Ï≤òÏùåÏóê Rangebound, Bull Trend Î∞è Bear TrendÎùºÎäî ÏÑ∏ Í∞ÄÏßÄ Ïù∏Í∏∞ ÏûàÎäî Ï†úÌíà Íµ¨Ï°∞Ïóê ÏßëÏ§ëÌï† Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥ Î™®Îì† Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ 'Earn' ÎòêÎäî 'Surge' ÌòïÏãùÏúºÎ°ú Ï†úÍ≥µÎê©ÎãàÎã§. ÎòêÌïú, ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê ÏàòÏöî Î∞è ÏÉùÌÉúÍ≥Ñ ÌîºÎìúÎ∞±Ïóê Îî∞Îùº Ï∂îÍ∞Ä Ï†úÌíà Ïú†ÌòïÏù¥ ÏßÄÏÜçÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÎê† Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Rangebound Ï†úÌíà Í∞úÏöî Rangebound Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ ÏûêÏÇ∞, ÏòàÎ•º Îì§Ïñ¥ ÎπÑÌä∏ÏΩîÏù∏Ïù¥ Í¥ÄÏ∞∞ Í∏∞Í∞Ñ ÎèôÏïà Îëê Í∞úÏùò ÏÑ§Ï†ïÎêú Í∞ÄÍ≤© ÏÇ¨Ïù¥Ïóê Î®∏Î¨º Í≤ΩÏö∞ ÎèàÏùÑ Î≤å Ïàò ÏûàÎèÑÎ°ù ÎèÑÏôÄÏ§çÎãàÎã§. Í∞ÄÍ≤©Ïù¥ Ïù¥ Î≤îÏúÑ ÎÇ¥Ïóê Î®∏Î¨ºÎ©¥ Ï∂îÍ∞Ä ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ ÏñªÏäµÎãàÎã§. Î≤îÏúÑÎ•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê Ï†ïÏùòÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§: Ï¢ÅÏùÄ Î≤îÏúÑÎäî Îçî ÎßéÏùÄ ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ ÏùòÎØ∏ÌïòÏßÄÎßå Îçî ÎßéÏùÄ ÏúÑÌóòÏùÑ ÎèôÎ∞òÌïòÎ©∞, ÎÑìÏùÄ Î≤îÏúÑÎäî Îçî Ï†ÅÏùÄ ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ ÏùòÎØ∏ÌïòÏßÄÎßå ÏäπÎ¶¨Ìï† ÌôïÎ•†Ïù¥ ÎÜíÏïÑÏßëÎãàÎã§. ÏûêÏÇ∞Ïù¥ Î≤îÏúÑÎ•º Î≤óÏñ¥ÎÇòÎ©¥ Ïó¨Ï†ÑÌûà Î≥¥Ïû•Îêú ÏµúÏÜå ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ ÏñªÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ìä∏Î†åÎìú Ï†úÌíà Í∞úÏöî (Í∞ïÏÑ∏/ÏïΩÏÑ∏) Ìä∏Î†åÎìú Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ ÏûêÏÇ∞, ÏòàÎ•º Îì§Ïñ¥ ÎπÑÌä∏ÏΩîÏù∏Ïù¥ ÏÑ§Ï†ïÎêú Í∞ÄÍ≤© Î≤îÏúÑ ÎÇ¥ÏóêÏÑú Î∂ÄÎìúÎüΩÍ≤å ÏõÄÏßÅÏùº Í≤ΩÏö∞ ÎèàÏùÑ Î≤å Ïàò ÏûàÎèÑÎ°ù ÎèÑÏôÄÏ§çÎãàÎã§. ÌäπÏ†ï Î∞©Ìñ•(Í∞ïÏÑ∏/ÏïΩÏÑ∏)ÏúºÎ°ú ÌïòÌïú Î∞è ÏÉÅÌïú Í∞ÄÍ≤© ÌïúÍ≥ÑÎ•º ÏÑ§Ï†ïÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ÏûêÏÇ∞Ïù¥ Ïù¥ Î≤îÏúÑ ÎÇ¥Ïóê Î®∏Î¨ºÎ©¥ Í∞ÄÍ≤©Ïù¥ Îñ®Ïñ¥ÏßÑ ÏúÑÏπòÏóê Îî∞Îùº ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ ÏñªÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥ Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ Í∞ïÏÑ∏(Í∞ÄÍ≤© ÏÉÅÏäπ) Î∞è ÏïΩÏÑ∏(Í∞ÄÍ≤© ÌïòÎùΩ) ÏãúÎÇòÎ¶¨Ïò§ Î™®ÎëêÏóê Ï†ÅÏö©Îê©ÎãàÎã§. Í∞ÄÍ≤©Ïù¥ ÏòàÏÉÅÎåÄÎ°ú ÏõÄÏßÅÏù¥ÏßÄ ÏïäÏùÑ Í≤ΩÏö∞ ÏùºÎ∂Ä Í∏∞Î≥∏ Î≥¥Ìò∏ÎèÑ Ï†úÍ≥µÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ‚öñÔ∏è ÏúÑÌóò ÏÑ†Ìò∏ÎèÑ Earn ÏúÑÌóòÏùÑ Ïã´Ïñ¥ÌïúÎã§Î©¥ Ïù¥ ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏùÑ ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî. ÏµúÎåÄ ÌïòÎùΩ Î≥¥Ìò∏Î°ú ÏïàÏã¨ÌïòÎ©¥ÏÑú ÏòàÏπòÍ∏àÏù¥ Íæ∏Ï§ÄÌïú Ïù¥ÏûêÎ•º ÏñªÍ≥†, ÏãúÏû•Ïù¥ ÎãπÏã†ÏóêÍ≤å Ïú†Î¶¨ÌïòÍ≤å ÏõÄÏßÅÏùº Í≤ΩÏö∞ Î≥¥ÎÑàÏä§ Ïù¥ÏùµÏùÑ ÎàÑÎ¶¥ Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Î¨¥ÏóáÏù¥ ÎßàÏùåÏóê Îì§ÏßÄ ÏïäÎÇòÏöî? ÏÑúÏßÄ ÏúÑÌóòÏùÑ Í∞êÏàòÌïòÎäî Í≤ÉÏùÑ Ï¢ãÏïÑÌïúÎã§Î©¥, Ïù¥ ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏùÄ Îçî ÎÜíÏùÄ Î≥¥ÏÉÅÏùÑ Ï†úÍ≥µÌïòÏßÄÎßå Ï†ÑÏ≤¥ ÏòàÏπòÍ∏àÏùÑ ÏûÉÏùÑ Í∞ÄÎä•ÏÑ±ÎèÑ ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÏãúÏû•Ïù¥ ÎãπÏã†Ïù¥ ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌïú Î≤îÏúÑ ÎÇ¥Ïóê Î®∏Î¨¥Î•¥Î©¥ ÎßéÏùÄ ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ ÏñªÏäµÎãàÎã§. Í∑∏Î†áÏßÄ ÏïäÏúºÎ©¥ Íµ¨Îß§ Í∏àÏï°ÏùÑ ÏûÉÍ≤å Îê©ÎãàÎã§. ÌÅ¨Í≤å Ìà¨ÏûêÌïòÍ±∞ÎÇò ÏßëÏúºÎ°ú ÎèåÏïÑÍ∞ÄÏÑ∏Ïöî?

title: üåè Ê¨¢ËøéÊù•Âà∞ SOFA ÂçèËÆÆ üåè
body: üåè Ê¨¢ËøéÊù•Âà∞ SOFA ÂçèËÆÆ üåè üèóÔ∏è ‰ªÄ‰πàÊòØÁªìÊûÑÊÄß‰∫ßÂìÅÔºü ÁÆÄËÄåË®Ä‰πãÔºåÁªìÊûÑÊÄß‰∫ßÂìÅÊòØ‰∏ÄÁßçÊ∑∑ÂêàË°çÁîüÂìÅÔºåÂ∞ÜÂ§öÁßçÈáëËûç‰∫ßÂìÅÁöÑÁâπÊÄßÁªìÂêàÂà∞‰∏Ä‰∏™‰∫ßÂìÅ‰∏≠„ÄÇ ÂèØ‰ª•ÊääÂÆÉÊÉ≥Ë±°Êàê‰∏ÄÊùØÈáëËûçÂ•∂Êòî„ÄÇÂÆÉÂ∞Ü‰∏çÂêåÁöÑÈáëËûç‰∫ßÂìÅÔºàÂ¶ÇÂÄ∫Âà∏ÂíåÊúüÊùÉÔºâÊ∑∑ÂêàÊàê‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁæéÂë≥ÁöÑÁªÑÂêà„ÄÇÊ†πÊçÆÂ∏ÇÂú∫Êù°‰ª∂ÔºåÂÆÉÊèê‰æõ‰øùÊä§ÂíåÊΩúÂú®Âà©Ê∂¶„ÄÇ ü§î body: üåè Bienvenue dans les Protocoles SOFA üåè üèóÔ∏è Qu'est-ce qu'un Produit Structur√© ? En r√©sum√©, un Produit Structur√© est un d√©riv√© hybride qui combine les caract√©ristiques de plusieurs produits financiers en un seul. Pensez-y comme √† un smoothie financier. Il m√©lange diff√©rentes bonnes choses financi√®res (comme des obligations et des options) en un seul paquet savoureux. Il offre une protection et des profits potentiels en fonction des conditions du march√©. ü§î Pourquoi devriez-vous vous en soucier ? ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Remboursements Personnalis√©s : Obtenez des rendements adapt√©s √† vos pr√©f√©rences. ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Gestion Simple : Un produit, pas de tracas. ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Flexibilit√© : Personnalisez vos achats en fonction de votre tol√©rance au risque. ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Rendements √âlev√©s : La volatilit√© des cryptomonnaies signifie des rendements potentiellement plus √©lev√©s. ‚õìÔ∏è Passage On-Chain Dans le monde de la finance traditionnelle, acc√©der √† des produits structur√©s est comme naviguer dans un labyrinthe rempli de gardiens qui se soucient plus de gagner de l'argent sur vous que de vous aider √† faire cro√Ætre vos √©conomies. Ce processus est opaque, co√ªteux et exclusif aux riches. Transparence : Plus d'interm√©diaires ; des prix clairs pour tous. √âquit√© : Accessible √† tous, pas seulement aux grands acteurs. Ethereum et au-del√† : Lancement sur Ethereum et d'autres blockchains. Les protocoles SOFA seront lanc√©s sur Ethereum et d'autres blockchains L1 EVM pour commencer. üîÅ Comment fonctionne un Trade dans les Protocoles SOFA 1Ô∏è‚É£ Prix du March√© : Les teneurs de march√© soutiennent des prix en direct pour diff√©rents produits. 2Ô∏è‚É£ Achat de l'Utilisateur : Vous choisissez et achetez un produit au prix affich√©. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Verrouillage des Actifs : Vos actifs et ceux du teneur de march√© sont verrouill√©s dans le Coffre. 4Ô∏è‚É£ Tokens √âmis : Vous et le teneur de march√© recevez des tokens qui repr√©sentent vos positions. 5Ô∏è‚É£ Gains : Pour la plupart des produits, votre garantie g√©n√®re des int√©r√™ts. 6Ô∏è‚É£ Paiement de R√©clamation : Apr√®s l'expiration du produit, vous pouvez r√©clamer votre paiement. üõ°Ô∏è Normes de Token de Position et Coffres de Produit Tokens ERC-1155 Les protocoles SOFA utiliseront la norme ERC-1155 pour g√©rer plusieurs types de tokens au sein d'un m√™me contrat. Ces tokens peuvent √™tre fusionn√©s ou divis√©s, et transf√©r√©s facilement, comme les tokens ERC-20. Ils stockent des d√©tails cl√©s tels que l'expiration et les prix. Coffres de Produit Les coffres de produit de SOFA utilisent √©galement l'ERC-1155 pour soutenir des tokens avec les m√™mes param√®tres, offrant flexibilit√© et efficacit√©. Ils peuvent soutenir divers types de produits et de garanties, avec une distinction sur la tol√©rance au risque principal. ü™ô Tokens de Position D√©verrouillage des Actifs Les Tokens de Position rendent les actifs bloqu√©s mobiles, augmentant la liquidit√© dans la DeFi. Trading Secondaire Vous pouvez √©changer des Tokens de Position comme des tokens r√©guliers. Les propri√©taires des tokens de position auront toujours la propri√©t√© finale des actifs dans le coffre. Cela vous offre la flexibilit√© de mettre en gage vos fonds bloqu√©s pour de nouvelles opportunit√©s. üè¶ Une Nouvelle Norme pour la Conception de Coffres Les protocoles SOFA offrent une nouvelle fa√ßon de g√©rer la crypto en rendant les transactions claires et s√ªres. Cela vous permet de gagner en fonction des avantages sans vous soucier de la s√©curit√© des actifs. Tous les d√©tails sont enregistr√©s de mani√®re transparente sur la blockchain, soutenant divers produits. Les positions tokenis√©es am√©liorent l'efficacit√© du capital et peuvent √™tre utilis√©es √† travers la DeFi et les plateformes centralis√©es. L'utilisation de tokens ERC-1155 permet d'√©conomiser sur les co√ªts, et le syst√®me est con√ßu pour √™tre durable et convivial. En tant que preuve de concept inaugurale, nous nous concentrerons initialement sur trois structures de produits populaires appel√©es Rangebound, Bull Trend et Bear Trend. Tous ces produits sont disponibles en formats 'Earn' ou 'Surge'. De plus, d'autres types de produits seront continuellement ajout√©s en fonction de la demande des utilisateurs et des retours de l'√©cosyst√®me. Aper√ßu du Produit Rangebound Un produit Rangebound vous aide √† gagner de l'argent si un actif, comme le Bitcoin, reste entre deux prix fix√©s pendant la p√©riode d'observation. Si le prix reste dans cette fourchette, vous obtenez un profit suppl√©mentaire. Vous pouvez personnaliser la fourchette : une fourchette √©troite signifie plus de profit mais plus de risque, tandis qu'une fourchette plus large signifie moins de profit mais de meilleures chances de gagner. Si l'actif sort de la fourchette, vous obtenez tout de m√™me un rendement minimum garanti. Aper√ßu du Produit de Tendance (Haussier/Baissier) Un produit de tendance vous aide √† gagner de l'argent si un actif, comme le Bitcoin, se d√©place en douceur dans une fourchette de prix fix√©e. Vous d√©finissez une limite de prix inf√©rieure et sup√©rieure avec une certaine direction (haussi√®re / baissi√®re). Si l'actif reste dans cette fourchette √† la fin, vous obtenez un profit bas√© sur l'endroit o√π le prix se situe. Ce produit fonctionne pour des sc√©narios haussiers (prix en hausse) et baissiers (prix en baisse). Il offre √©galement une certaine protection de base si le prix ne bouge pas comme pr√©vu. ‚öñÔ∏è Pr√©f√©rence de Risque Gagner Si vous n'aimez pas le risque, choisissez ce protocole. Prenez du confort avec une protection maximale contre les pertes pendant que votre d√©p√¥t g√©n√®re un int√©r√™t r√©gulier, tout en profitant d'un bonus si le march√© √©volue en votre faveur. Qu'est-ce qu'il y a √† ne pas aimer ? Surge Si vous aimez prendre des risques, ce protocole offre des r√©compenses plus √©lev√©es mais avec la possibilit√© de perdre l'int√©gralit√© de votre d√©p√¥t. Si le march√© reste dans la fourchette que vous avez choisie, vous gagnez beaucoup. Sinon, vous perdez le montant de votre achat. Allez grand ou rentrez chez vous ?

body: üåè Salve Ad Protocolos SOFA üåè üèóÔ∏è Quid Est Productum Structum? In summa, Productum Structum est derivativum hybridum quod lineamenta plurium productorum financialium in unum coniungit. Cogita de eo ut de smoothie financiali. Varias res financiales (sicut obligationes et optiones) in unum sapidum fasciculum miscet. Praebet tutela et potentia lucri secundum condiciones mercatus. ü§î Cur Te Interest? ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Compensatio Customizata: Accipe reditus ad tuas praeferentias adaptatos. ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Simple Administratio: Unum productum, nulla difficultas. ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Flexibilitas: Emptiones tuas secundum tolerantiam periculi personalem customize. ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Alta Lucrativa: Volatilitas crypto significat reditus potentia altiores. ‚õìÔ∏è In Catena Procedens In mundo traditionali financiarum, accessus ad producta structa est sicut labyrinthum navigare plenum custodiae qui magis de pecunia tua lucrari quam de auxilio tuis pecuniis crescere curant. Hic processus est opacus, carus, et exclusivus divitibus. Transparens: Nulli intermedii; pretium clarum pro omnibus. Aequitas: Accessibile omnibus, non solum magnis luditoribus. Ethereum et Ultra: In Ethereum et aliis blockchainibus launch. Protocolos SOFA in Ethereum et aliis blockchainibus L1 EVM ad initium launchabuntur. üîÅ Quomodo Negotium Operatur in Protocolis SOFA 1Ô∏è‚É£ Pretium Mercatus: Sustentantes creatores mercatus pretia viva pro diversis productis praebent. 2Ô∏è‚É£ Emptio Usoris: Tu productum eligis et emeris ad pretio ostensum. 3Ô∏è‚É£ Res Clauduntur: Tam tuae res quam res creatoris mercatus in Vault clauduntur. 4Ô∏è‚É£ Monetae Faciuntur: Tu et creator mercatus monetas accipitis quae tuae positiones repraesentant. 5Ô∏è‚É£ Lucrum: Pro plerisque productis, tua collateralis usuram meretur. 6Ô∏è‚É£ Reclamatio Solvendi: Postquam productum exspirat, potes reclamare tuam solutionem. üõ°Ô∏è Signa Token Positionis et Thesauri Productorum Tokens ERC-1155 Protocollo SOFA signum ERC-1155 adhibebit ad administrandum plures typorum token in uno contractu. Hi tokens coniungi vel dividi possunt, et facile transferuntur, sicut tokens ERC-20. Illi claves notitias ut expirationem et pretia servant. Thesauri Productorum Thesauri productorum SOFA etiam signum ERC-1155 adhibent ad sustinendum tokens cum eadem parametris, offerens flexibilitatem et efficientiam. Possunt sustinere varios typorum productorum et collateralia, cum distinctione in toleratione principalis periculi. ü™ô Tokens Positionis Res Unlocking Tokens Positionis res clausas mobilia faciunt, augendo liquiditatem in DeFi. Mercatura Secundaria Potes mercari Tokens Positionis sicut tokens ordinarios. Domini token positionum semper habebunt ultimam proprietatem rerum in thesauro. Hoc tibi flexibilitatem praebet ut pignus tuorum fundorum clausorum pro novis opportunitatibus. üè¶ Novum Signum pro Designatione Thesauri Protocollo SOFA novam viam ad tractandum crypto offert per transactiones claras et tutas. Permittit tibi lucrari ex beneficiis sine sollicitudine de securitate rerum. Omnes notitiae in blockchain transparenter recordantur, sustinendo varios productos. Positiones tokenizatae efficientiam capitis emendare possunt et in DeFi et in centralibus suggestis adhiberi possunt. Usus tokens ERC-1155 sumptus servat, et systema ad sustinendum et usui amicum designatum est. Ut nostra prima probatio conceptus, initio in tribus structuris productorum popularibus, quae vocantur Rangebound, Bull Trend, et Bear Trend, incumbemus. Omnia haec producta in formatibus 'Earn' vel 'Surge' praesto sunt. Praeterea, plura genera productorum continue addentur secundum postulationem usorum et responsionem ecosystematis. Rangebound Product Overview Productum Rangebound adiuvat te lucrari si res, sicut Bitcoin, inter duo pretia constituta durante observatione manet. Si pretium intra hanc ambitum manet, lucrum additum accipis. Potes ambitum personalizare: ambitus angustus plus lucri significat sed plus periculi, dum ambitus latior minus lucri significat sed maiores casus vincendi. Si res extra ambitum exit, adhuc minimum reditum certum accipis. Trend Product Overview (Bullish/Bearish) Productum Trend adiuvat te lucrari si res, sicut Bitcoin, leniter intra constitutum pretium ambitum movetur. Limitem pretium inferiorem et superiorem cum certa directione (bullish / bearish) statuis. Si res intra hanc ambitum ad finem manet, lucrum accipis secundum ubi pretium cadit. Hoc productum operatur tam pro bullish (pretium ascendens) quam pro bearish (pretium descendens) scaenarum. Etiam aliquod praesidium fundamentale praebet si pretium non movetur ut expectatum. ‚öñÔ∏è Praeferentia Periculi Earn If non vis pericula, elige hunc protocolum. Confortare cum maxima protectione ad infimum dum tua depositio stabiliter lucrum facit, dum fruens bono lucro si mercatus in tua favorem movetur. Quid est quod non placet? Surge Si pericula capere placet, hic protocolus altiora praemia offert sed cum occasione totius depositionis amittendi. Si mercatus intra electum spatium manet, multum lucraris. Sin minus, amittis quantitatem emptionis tuae. Magna age aut domum redi?

title: üåè ŸÖÿ±ÿ≠ÿ®Ÿãÿß ÿ®ŸÉŸÖ ŸÅŸä ÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑÿßÿ™ SOFA üåè
body: üåè ŸÖÿ±ÿ≠ÿ®Ÿãÿß ÿ®ŸÉ ŸÅŸä ÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑÿßÿ™ SOFA üåè üèóÔ∏è ŸÖÿß ŸáŸà ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ ÿßŸÑŸáŸäŸÉŸÑŸäÿü ÿ®ÿßÿÆÿ™ÿµÿßÿ±ÿå ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ ÿßŸÑŸáŸäŸÉŸÑŸä ŸáŸà ŸÖÿ¥ÿ™ŸÇ Ÿáÿ¨ŸäŸÜ Ÿäÿ¨ŸÖÿπ ÿ®ŸäŸÜ ŸÖŸäÿ≤ÿßÿ™ ÿπÿØÿ© ŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ÿßÿ™ ŸÖÿßŸÑŸäÿ© ŸÅŸä ŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ Ÿàÿßÿ≠ÿØ. ÿßÿπÿ™ÿ®ÿ±Ÿá ŸÉÿπÿµŸäÿ± ŸÖÿßŸÑŸä. ŸäŸÖÿ≤ÿ¨ ÿ®ŸäŸÜ ŸÖÿÆÿ™ŸÑŸÅ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÉŸàŸÜÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿßŸÑŸäÿ© (ŸÖÿ´ŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸÜÿØÿßÿ™ ŸàÿßŸÑÿÆŸäÿßÿ±ÿßÿ™) ŸÅŸä ÿ≠ÿ≤ŸÖÿ© ŸÑÿ∞Ÿäÿ∞ÿ© Ÿàÿßÿ≠ÿØÿ©. ŸäŸàŸÅÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ≠ŸÖÿßŸäÿ© ŸàÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ±ÿ®ÿßÿ≠ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≠ÿ™ŸÖŸÑÿ© ÿ®ŸÜÿßÿ°Ÿã ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿ∏ÿ±ŸàŸÅ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸàŸÇ. ü§î ŸÑŸÖÿßÿ∞ÿß Ÿäÿ¨ÿ® ÿ£ŸÜ ÿ™Ÿáÿ™ŸÖÿü ‚ñ∂Ô∏è ÿπŸàÿßÿ¶ÿØ ŸÖÿÆÿµÿµÿ©: ÿßÿ≠ÿµŸÑ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿπŸàÿßÿ¶ÿØ ŸÖÿµŸÖŸÖÿ© ŸàŸÅŸÇŸãÿß ŸÑÿ™ŸÅÿ∂ŸäŸÑÿßÿ™ŸÉ. ‚ñ∂Ô∏è ÿ•ÿØÿßÿ±ÿ© ÿ®ÿ≥Ÿäÿ∑ÿ©: ŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ Ÿàÿßÿ≠ÿØÿå ÿ®ÿØŸàŸÜ ŸÖÿ™ÿßÿπÿ®. ‚ñ∂Ô∏è ŸÖÿ±ŸàŸÜÿ©: ÿÆÿµÿµ ŸÖÿ¥ÿ™ÿ±Ÿäÿßÿ™ŸÉ ÿ®ŸÜÿßÿ°Ÿã ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿ™ÿ≠ŸÖŸÑŸÉ ŸÑŸÑŸÖÿÆÿßÿ∑ÿ±. ‚ñ∂Ô∏è ÿπŸàÿßÿ¶ÿØ ŸÖÿ±ÿ™ŸÅÿπÿ©: ÿ™ŸÇŸÑÿ®ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿπŸÖŸÑÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ¥ŸÅÿ±ÿ© ÿ™ÿπŸÜŸä ÿπŸàÿßÿ¶ÿØ ŸÖÿ≠ÿ™ŸÖŸÑÿ© ÿ£ÿπŸÑŸâ. ‚õìÔ∏è ÿßŸÑÿßŸÜÿ™ŸÇÿßŸÑ ÿ•ŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ© ŸÅŸä ÿπÿßŸÑŸÖ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿßŸÑŸäÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ™ŸÇŸÑŸäÿØŸäÿ©ÿå ÿßŸÑÿ≠ÿµŸàŸÑ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑŸàÿµŸàŸÑ ÿ•ŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸáŸäŸÉŸÑŸäÿ© Ÿäÿ¥ÿ®Ÿá ÿßŸÑÿ™ŸÜŸÇŸÑ ŸÅŸä ŸÖÿ™ÿßŸáÿ© ŸÖŸÑŸäÿ¶ÿ© ÿ®ÿ≠ÿ±ÿßÿ≥ ÿßŸÑÿ®Ÿàÿßÿ®ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ∞ŸäŸÜ ŸäŸáÿ™ŸÖŸàŸÜ ÿ£ŸÉÿ´ÿ± ÿ®ŸÉÿ≥ÿ® ÿßŸÑŸÖÿßŸÑ ŸÖŸÜŸÉ ÿ®ÿØŸÑÿßŸã ŸÖŸÜ ŸÖÿ≥ÿßÿπÿØÿ™ŸÉ ŸÅŸä ÿ™ŸÜŸÖŸäÿ© ŸÖÿØÿÆÿ±ÿßÿ™ŸÉ. Ÿáÿ∞Ÿá ÿßŸÑÿπŸÖŸÑŸäÿ© ÿ∫Ÿäÿ± ÿ¥ŸÅÿßŸÅÿ©ÿå ŸÖŸÉŸÑŸÅÿ©ÿå Ÿàÿ≠ÿµÿ±Ÿäÿ© ŸÑŸÑÿ£ÿ´ÿ±Ÿäÿßÿ°. ÿßŸÑÿ¥ŸÅÿßŸÅŸäÿ©: ŸÑÿß ŸÖÿ≤ŸäÿØ ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸàÿ≥ÿ∑ÿßÿ°ÿõ ÿ™ÿ≥ÿπŸäÿ± Ÿàÿßÿ∂ÿ≠ ŸÑŸÑÿ¨ŸÖŸäÿπ. ÿßŸÑÿπÿØÿßŸÑÿ©: ŸÖÿ™ÿßÿ≠ÿ© ŸÑŸÑÿ¨ŸÖŸäÿπÿå ŸàŸÑŸäÿ≥ ŸÅŸÇÿ∑ ŸÑŸÑÿßÿπÿ®ŸäŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÉÿ®ÿßÿ±. ÿßŸÑÿ•Ÿäÿ´Ÿäÿ±ŸäŸàŸÖ ŸàŸÖÿß ÿ®ÿπÿØŸáÿß: ÿßŸÑÿ•ÿ∑ŸÑÿßŸÇ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ•Ÿäÿ´Ÿäÿ±ŸäŸàŸÖ Ÿàÿ®ŸÑŸàŸÉÿ¥ŸäŸÜ ÿ£ÿÆÿ±Ÿâ. ÿ≥Ÿäÿ™ŸÖ ÿ•ÿ∑ŸÑÿßŸÇ ÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑÿßÿ™ SOFA ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ•Ÿäÿ´Ÿäÿ±ŸäŸàŸÖ Ÿàÿ®ŸÑŸàŸÉÿ¥ŸäŸÜÿßÿ™ L1 EVM ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿÆÿ±Ÿâ ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿ®ÿØÿßŸäÿ©. üîÅ ŸÉŸäŸÅ ÿ™ÿπŸÖŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ¨ÿßÿ±ÿ© ŸÅŸä ÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑÿßÿ™ SOFA 1Ô∏è‚É£ ÿ£ÿ≥ÿπÿßÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸàŸÇ: ŸäÿØÿπŸÖ ÿµŸÜÿßÿπ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸàŸÇ ÿ£ÿ≥ÿπÿßÿ±Ÿãÿß ŸÖÿ®ÿßÿ¥ÿ±ÿ© ŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ÿßÿ™ ŸÖÿÆÿ™ŸÑŸÅÿ©. 2Ô∏è‚É£ ÿ¥ÿ±ÿßÿ° ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖ: ÿ™ÿÆÿ™ÿßÿ± Ÿàÿ™ÿ¥ÿ™ÿ±Ÿä ŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨Ÿãÿß ÿ®ÿßŸÑÿ≥ÿπÿ± ÿßŸÑŸÖÿπÿ±Ÿàÿ∂. 3Ô∏è‚É£ ÿ™ÿ£ŸÖŸäŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿµŸàŸÑ: Ÿäÿ™ŸÖ ÿ™ÿ£ŸÖŸäŸÜ ÿ£ÿµŸàŸÑŸÉ Ÿàÿ£ÿµŸàŸÑ ÿµÿßŸÜÿπ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸàŸÇ ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿÆÿ≤ŸÜÿ©. 4Ô∏è‚É£ ÿ≥ŸÉ ÿßŸÑÿ±ŸÖŸàÿ≤: ÿ™ÿ≠ÿµŸÑ ÿ£ŸÜÿ™ ŸàÿµÿßŸÜÿπ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸàŸÇ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿ±ŸÖŸàÿ≤ ÿ™ŸÖÿ´ŸÑ ŸÖÿ±ÿßŸÉÿ≤ŸÉŸÖ. 5Ô∏è‚É£ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ±ÿ®ÿßÿ≠: ÿ®ÿßŸÑŸÜÿ≥ÿ®ÿ© ŸÑŸÖÿπÿ∏ŸÖ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ÿßÿ™ÿå ÿ™ŸÉÿ≥ÿ® ÿ∂ŸÖÿßŸÜÿßÿ™ŸÉ ŸÅÿßÿ¶ÿØÿ©. 6Ô∏è‚É£ ÿ≥ÿ≠ÿ® ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿπŸàŸäÿ∂: ÿ®ÿπÿØ ÿßŸÜÿ™Ÿáÿßÿ° ÿµŸÑÿßÿ≠Ÿäÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ÿå ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜŸÉ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ∑ÿßŸÑÿ®ÿ© ÿ®ÿ™ÿπŸàŸäÿ∂ŸÉ. üõ°Ô∏è ŸÖÿπÿßŸäŸäÿ± ÿ±ŸÖŸàÿ≤ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ±ÿßŸÉÿ≤ ŸàÿÆÿ≤ÿßÿ¶ŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ÿßÿ™ ÿ±ŸÖŸàÿ≤ ERC-1155 ÿ≥ÿ™ÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖ ÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑÿßÿ™ SOFA ŸÖÿπŸäÿßÿ± ERC-1155 ŸÑÿ•ÿØÿßÿ±ÿ© ÿ£ŸÜŸàÿßÿπ ŸÖÿ™ÿπÿØÿØÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ±ŸÖŸàÿ≤ ÿ∂ŸÖŸÜ ÿπŸÇÿØ Ÿàÿßÿ≠ÿØ. ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜ ÿØŸÖÿ¨ Ÿáÿ∞Ÿá ÿßŸÑÿ±ŸÖŸàÿ≤ ÿ£Ÿà ÿ™ŸÇÿ≥ŸäŸÖŸáÿßÿå ŸàŸÜŸÇŸÑŸáÿß ÿ®ÿ≥ŸáŸàŸÑÿ©ÿå ŸÖÿ´ŸÑ ÿ±ŸÖŸàÿ≤ ERC-20. ÿ•ŸÜŸáÿß ÿ™ÿÆÿ≤ŸÜ ÿ™ŸÅÿßÿµŸäŸÑ ÿ±ÿ¶Ÿäÿ≥Ÿäÿ© ŸÖÿ´ŸÑ ÿ™ÿßÿ±ŸäÿÆ ÿßŸÑÿßŸÜÿ™Ÿáÿßÿ° ŸàÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ≥ÿπÿßÿ±. ÿÆÿ≤ÿßÿ¶ŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ÿßÿ™ ÿ™ÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖ ÿÆÿ≤ÿßÿ¶ŸÜ ŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ÿßÿ™ SOFA ÿ£Ÿäÿ∂Ÿãÿß ERC-1155 ŸÑÿØÿπŸÖ ÿßŸÑÿ±ŸÖŸàÿ≤ ÿ∞ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿπŸÑŸÖÿßÿ™ ŸÜŸÅÿ≥Ÿáÿßÿå ŸÖŸÖÿß ŸäŸàŸÅÿ± ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ±ŸàŸÜÿ© ŸàÿßŸÑŸÉŸÅÿßÿ°ÿ©. ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜŸáÿß ÿØÿπŸÖ ÿ£ŸÜŸàÿßÿπ ŸÖÿÆÿ™ŸÑŸÅÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ÿßÿ™ ŸàÿßŸÑÿ∂ŸÖÿßŸÜÿßÿ™ÿå ŸÖÿπ ÿ™ŸÖŸäŸäÿ≤ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿ™ÿ≠ŸÖŸÑ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿÆÿßÿ∑ÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ≥ÿßÿ≥Ÿäÿ©. ü™ô ÿ±ŸÖŸàÿ≤ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ±ÿßŸÉÿ≤ ÿ™ÿ≠ÿ±Ÿäÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿµŸàŸÑ ÿ™ÿ¨ÿπŸÑ ÿ±ŸÖŸàÿ≤ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ±ÿßŸÉÿ≤ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿµŸàŸÑ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÇŸÅŸÑÿ© ŸÇÿßÿ®ŸÑÿ© ŸÑŸÑÿ™ÿ≠ÿ±ŸäŸÉÿå ŸÖŸÖÿß Ÿäÿπÿ≤ÿ≤ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸäŸàŸÑÿ© ŸÅŸä DeFi. ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿØÿßŸàŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿ´ÿßŸÜŸàŸä ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜŸÉ ÿ™ÿØÿßŸàŸÑ ÿ±ŸÖŸàÿ≤ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ±ÿßŸÉÿ≤ ŸÖÿ´ŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿ±ŸÖŸàÿ≤ ÿßŸÑÿπÿßÿØŸäÿ©. ÿ≥Ÿäÿ∏ŸÑ ŸÖÿßŸÑŸÉŸà ÿ±ŸÖŸàÿ≤ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ±ÿßŸÉÿ≤ ŸäŸÖÿ™ŸÑŸÉŸàŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿµŸàŸÑ ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿÆÿ≤ŸäŸÜÿ© ÿ®ÿ¥ŸÉŸÑ ŸÜŸáÿßÿ¶Ÿä. ŸàŸáÿ∞ÿß ŸäŸÖŸÜÿ≠ŸÉ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ±ŸàŸÜÿ© ŸÑÿ±ŸáŸàŸÜ ÿ£ŸÖŸàÿßŸÑŸÉ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÇŸÅŸÑÿ© ŸÑŸÅÿ±ÿµ ÿ¨ÿØŸäÿØÿ©. üè¶ ŸÖÿπŸäÿßÿ± ÿ¨ÿØŸäÿØ ŸÑÿ™ÿµŸÖŸäŸÖ ÿßŸÑÿÆÿ≤ÿßÿ¶ŸÜ ÿ™ŸÇÿØŸÖ ÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑÿßÿ™ SOFA ÿ∑ÿ±ŸäŸÇÿ© ÿ¨ÿØŸäÿØÿ© ŸÑŸÑÿ™ÿπÿßŸÖŸÑ ŸÖÿπ ÿßŸÑÿπŸÖŸÑÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ¥ŸÅÿ±ÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿÆŸÑÿßŸÑ ÿ¨ÿπŸÑ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿπÿßŸÖŸÑÿßÿ™ Ÿàÿßÿ∂ÿ≠ÿ© Ÿàÿ¢ŸÖŸÜÿ©. Ÿäÿ≥ŸÖÿ≠ ŸÑŸÉ ÿ®ŸÉÿ≥ÿ® ÿ®ŸÜÿßÿ°Ÿã ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑŸÅŸàÿßÿ¶ÿØ ÿØŸàŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÇŸÑŸÇ ÿ®ÿ¥ÿ£ŸÜ ÿ≥ŸÑÿßŸÖÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿµŸàŸÑ. ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜŸÉ ÿ™ÿÆÿµŸäÿµ ÿßŸÑŸÜÿ∑ÿßŸÇ: ŸÜÿ∑ÿßŸÇ ÿ∂ŸäŸÇ ŸäÿπŸÜŸä ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≤ŸäÿØ ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ±ÿ®ÿ≠ ŸàŸÑŸÉŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≤ŸäÿØ ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿÆÿßÿ∑ÿ±ÿå ÿ®ŸäŸÜŸÖÿß ŸäÿπŸÜŸä ŸÜÿ∑ÿßŸÇ ÿ£Ÿàÿ≥ÿπ ÿ±ÿ®ÿ≠Ÿãÿß ÿ£ŸÇŸÑ ŸàŸÑŸÉŸÜ ŸÅÿ±ÿµŸãÿß ÿ£ÿπŸÑŸâ ŸÑŸÑŸÅŸàÿ≤. ÿ•ÿ∞ÿß ÿÆÿ±ÿ¨ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿµŸÑ ÿπŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÜÿ∑ÿßŸÇÿå ÿ≥ÿ™ÿ≠ÿµŸÑ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿπÿßÿ¶ÿØ ÿ£ÿØŸÜŸâ ŸÖÿ∂ŸÖŸàŸÜ. title: User Guide
body: User Guide Prepare Your Wallet If you have not installed the Web3 wallet, please use a browser that supports plug-ins such as Chrome or Firefox to install wallets that we support. Once your wallet is ready, navigate directly to the SOFA APP and connect your wallet. SOFA is on both Ethereum and Arbitrum. Start a trade on Earn and Surge Protocols üì¢ 1. Define Your Risk Preferences ‚úÖ Earn Protocol Tailored for risk-averse depositors looking for the utmost downside protection of their capital. Surge Protocol Designed for those seeking high returns, the Surge Protocol is ideal if you're willing to embrace higher risks for potentially greater rewards. 2. Profit From Your Market Insight ‚úÖ Choose from three structured products under each protocol, each suited to different market conditions: 1) Rangebound The product is ideal for boring, sideways markets! When volatility is low and prices are stable, users have a higher chance of earning attractive payoffs. 2) Bull Trend The product is ideal for users anticipating a consistent upward market trajectory. If you're bullish about the market‚Äôs prospects, the Bull Trend is tailored for you! 3) Bear Trend The product is perfectly suited for users who anticipate a consistent downward market trajectory. If you're bearish about the market's prospects, the Bear Trend is specifically designed to match your outlook! Now, select and trade the product that matches your risk appetites and market view with SOFA!
