title: Dux User
body: User Guide Prepare Your Wallet Si non installasti Web3 nummarium, quaeso utere navigatro qui plug-ins sustinet, ut Chrome aut Firefox, ad nummaria quae sustinemus installanda. Cum nummarium tuum paratum sit, ad SOFA APP directe naviga et nummarium tuum conecta. SOFA in utroque Ethereum et Arbitrum est. Start a trade on Earn and Surge Protocols üì¢ 1. Define Your Risk Preferences ‚úÖ Earn Protocol Ad usores qui timorem capitis sui habent, hoc protocolum optimum est ad maximam protectionem damni. Surge Protocol Designatum est pro iis qui altos reditus quaerunt, Surge Protocol optimum est si paratus es ad maiorem periculum suscipiendum pro potentibus maioribus praemiis. 2. Profit From Your Market Insight ‚úÖ Elige ex tribus productis structuris sub unoquoque protocollo, quae ad diversas condiciones mercatus apta sunt: 1) Rangebound Productum hoc optimum est pro mercatibus taediosis, lateralibus! Cum volatilitas humilis est et pretia stabilia, usores maiorem habent facultatem lucrandi attrahentes praemia. 2) Bull Trend Productum hoc optimum est pro usoribus qui consistentem ascendentem mercatum praedicunt. Si de prospectibus mercati optimus es, Bull Trend tibi aptum est! 3) Bear Trend Productum hoc perfecte aptum est pro usoribus qui consistentem descendentem mercatum praedicunt. Si de prospectibus mercati pessimista es, Bear Trend ad tuam opinionem specifica designata est! Nunc, elige et trade productum quod convenit tuis appetitibus periculi et visione mercatus cum SOFA!

title: „É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Ç¨„Ç§„Éâ
body: „É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Ç¨„Ç§„Éâ „Ç¶„Ç©„É¨„ÉÉ„Éà„ÅÆÊ∫ñÂÇô Web3„Ç¶„Ç©„É¨„ÉÉ„Éà„Çí„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Éà„Éº„É´„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Å™„ÅÑÂ†¥Âêà„ÅØ„ÄÅChrome„ÇÑFirefox„Å™„Å©„ÅÆ„Éó„É©„Ç∞„Ç§„É≥„Çí„Çµ„Éù„Éº„Éà„Åô„Çã„Éñ„É©„Ç¶„Ç∂„Çí‰ΩøÁî®„Åó„Å¶„ÄÅÁßÅ„Åü„Å°„Åå„Çµ„Éù„Éº„Éà„Åô„Çã„Ç¶„Ç©„É¨„ÉÉ„Éà„Çí„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Éà„Éº„É´„Åó„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ „Ç¶„Ç©„É¨„ÉÉ„Éà„ÅÆÊ∫ñÂÇô„Åå„Åß„Åç„Åü„Çâ„ÄÅÁõ¥Êé•SOFA APP„Å´ÁßªÂãï„Åó„ÄÅ„Ç¶„Ç©„É¨„ÉÉ„Éà„ÇíÊé•Á∂ö„Åó„Å¶„Åè„Å†„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇSOFA„ÅØEthereum„Å®Arbitrum„ÅÆ‰∏°Êñπ„ÅßÂà©Áî®ÂèØËÉΩ„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ Earn„Åä„Çà„Å≥Surge„Éó„É≠„Éà„Ç≥„É´„ÅßÂèñÂºï„ÇíÈñãÂßã„Åô„Çã üì¢ 1. „É™„Çπ„ÇØ„ÅÆÂ•Ω„Åø„ÇíÂÆöÁæ©„Åô„Çã ‚úÖ Earn„Éó„É≠„Éà„Ç≥„É´ Ë≥áÊú¨„ÅÆÊúÄÂ§ßÈôê„ÅÆ„ÉÄ„Ç¶„É≥„Çµ„Ç§„Éâ‰øùË≠∑„ÇíÊ±Ç„ÇÅ„Çã„É™„Çπ„ÇØÂõûÈÅøÂûã„ÅÆÈ†êÈáëËÄÖÂêë„Åë„Å´Ë™øÊï¥„Åï„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ Surge„Éó„É≠„Éà„Ç≥„É´ È´ò„ÅÑ„É™„Çø„Éº„É≥„ÇíÊ±Ç„ÇÅ„Çã‰∫∫„ÄÖ„ÅÆ„Åü„ÇÅ„Å´Ë®≠Ë®à„Åï„Çå„Å¶„Åä„Çä„ÄÅ„Çà„ÇäÂ§ß„Åç„Å™Â†±ÈÖ¨„ÇíÂæó„Çã„Åü„ÇÅ„Å´È´ò„ÅÑ„É™„Çπ„ÇØ„ÇíÂèó„ÅëÂÖ•„Çå„ÇãÊÑèÊ¨≤„Åå„ÅÇ„ÇãÂ†¥Âêà„Å´ÊúÄÈÅ©„Åß„Åô„ÄÇ 2. Â∏ÇÂ†¥„ÅÆÊ¥ûÂØü„Åã„ÇâÂà©Áõä„ÇíÂæó„Çã ‚úÖ ÂêÑ„Éó„É≠„Éà„Ç≥„É´„ÅÆ‰∏ã„Åß„ÄÅÁï∞„Å™„ÇãÂ∏ÇÂ†¥Êù°‰ª∂„Å´ÈÅ©„Åó„Åü3„Å§„ÅÆÊßãÈÄ†ÂåñÂïÜÂìÅ„Åã„ÇâÈÅ∏Êäû„Åß„Åç„Åæ„ÅôÔºö 1) „É¨„É≥„Ç∏„Éê„Ç¶„É≥„Éâ „Åì„ÅÆÂïÜÂìÅ„ÅØ„ÄÅÈÄÄÂ±à„ÅßÊ®™„Å∞„ÅÑ„ÅÆÂ∏ÇÂ†¥„Å´ÊúÄÈÅ©„Åß„ÅôÔºÅ„Éú„É©„ÉÜ„Ç£„É™„ÉÜ„Ç£„Åå‰Ωé„Åè„ÄÅ‰æ°Ê†º„ÅåÂÆâÂÆö„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Çã„Å®„Åç„ÄÅ„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„ÅØÈ≠ÖÂäõÁöÑ„Å™„Éö„Ç§„Ç™„Éï„ÇíÂæó„Çã„ÉÅ„É£„É≥„Çπ„ÅåÈ´ò„Åè„Å™„Çä„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ 2) „Éñ„É´„Éà„É¨„É≥„Éâ „Åì„ÅÆÂïÜÂìÅ„ÅØ„ÄÅ‰∏ÄË≤´„Åó„Åü‰∏äÊòáÂ∏ÇÂ†¥„ÅÆËªåÈÅì„Çí‰∫àÊ∏¨„Åô„Çã„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´ÊúÄÈÅ©„Åß„Åô„ÄÇÂ∏ÇÂ†¥„ÅÆË¶ãÈÄö„Åó„Å´ÂØæ„Åó„Å¶Âº∑Ê∞ó„Åß„ÅÇ„Çå„Å∞„ÄÅ„Éñ„É´„Éà„É¨„É≥„Éâ„ÅØ„ÅÇ„Å™„Åü„Å´Âêà„Çè„Åõ„Å¶Ë™øÊï¥„Åï„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„ÅôÔºÅ 3) „Éô„Ç¢„Éà„É¨„É≥„Éâ „Åì„ÅÆÂïÜÂìÅ„ÅØ„ÄÅ‰∏ÄË≤´„Åó„Åü‰∏ãÈôçÂ∏ÇÂ†¥„ÅÆËªåÈÅì„Çí‰∫àÊ∏¨„Åô„Çã„É¶„Éº„Ç∂„Éº„Å´ÂÆåÂÖ®„Å´ÈÅ©„Åó„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇÂ∏ÇÂ†¥„ÅÆË¶ãÈÄö„Åó„Å´ÂØæ„Åó„Å¶Âº±Ê∞ó„Åß„ÅÇ„Çå„Å∞„ÄÅ„Éô„Ç¢„Éà„É¨„É≥„Éâ„ÅØ„ÅÇ„Å™„Åü„ÅÆË¶ãËß£„Å´Áâπ„Å´Âêà„Çè„Åõ„Å¶Ë®≠Ë®à„Åï„Çå„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„ÅôÔºÅ „Åï„ÅÇ„ÄÅ„É™„Çπ„ÇØ„ÅÆÂ•Ω„Åø„Å®Â∏ÇÂ†¥„ÅÆË¶ãËß£„Å´Âêà„Å£„ÅüÂïÜÂìÅ„ÇíÈÅ∏Êäû„Åó„ÄÅSOFA„ÅßÂèñÂºï„ÇíÈñãÂßã„Åó„Åæ„Åó„Çá„ÅÜÔºÅ

title: Áî®Êà∂ÊåáÂçó
body: ‰ΩøÁî®ÊåáÂçó Ê∫ñÂÇôÊÇ®ÁöÑÈå¢ÂåÖ Â¶ÇÊûúÊÇ®Â∞öÊú™ÂÆâË£ù Web3 Èå¢ÂåÖÔºåË´ã‰ΩøÁî®ÊîØÊåÅÊèí‰ª∂ÁöÑÁÄèË¶ΩÂô®ÔºåÂ¶Ç Chrome Êàñ FirefoxÔºå‰æÜÂÆâË£ùÊàëÂÄëÊîØÊåÅÁöÑÈå¢ÂåÖ„ÄÇ Áï∂ÊÇ®ÁöÑÈå¢ÂåÖÊ∫ñÂÇôÂ∞±Á∑íÂæåÔºåÁõ¥Êé•Â∞éËà™Âà∞ SOFA APP ‰∏¶ÈÄ£Êé•ÊÇ®ÁöÑÈå¢ÂåÖ„ÄÇSOFA ÊîØÊåÅ‰ª•Â§™ÂùäÂíå Arbitrum„ÄÇ Âú® Earn Âíå Surge ÂçîË≠∞‰∏äÈñãÂßã‰∫§Êòì üì¢ 1. ÂÆöÁæ©ÊÇ®ÁöÑÈ¢®Èö™ÂÅèÂ•Ω ‚úÖ Earn ÂçîË≠∞ Â∞àÁÇ∫Â∞ãÊ±ÇË≥áÊú¨ÊúÄÂ§ß‰∏ãË°å‰øùË≠∑ÁöÑÈ¢®Èö™Âé≠ÊÉ°ÂûãÂ≠òÊ¨æËÄÖÈáèË∫´ÂÆöÂà∂„ÄÇ Surge ÂçîË≠∞ Ë®≠Ë®àÁÇ∫ËøΩÊ±ÇÈ´òÂõûÂ†±ÁöÑ‰∫∫Â£´ÔºåSurge ÂçîË≠∞ÈùûÂ∏∏ÈÅ©ÂêàÈ°òÊÑèÊâøÊìîÊõ¥È´òÈ¢®Èö™‰ª•Áç≤ÂæóÊΩõÂú®Êõ¥Â§ßÂõûÂ†±ÁöÑ‰∫∫„ÄÇ 2. ÂæûÊÇ®ÁöÑÂ∏ÇÂ†¥Ê¥ûÂØü‰∏≠Áç≤Âà© ‚úÖ Âú®ÊØèÂÄãÂçîË≠∞‰∏ãÈÅ∏Êìá‰∏âÁ®ÆÁµêÊßãÂåñÁî¢ÂìÅÔºåÊØèÁ®ÆÁî¢ÂìÅÈÅ©Âêà‰∏çÂêåÁöÑÂ∏ÇÂ†¥Ê¢ù‰ª∂Ôºö 1) ÂçÄÈñìÊ≥¢Âãï Ë©≤Áî¢ÂìÅÈùûÂ∏∏ÈÅ©ÂêàÁÑ°ËÅäÁöÑÊ©´Áõ§Â∏ÇÂ†¥ÔºÅÁï∂Ê≥¢ÂãïÊÄß‰Ωé‰∏îÂÉπÊ†ºÁ©©ÂÆöÊôÇÔºåÁî®Êà∂ÊúâÊõ¥È´òÁöÑÊ©üÊúÉÁç≤ÂæóÂê∏Âºï‰∫∫ÁöÑÂõûÂ†±„ÄÇ 2) ÁâõÂ∏ÇË∂®Âã¢ Ë©≤Áî¢ÂìÅÈùûÂ∏∏ÈÅ©ÂêàÈ†êÊúüÂ∏ÇÂ†¥ÊåÅÁ∫å‰∏äÂçáÁöÑÁî®Êà∂„ÄÇÂ¶ÇÊûúÊÇ®Â∞çÂ∏ÇÂ†¥ÂâçÊôØÊåÅÊ®ÇËßÄÊÖãÂ∫¶ÔºåÁâõÂ∏ÇË∂®Âã¢Â∞±ÊòØÁÇ∫ÊÇ®ÈáèË∫´ÂÆöÂà∂ÁöÑÔºÅ 3) ÁÜäÂ∏ÇË∂®Âã¢ Ë©≤Áî¢ÂìÅÈùûÂ∏∏ÈÅ©ÂêàÈ†êÊúüÂ∏ÇÂ†¥ÊåÅÁ∫å‰∏ãÈôçÁöÑÁî®Êà∂„ÄÇÂ¶ÇÊûúÊÇ®Â∞çÂ∏ÇÂ†¥ÂâçÊôØÊåÅÊÇ≤ËßÄÊÖãÂ∫¶ÔºåÁÜäÂ∏ÇË∂®Âã¢Â∞±ÊòØÂ∞àÁÇ∫ÊÇ®Ë®≠Ë®àÁöÑÔºÅ ÁèæÂú®ÔºåÈÅ∏Êìá‰∏¶‰∫§ÊòìËàáÊÇ®ÁöÑÈ¢®Èö™ÂÅèÂ•ΩÂíåÂ∏ÇÂ†¥ËßÄÈªûÁõ∏ÂåπÈÖçÁöÑ SOFA Áî¢ÂìÅÔºÅ

title: ÿØŸÑŸäŸÑ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖ
body: ÿØŸÑŸäŸÑ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖ ÿ•ÿπÿØÿßÿØ ŸÖÿ≠ŸÅÿ∏ÿ™ŸÉ ÿ•ÿ∞ÿß ŸÑŸÖ ÿ™ŸÇŸÖ ÿ®ÿ™ÿ´ÿ®Ÿäÿ™ ŸÖÿ≠ŸÅÿ∏ÿ© Web3ÿå Ÿäÿ±ÿ¨Ÿâ ÿßÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØÿßŸÖ ŸÖÿ™ÿµŸÅÿ≠ ŸäÿØÿπŸÖ ÿßŸÑÿ•ÿ∂ÿßŸÅÿßÿ™ ŸÖÿ´ŸÑ Chrome ÿ£Ÿà Firefox ŸÑÿ™ÿ´ÿ®Ÿäÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≠ÿßŸÅÿ∏ ÿßŸÑÿ™Ÿä ŸÜÿØÿπŸÖŸáÿß. ÿ®ŸÖÿ¨ÿ±ÿØ ÿ£ŸÜ ÿ™ÿµÿ®ÿ≠ ŸÖÿ≠ŸÅÿ∏ÿ™ŸÉ ÿ¨ÿßŸáÿ≤ÿ©ÿå ÿßŸÜÿ™ŸÇŸÑ ŸÖÿ®ÿßÿ¥ÿ±ÿ© ÿ•ŸÑŸâ ÿ™ÿ∑ÿ®ŸäŸÇ SOFA ŸàŸÇŸÖ ÿ®ÿ™ŸàÿµŸäŸÑ ŸÖÿ≠ŸÅÿ∏ÿ™ŸÉ. SOFA ŸÖÿ™ÿßÿ≠ÿ© ÿπŸÑŸâ ŸÉŸÑ ŸÖŸÜ Ethereum Ÿà Arbitrum. ÿßÿ®ÿØÿ£ ÿ™ÿØÿßŸàŸÑŸãÿß ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑÿßÿ™ Earn Ÿà Surge üì¢ 1. ÿ≠ÿØÿØ ÿ™ŸÅÿ∂ŸäŸÑÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿÆÿßÿ∑ÿ± ÿßŸÑÿÆÿßÿµÿ© ÿ®ŸÉ ‚úÖ ÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑ Earn ŸÖÿµŸÖŸÖ ŸÑŸÑŸÖŸàÿØÿπŸäŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ∞ŸäŸÜ Ÿäÿ™ÿ¨ŸÜÿ®ŸàŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿÆÿßÿ∑ÿ± ŸàÿßŸÑÿ∞ŸäŸÜ Ÿäÿ®ÿ≠ÿ´ŸàŸÜ ÿπŸÜ ÿ£ŸÇÿµŸâ ÿ≠ŸÖÿßŸäÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿÆÿ≥ÿßÿ¶ÿ± ŸÑÿ±ÿ£ÿ≥ ŸÖÿßŸÑŸáŸÖ. ÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑ Surge ŸÖÿµŸÖŸÖ ŸÑÿ£ŸàŸÑÿ¶ŸÉ ÿßŸÑÿ∞ŸäŸÜ Ÿäÿ≥ÿπŸàŸÜ ŸÑÿ™ÿ≠ŸÇŸäŸÇ ÿπŸàÿßÿ¶ÿØ ÿπÿßŸÑŸäÿ©ÿå ÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑ Surge ŸÖÿ´ÿßŸÑŸä ÿ•ÿ∞ÿß ŸÉŸÜÿ™ ŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿπÿØŸãÿß ŸÑÿ™ÿ≠ŸÖŸÑ ŸÖÿÆÿßÿ∑ÿ± ÿ£ÿπŸÑŸâ ŸÖŸÜ ÿ£ÿ¨ŸÑ ŸÖŸÉÿßŸÅÿ¢ÿ™ ŸÖÿ≠ÿ™ŸÖŸÑÿ© ÿ£ŸÉÿ®ÿ±. 2. ÿßÿ≥ÿ™ŸÅÿØ ŸÖŸÜ ÿ±ÿ§Ÿäÿ™ŸÉ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸàŸÇŸäÿ© ‚úÖ ÿßÿÆÿ™ÿ± ŸÖŸÜ ÿ®ŸäŸÜ ÿ´ŸÑÿßÿ´ÿ© ŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ÿßÿ™ ŸáŸäŸÉŸÑŸäÿ© ÿ™ÿ≠ÿ™ ŸÉŸÑ ÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑÿå ŸÉŸÑ ŸÖŸÜŸáÿß ŸÖŸÜÿßÿ≥ÿ® ŸÑÿ∏ÿ±ŸàŸÅ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸàŸÇ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿÆÿ™ŸÑŸÅÿ©: 1) ŸÜÿ∑ÿßŸÇ ÿ´ÿßÿ®ÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ ŸÖÿ´ÿßŸÑŸä ŸÑŸÑÿ£ÿ≥ŸàÿßŸÇ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÖŸÑÿ© ŸàÿßŸÑÿ´ÿßÿ®ÿ™ÿ©! ÿπŸÜÿØŸÖÿß ÿ™ŸÉŸàŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ™ŸÇŸÑÿ®ÿßÿ™ ŸÖŸÜÿÆŸÅÿ∂ÿ© ŸàÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ≥ÿπÿßÿ± ŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ŸÇÿ±ÿ©ÿå ŸäŸÉŸàŸÜ ŸÑÿØŸâ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖŸäŸÜ ŸÅÿ±ÿµÿ© ÿ£ŸÉÿ®ÿ± ŸÑÿ™ÿ≠ŸÇŸäŸÇ ÿπŸàÿßÿ¶ÿØ ÿ¨ÿ∞ÿßÿ®ÿ©. 2) ÿßÿ™ÿ¨ÿßŸá ÿµÿπŸàÿØŸä ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ ŸÖÿ´ÿßŸÑŸä ŸÑŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖŸäŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ∞ŸäŸÜ Ÿäÿ™ŸàŸÇÿπŸàŸÜ ŸÖÿ≥ÿßÿ± ÿ≥ŸàŸÇ ÿµÿπŸàÿØŸä ÿ´ÿßÿ®ÿ™. ÿ•ÿ∞ÿß ŸÉŸÜÿ™ ŸÖÿ™ŸÅÿßÿ¶ŸÑŸãÿß ÿ®ÿ¥ÿ£ŸÜ ÿ¢ŸÅÿßŸÇ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸàŸÇÿå ŸÅÿ•ŸÜ ÿßÿ™ÿ¨ÿßŸá ÿßŸÑÿµÿπŸàÿØ ŸÖÿµŸÖŸÖ ŸÑŸÉ! 3) ÿßÿ™ÿ¨ÿßŸá Ÿáÿ®Ÿàÿ∑Ÿä ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ ŸÖŸÜÿßÿ≥ÿ® ÿ™ŸÖÿßŸÖŸãÿß ŸÑŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖŸäŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ∞ŸäŸÜ Ÿäÿ™ŸàŸÇÿπŸàŸÜ ŸÖÿ≥ÿßÿ± ÿ≥ŸàŸÇ Ÿáÿ®Ÿàÿ∑Ÿä ÿ´ÿßÿ®ÿ™. ÿ•ÿ∞ÿß ŸÉŸÜÿ™ ŸÖÿ™ÿ¥ÿßÿ¶ŸÖŸãÿß ÿ®ÿ¥ÿ£ŸÜ ÿ¢ŸÅÿßŸÇ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸàŸÇÿå ŸÅÿ•ŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ™ÿ¨ÿßŸá ÿßŸÑŸáÿ®Ÿàÿ∑Ÿä ŸÖÿµŸÖŸÖ ÿÆÿµŸäÿµŸãÿß ŸÑŸäÿ™ŸÜÿßÿ≥ÿ® ŸÖÿπ ÿ±ÿ§Ÿäÿ™ŸÉ! ÿßŸÑÿ¢ŸÜÿå ÿßÿÆÿ™ÿ± Ÿàÿ™ÿØÿßŸàŸÑ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ ÿßŸÑÿ∞Ÿä Ÿäÿ™ŸÜÿßÿ≥ÿ® ŸÖÿπ ÿ¥ŸáŸäÿ™ŸÉ ŸÑŸÑŸÖÿÆÿßÿ∑ÿ± Ÿàÿ±ÿ§Ÿäÿ™ŸÉ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸàŸÇŸäÿ© ŸÖÿπ SOFA!

title: Earn
body: Earn Rangebound Step 1: Selecting Your Product ‚Üí Navigate to the Protocol tab and click on Earn. ‚Üí Choose the Rangebound structured product. ‚Üí Select the underlying asset you prefer‚ÄîBTC or ETH. ‚Üí Select one of the Top Pick Trades listed for your chosen asset. Step 2: Reviewing Trade Details ‚Üí A popup will display all relevant trade information, including Settlement Date, Lower and Upper Barriers, Base Yield, Base+ RCH, Potential Yield, and the potential outcomes under various scenarios. ‚Üí Enter your desired amount in USDT in the Deposit Amount box ‚Üí click Deposit ‚Üí your wallet will pop up a confirmation window. If you wish to customize any details, proceed to Step 3. Step 3: Customizing Your Trade ‚Üí Click on the Customize icon either from the Earn homepage or from the product details page mentioned in Step 2 ‚Üí On the Customize page, you can modify your trade settings. Select your desired parameters: Base Yield Expiry Date (i.e., Settlement Date) Lower Barrier Price (B1) and Upper Barrier Price (B2) Deposit Amount and click Request For Quote. ‚Üí After setting the parameters, click Deposit to proceed. Step 4: Confirming Your Trade When prompted, engage with the following windows for trade confirmation: Signature Request: A signature request window will appear first. Click Sign to authorize. Trade Execution: After signing, a confirmation window will appear. Click Confirm to finalize the trade. ‚úÖ Ensure both actions are completed to successfully carry out your trade. Step 5: Trade Execution ‚Üí Congratulations! Your transaction has been successfully submitted on-chain. ‚úÖ Step 6: Monitoring Your Position ‚Üí Access the Position tab to view your trade details post trade-execution. Step 7: Claiming Your Payouts ‚Üí On settlement (expiry) date, go to the Position tab, open your trade ticket, and click Claim to receive your payouts. Note: For Earn products (secured), all deposited amounts will be staked in the Aave protocol to generate passive returns. Moreover, a portion of the Aave returns will be retained as Base Yield, and the remaining part will be deployed to option strategies to generate potential Upside returns. Bull Trend Step 1: Selecting Your Product ‚Üí Navigate to the Protocol tab and click on Earn. ‚Üí Choose the Bull Trend structured product. ‚Üí Select the underlying asset you prefer‚ÄîBTC or ETH. ‚Üí Select one of the Top Pick Trades listed for your chosen asset. Step 2: Reviewing Trade Details ‚Üí A popup will display all relevant trade information, including Settlement Date, Lower and Upper Strikes, Base Yield, Base+ RCH, Potential Yield, and the potential outcomes under various scenarios. ‚Üí Enter your desired amount in USDT in the Deposit Amount box ‚Üí click Deposit ‚Üí your wallet will pop up a confirmation window. If you wish to customize any details, proceed to Step 3. Step 3: Customizing Your Trade ‚Üí Click on the Customize icon either from the Earn homepage or from the product details page mentioned in Step 2 ‚Üí On the Customize page, you can modify your trade settings. Select your desired parameters: Base Yield Expire Date (i.e., Settlement Date) Lower Strike Price (K1) and Upper Strike Price (K2) Deposit Amount and click Request For Quote. ‚Üí After setting the parameters, click Deposit to proceed Step 4: Confirming Your Trade When prompted, engage with the following windows for trade confirmation: Signature Request: A signature request window will appear first. Click Sign to authorize. Trade Execution: After signing, a confirmation window will appear. Click Confirm to finalize the trade. ‚úÖ Ensure both actions are completed to successfully carry out your trade. Step 5: Trade Execution ‚Üí Congratulations! Your transaction has been successfully submitted on-chain. ‚úÖ Step 6: Monitoring Your Position ‚Üí Access the Position tab to view your trade details post trade-execution. Step 7: Claiming Your Payouts ‚Üí On settlement (expiry) date, go to the Position tab, open your trade ticket, and click Claim to receive your payouts. Note: For Earn products (secured), all deposited amounts will be staked in the Aave protocol to generate passive returns. Moreover, a portion of the Aave returns will be retained as Base Yield, and the remaining part will be deployed to option strategies to generate potential Upside returns. Bear Trend Follows the same steps as outlined for the Bull Trend product

body: Earn Rangebound Step 1: Ï†úÌíà ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌïòÍ∏∞ ‚Üí ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú ÌÉ≠ÏúºÎ°ú Ïù¥ÎèôÌïòÏó¨ EarnÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶≠Ìï©ÎãàÎã§.‚Üí Rangebound Íµ¨Ï°∞ÌôîÎêú Ï†úÌíàÏùÑ ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ‚Üí ÏÑ†Ìò∏ÌïòÎäî Í∏∞Ï¥à ÏûêÏÇ∞‚ÄîBTC ÎòêÎäî ETHÎ•º ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ‚Üí ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌïú ÏûêÏÇ∞Ïóê ÎåÄÌï¥ ÎÇòÏó¥Îêú Top Pick Trades Ï§ë ÌïòÎÇòÎ•º ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ÏÑ∏Î∂ÄÏ†ïÎ≥¥Î•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê Ï†ïÏùòÌïòÎ†§Î©¥ 3Îã®Í≥ÑÎ°ú ÏßÑÌñâÌïòÏã≠ÏãúÏò§. Step 3: Í±∞Îûò ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê Ï†ïÏùòÌïòÍ∏∞ ‚Üí Earn ÌôàÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄ ÎòêÎäî 2Îã®Í≥ÑÏóêÏÑú Ïñ∏Í∏âÌïú Ï†úÌíà ÏÑ∏Î∂ÄÏ†ïÎ≥¥ ÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄÏóêÏÑú ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê Ï†ïÏùò ÏïÑÏù¥ÏΩòÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶≠Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ‚Üí ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê Ï†ïÏùò ÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄÏóêÏÑú Í±∞Îûò ÏÑ§Ï†ïÏùÑ ÏàòÏ†ïÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÏõêÌïòÎäî Îß§Í∞úÎ≥ÄÏàòÎ•º ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌï©ÎãàÎã§: Í∏∞Î≥∏ ÏàòÏùµÎ•†ÎßåÎ£åÏùº (Ï¶â, Ï†ïÏÇ∞Ïùº)ÌïòÌïú Ïû•Î≤Ω Í∞ÄÍ≤© (B1) Î∞è ÏÉÅÌïú Ïû•Î≤Ω Í∞ÄÍ≤© (B2)ÏûÖÍ∏à Í∏àÏï° Í∑∏Î¶¨Í≥† Í≤¨Ï†Å ÏöîÏ≤≠ÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶≠Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ‚Üí Îß§Í∞úÎ≥ÄÏàòÎ•º ÏÑ§Ï†ïÌïú ÌõÑ ÏûÖÍ∏àÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶≠ÌïòÏó¨ ÏßÑÌñâÌï©ÎãàÎã§. 4Îã®Í≥Ñ: Í±∞Îûò ÌôïÏù∏ ÌîÑÎ°¨ÌîÑÌä∏Í∞Ä ÌëúÏãúÎêòÎ©¥ Í±∞Îûò ÌôïÏù∏ÏùÑ ÏúÑÌï¥ Îã§Ïùå Ï∞ΩÍ≥º ÏÉÅÌò∏ÏûëÏö©Ìï©ÎãàÎã§: ÏÑúÎ™Ö ÏöîÏ≤≠: ÏÑúÎ™Ö ÏöîÏ≤≠ Ï∞ΩÏù¥ Î®ºÏ†Ä ÎÇòÌÉÄÎÇ©ÎãàÎã§. ÏÑúÎ™ÖÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶≠ÌïòÏó¨ ÏäπÏù∏Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. Í±∞Îûò Ïã§Ìñâ: ÏÑúÎ™Ö ÌõÑ ÌôïÏù∏ Ï∞ΩÏù¥ ÎÇòÌÉÄÎÇ©ÎãàÎã§. ÌôïÏù∏ÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶≠ÌïòÏó¨ Í±∞ÎûòÎ•º ÏôÑÎ£åÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ‚úÖ Îëê ÏûëÏóÖÏù¥ Î™®Îëê ÏôÑÎ£åÎêòÏñ¥Ïïº Í±∞ÎûòÎ•º ÏÑ±Í≥µÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú ÏàòÌñâÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. 5Îã®Í≥Ñ: Í±∞Îûò Ïã§Ìñâ ‚Üí Ï∂ïÌïòÌï©ÎãàÎã§! Í∑ÄÌïòÏùò Í±∞ÎûòÍ∞Ä ÏÑ±Í≥µÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Ïò®Ï≤¥Ïù∏Ïóê Ï†úÏ∂úÎêòÏóàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ‚úÖ 6Îã®Í≥Ñ: Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò Î™®ÎãàÌÑ∞ÎßÅ ‚Üí Í±∞Îûò Ïã§Ìñâ ÌõÑ Í±∞Îûò ÏÑ∏Î∂ÄÏ†ïÎ≥¥Î•º Î≥¥Î†§Î©¥ Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò ÌÉ≠Ïóê Ïï°ÏÑ∏Ïä§Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. 7Îã®Í≥Ñ: ÏßÄÍ∏âÍ∏à Ï≤≠Íµ¨ ‚Üí Ï†ïÏÇ∞(ÎßåÎ£å) ÎÇ†ÏßúÏóê Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò ÌÉ≠ÏúºÎ°ú Ïù¥ÎèôÌïòÏó¨ Í±∞Îûò Ìã∞ÏºìÏùÑ Ïó¥Í≥† Ï≤≠Íµ¨Î•º ÌÅ¥Î¶≠ÌïòÏó¨ ÏßÄÍ∏âÍ∏àÏùÑ Î∞õÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ï∞∏Í≥†: Earn Ï†úÌíà(Î≥¥ÏïàÎêú)Ïùò Í≤ΩÏö∞, Î™®Îì† ÏòàÏπò Í∏àÏï°ÏùÄ Aave ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏóê Ïä§ÌÖåÏù¥ÌÇπÎêòÏñ¥ ÏàòÎèô ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ ÏÉùÏÑ±Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ÎòêÌïú, Aave ÏàòÏùµÏùò ÏùºÎ∂ÄÎäî Í∏∞Î≥∏ ÏàòÏùµÏúºÎ°ú Î≥¥Ïú†ÎêòÎ©∞, ÎÇòÎ®∏ÏßÄ Î∂ÄÎ∂ÑÏùÄ ÏòµÏÖò Ï†ÑÎûµÏóê Î∞∞ÏπòÎêòÏñ¥ Ïû†Ïû¨Ï†ÅÏù∏ ÏÉÅÏäπ ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ ÏÉùÏÑ±Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. Í∞ïÏÑ∏ Ï∂îÏÑ∏ 1Îã®Í≥Ñ: Ï†úÌíà ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌïòÍ∏∞ ‚Üí ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú ÌÉ≠ÏúºÎ°ú Ïù¥ÎèôÌïòÏó¨ EarnÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶≠Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ‚Üí Bull Trend Íµ¨Ï°∞ÌôîÎêú Ï†úÌíàÏùÑ ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ‚Üí ÏÑ†Ìò∏ÌïòÎäî Í∏∞Ï¥à ÏûêÏÇ∞‚ÄîBTC ÎòêÎäî ETHÎ•º ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ‚Üí ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌïú ÏûêÏÇ∞Ïóê ÎåÄÌï¥ ÎÇòÏó¥Îêú Top Pick Trades Ï§ë ÌïòÎÇòÎ•º ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌï©ÎãàÎã§. 2Îã®Í≥Ñ: Í±∞Îûò ÏÑ∏Î∂ÄÏ†ïÎ≥¥ Í≤ÄÌÜ†ÌïòÍ∏∞ ‚Üí ÌåùÏóÖ Ï∞ΩÏù¥ Î™®Îì† Í¥ÄÎ†® Í±∞Îûò Ï†ïÎ≥¥Î•º ÌëúÏãúÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Ïó¨Í∏∞ÏóêÎäî Í≤∞Ï†úÏùº, ÌïòÌïú Î∞è ÏÉÅÌïú Í∞ÄÍ≤©, Í∏∞Î≥∏ ÏàòÏùµÎ•†, Í∏∞Î≥∏+ RCH, Ïû†Ïû¨Ï†Å ÏàòÏùµÎ•†, Îã§ÏñëÌïú ÏãúÎÇòÎ¶¨Ïò§ÏóêÏÑúÏùò Ïû†Ïû¨Ï†Å Í≤∞Í≥ºÍ∞Ä Ìè¨Ìï®Îê©ÎãàÎã§. ‚Üí ÏûÖÍ∏à Í∏àÏï° ÏÉÅÏûêÏóê ÏõêÌïòÎäî Í∏àÏï°ÏùÑ USDTÎ°ú ÏûÖÎ†•Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ‚Üí ÏûÖÍ∏àÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶≠Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ‚Üí ÏßÄÍ∞ëÏóêÏÑú ÌôïÏù∏ Ï∞ΩÏù¥ ÌåùÏóÖÎê©ÎãàÎã§. ÏÑ∏Î∂ÄÏ†ïÎ≥¥Î•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê Ï†ïÏùòÌïòÎ†§Î©¥ 3Îã®Í≥ÑÎ°ú ÏßÑÌñâÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî. 3Îã®Í≥Ñ: Í±∞Îûò ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê Ï†ïÏùòÌïòÍ∏∞ ‚Üí Earn ÌôàÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄ ÎòêÎäî 2Îã®Í≥ÑÏóêÏÑú Ïñ∏Í∏âÌïú Ï†úÌíà ÏÑ∏Î∂ÄÏ†ïÎ≥¥ ÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄÏóêÏÑú ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê Ï†ïÏùò ÏïÑÏù¥ÏΩòÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶≠Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ‚Üí ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê Ï†ïÏùò ÌéòÏù¥ÏßÄÏóêÏÑú Í±∞Îûò ÏÑ§Ï†ïÏùÑ ÏàòÏ†ïÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÏõêÌïòÎäî Îß§Í∞úÎ≥ÄÏàòÎ•º ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî: Í∏∞Î≥∏ ÏàòÏùµÎ•† ÎßåÎ£åÏùº(Ï¶â, Í≤∞Ï†úÏùº) ÌïòÌïú Í∞ÄÍ≤©(K1) Î∞è ÏÉÅÌïú Í∞ÄÍ≤©(K2) ÏûÖÍ∏à Í∏àÏï° Í∑∏Î¶¨Í≥† Í≤¨Ï†Å ÏöîÏ≤≠ÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶≠Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ‚Üí Îß§Í∞úÎ≥ÄÏàòÎ•º ÏÑ§Ï†ïÌïú ÌõÑ ÏûÖÍ∏àÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶≠ÌïòÏó¨ ÏßÑÌñâÌï©ÎãàÎã§. 4Îã®Í≥Ñ: Í±∞Îûò ÌôïÏù∏ ÌîÑÎ°¨ÌîÑÌä∏Í∞Ä ÌëúÏãúÎêòÎ©¥ Í±∞Îûò ÌôïÏù∏ÏùÑ ÏúÑÌï¥ Îã§Ïùå Ï∞ΩÍ≥º ÏÉÅÌò∏ÏûëÏö©ÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî: ÏÑúÎ™Ö ÏöîÏ≤≠: ÏÑúÎ™Ö ÏöîÏ≤≠ Ï∞ΩÏù¥ Î®ºÏ†Ä ÎÇòÌÉÄÎÇ©ÎãàÎã§. ÏÑúÎ™ÖÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶≠ÌïòÏó¨ ÏäπÏù∏ÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî. Í±∞Îûò Ïã§Ìñâ: ÏÑúÎ™Ö ÌõÑ ÌôïÏù∏ Ï∞ΩÏù¥ ÎÇòÌÉÄÎÇ©ÎãàÎã§. ÌôïÏù∏ÏùÑ ÌÅ¥Î¶≠ÌïòÏó¨ Í±∞ÎûòÎ•º ÏôÑÎ£åÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî. ‚úÖ Îëê ÏûëÏóÖÏù¥ Î™®Îëê ÏôÑÎ£åÎêòÏñ¥Ïïº Í±∞ÎûòÍ∞Ä ÏÑ±Í≥µÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú ÏàòÌñâÎê©ÎãàÎã§. 5Îã®Í≥Ñ: Í±∞Îûò Ïã§Ìñâ ‚Üí Ï∂ïÌïòÌï©ÎãàÎã§! Í∑ÄÌïòÏùò Í±∞ÎûòÍ∞Ä Ï≤¥Ïù∏Ïóê ÏÑ±Í≥µÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Ï†úÏ∂úÎêòÏóàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ‚úÖ 6Îã®Í≥Ñ: Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò Î™®ÎãàÌÑ∞ÎßÅ ‚Üí Í±∞Îûò Ïã§Ìñâ ÌõÑ Í±∞Îûò ÏÑ∏Î∂ÄÏ†ïÎ≥¥Î•º Î≥¥Î†§Î©¥ Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò ÌÉ≠Ïóê Ï†ëÍ∑ºÌïòÏÑ∏Ïöî. 7Îã®Í≥Ñ: ÏßÄÍ∏âÍ∏à Ï≤≠Íµ¨ ‚Üí Ï†ïÏÇ∞(ÎßåÎ£å) ÎÇ†ÏßúÏóê Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò ÌÉ≠ÏúºÎ°ú Í∞ÄÏÑú Í±∞Îûò Ìã∞ÏºìÏùÑ Ïó¥Í≥† Ï≤≠Íµ¨Î•º ÌÅ¥Î¶≠ÌïòÏó¨ ÏßÄÍ∏âÍ∏àÏùÑ Î∞õÏúºÏÑ∏Ïöî. Ï∞∏Í≥†: Earn Ï†úÌíà(Î≥¥ÏïàÎêú)Ïùò Í≤ΩÏö∞, Î™®Îì† ÏòàÏπò Í∏àÏï°ÏùÄ Aave ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏóê Ïä§ÌÖåÏù¥ÌÇπÎêòÏñ¥ ÏàòÎèô ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ ÏÉùÏÑ±Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ÎòêÌïú, Aave ÏàòÏùµÏùò ÏùºÎ∂ÄÎäî Í∏∞Î≥∏ ÏàòÏùµÏúºÎ°ú Î≥¥Ïú†ÎêòÍ≥†, ÎÇòÎ®∏ÏßÄ Î∂ÄÎ∂ÑÏùÄ ÏòµÏÖò Ï†ÑÎûµÏóê Î∞∞ÏπòÎêòÏñ¥ Ïû†Ïû¨Ï†ÅÏù∏ ÏÉÅÏäπ ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ ÏÉùÏÑ±Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ÌïòÎùΩ Ï∂îÏÑ∏ ÏÉÅÏäπ Ï∂îÏÑ∏ Ï†úÌíàÏóê ÎåÄÌï¥ ÏÑ§Î™ÖÎêú Í≤ÉÍ≥º ÎèôÏùºÌïú Îã®Í≥ÑÎ•º Îî∞Î¶ÖÎãàÎã§.

title: ËµöÂèñ
body: Êî∂Áõä Âå∫Èó¥Èôê‰ª∑ Ê≠•È™§ 1ÔºöÈÄâÊã©ÊÇ®ÁöÑ‰∫ßÂìÅ ‚Üí ÂØºËà™Âà∞ÂçèËÆÆÈÄâÈ°πÂç°Âπ∂ÁÇπÂáªÊî∂Áõä„ÄÇ‚Üí ÈÄâÊã©Âå∫Èó¥Èôê‰ª∑ÁªìÊûÑÂåñ‰∫ßÂìÅ„ÄÇ ‚Üí ÈÄâÊã©ÊÇ®ÂÅèÂ•ΩÁöÑÂü∫Á°ÄËµÑ‰∫ß‚Äî‚ÄîBTC Êàñ ETH„ÄÇ ‚Üí ÈÄâÊã©ÊÇ®ÊâÄÈÄâËµÑ‰∫ßÁöÑÁÉ≠Èó®Êé®Ëçê‰∫§Êòì‰πã‰∏Ä„ÄÇ Ê≠•È™§ 2ÔºöÊü•Áúã‰∫§ÊòìËØ¶ÊÉÖ ‚Üí ÂºπÂá∫Á™óÂè£Â∞ÜÊòæÁ§∫ÊâÄÊúâÁõ∏ÂÖ≥ÁöÑ‰∫§Êòì‰ø°ÊÅØÔºåÂåÖÊã¨ÁªìÁÆóÊó•Êúü„ÄÅ‰∏ãÈôêÂíå‰∏äÈôê„ÄÅÂü∫Á°ÄÊî∂Áõä„ÄÅÂü∫Á°Ä+ RCH„ÄÅÊΩúÂú®Êî∂Áõä‰ª•ÂèäÂú®ÂêÑÁßçÊÉÖÂ¢É‰∏ãÁöÑÊΩúÂú®ÁªìÊûú„ÄÇ ‚Üí Âú®Â≠òÊ¨æÈáëÈ¢ùÊ°Ü‰∏≠ËæìÂÖ•ÊÇ®ÊÉ≥Ë¶ÅÁöÑ USDT ÈáëÈ¢ù‚Üí ÁÇπÂáªÂ≠òÊ¨æ‚Üí ÊÇ®ÁöÑÈí±ÂåÖÂ∞ÜÂºπÂá∫‰∏Ä‰∏™Á°ÆËÆ§Á™óÂè£„ÄÇ Â¶ÇÊûúÊÇ®Â∏åÊúõËá™ÂÆö‰πâ‰ªª‰ΩïÁªÜËäÇÔºåËØ∑ÁªßÁª≠ÊâßË°åÊ≠•È™§ 3„ÄÇ Ê≠•È™§ 3ÔºöËá™ÂÆö‰πâÊÇ®ÁöÑ‰∫§Êòì ‚Üí ÁÇπÂáªËá™ÂÆö‰πâÂõæÊ†áÔºåÂèØ‰ª•‰ªéÊî∂Áõä‰∏ªÈ°µÊàñÊ≠•È™§ 2 ‰∏≠ÊèêÂà∞ÁöÑ‰∫ßÂìÅËØ¶ÊÉÖÈ°µËøõÂÖ•„ÄÇ ‚Üí Âú®Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÈ°µÈù¢ÔºåÊÇ®ÂèØ‰ª•‰øÆÊîπÊÇ®ÁöÑ‰∫§ÊòìËÆæÁΩÆ„ÄÇÈÄâÊã©ÊÇ®ÊÉ≥Ë¶ÅÁöÑÂèÇÊï∞Ôºö Âü∫Á°ÄÊî∂ÁõäÂà∞ÊúüÊó•ÊúüÔºàÂç≥ÁªìÁÆóÊó•ÊúüÔºâ‰∏ãÈôê‰ª∑Ê†º (B1) Âíå‰∏äÈôê‰ª∑Ê†º (B2)Â≠òÊ¨æÈáëÈ¢ù ÁÑ∂ÂêéÁÇπÂáªËØ∑Ê±ÇÊä•‰ª∑„ÄÇ ‚Üí ËÆæÁΩÆÂèÇÊï∞ÂêéÔºåÁÇπÂáª Â≠òÊ¨æ ÁªßÁª≠„ÄÇ Ê≠•È™§ 4ÔºöÁ°ÆËÆ§ÊÇ®ÁöÑ‰∫§Êòì ÂΩìÂá∫Áé∞ÊèêÁ§∫Êó∂Ôºå‰∏é‰ª•‰∏ãÁ™óÂè£‰∫§‰∫í‰ª•Á°ÆËÆ§‰∫§ÊòìÔºö Á≠æÂêçËØ∑Ê±ÇÔºöÈ¶ñÂÖà‰ºöÂá∫Áé∞‰∏Ä‰∏™Á≠æÂêçËØ∑Ê±ÇÁ™óÂè£„ÄÇÁÇπÂáª Á≠æÂêç ËøõË°åÊéàÊùÉ„ÄÇ ‰∫§ÊòìÊâßË°åÔºöÁ≠æÂêçÂêéÔºå‰ºöÂá∫Áé∞‰∏Ä‰∏™Á°ÆËÆ§Á™óÂè£„ÄÇÁÇπÂáª Á°ÆËÆ§ ÂÆåÊàê‰∫§Êòì„ÄÇ ‚úÖ Á°Æ‰øùÂÆåÊàêËøô‰∏§‰∏™Êìç‰Ωú‰ª•ÊàêÂäüËøõË°å‰∫§Êòì„ÄÇ Ê≠•È™§ 5Ôºö‰∫§ÊòìÊâßË°å ‚Üí ÊÅ≠ÂñúÔºÅÊÇ®ÁöÑ‰∫§ÊòìÂ∑≤ÊàêÂäüÊèê‰∫§Âà∞Èìæ‰∏ä„ÄÇ‚úÖ Ê≠•È™§ 6ÔºöÁõëÊéßÊÇ®ÁöÑ‰ªì‰Ωç ‚Üí ËÆøÈóÆ ‰ªì‰Ωç Ê†áÁ≠æ‰ª•Êü•Áúã‰∫§ÊòìÊâßË°åÂêéÁöÑ‰∫§ÊòìËØ¶ÊÉÖ„ÄÇ Ê≠•È™§ 7ÔºöÈ¢ÜÂèñÊÇ®ÁöÑÊî∂Áõä ‚Üí Âú®ÁªìÁÆóÔºàÂà∞ÊúüÔºâÊó•ÊúüÔºåÂâçÂæÄ ‰ªì‰Ωç Ê†áÁ≠æÔºåÊâìÂºÄÊÇ®ÁöÑ‰∫§ÊòìÂçïÂπ∂ÁÇπÂáª È¢ÜÂèñ ‰ª•Êé•Êî∂ÊÇ®ÁöÑÊî∂Áõä„ÄÇ title: Merere
body: Merere Limitatus Gradus 1: Productum Tuum Seligere ‚Üí Naviga ad tabulam Protocol et click in Merere.‚Üí Elige productum structum Limitatus. ‚Üí Selige fundamentum bonum quod malis‚ÄîBTC vel ETH. ‚Üí Selige unum ex Optimum Electum Negotiationibus pro tuo electo bono. Gradus 2: Recensere Negotiationis Detalia ‚Üí Popup ostendet omnia pertinentia negotiationis informationes, inclusa Data Solutionis, Inferioribus et Superioribus Limitibus, Base Yield, Base+ RCH, Potentia Yield, et potentiales eventus sub variis scenariis. ‚Üí Ingredere quantitatem tuam desideratam in USDT in Depositum Quantitatis capsula‚Üí click Depositum‚Üí tua wallet ostendet fenestram confirmationis. Si vis aliquas details personalizare, procede ad Gradum 3. Gradus 3: Negotiationem Tuam Personalizare ‚Üí Click in iconem Personalizare sive ex pagina principalis Merere sive ex pagina producti detali quae in Gradum 2 memorata est. ‚Üí In pagina Personalizare, potes mutare tua negotiationis occasus. Selige tua desiderata parametra: Base YieldData Expirationis (id est, Data Solutionis)Pretium Inferioris Limitis (B1) et Pretium Superioris Limitis (B2)Depositum Quantitatis et click Petere Pro Quotatione. ‚Üí Post parametra constituenda, click Deposit ut pergere. Gradus 4: Confirmatio Negotiationis Tuae Cum rogatus, interagere cum sequentibus fenestris pro confirmatione negotiationis: Petitionem Signaturae: Fenestra petitionis signaturae primo apparebit. Click Sign ut auctoritatem det. Exsecutio Negotiationis: Post signandum, fenestra confirmationis apparebit. Click Confirm ut negotiationem finalizes. ‚úÖ Fac ut utraque actio completa sit ad negotiationem tuam feliciter peragendam. Gradus 5: Exsecutio Negotiationis ‚Üí Gratulationes! Transactio tua in catena feliciter submissa est. ‚úÖ Gradus 6: Monitoratio Positionis Tuae ‚Üí Accede ad tabulam Position ut videas singula negotiationis tuae post exsecutionem negotiationis. Gradus 7: Payouts Tuae Claudendae ‚Üí In die solutionis (expirationis), vade ad tabulam Position, aperi tessera negotiationis tuae, et click Claim ut recipias payouts tuos. Nota: Pro productis Earn (secundis), omnia summae depositi in protocollo Aave stabulabuntur ad redditus passivos generandos. Praeterea, pars reddituum Aave retinebitur ut Base Yield, et reliqua pars ad strategias optiones ad redditus potentiales Upside generandos adhibebitur. Trend Taurinus Gradus 1: Selectio Producti Tui ‚Üí Naviga ad tabulam Protocol et clicca in Earn. ‚Üí Elige productum structum Bull Trend. ‚Üí Elige fundamentum bonorum quod malis‚ÄîBTC vel ETH. ‚Üí Elige unum ex Top Pick Trades enumeratis pro bono tuo electo. Gradus 2: Recensio Detalium Negotiationis ‚Üí Popup ostendet omnia pertinentia informationes negotiationis, inclusa Data Solutionis, Inferioribus et Superioribus Strikes, Base Yield, Base+ RCH, Potentia Yield, et eventus potentiales sub variis scenariis. ‚Üí Intra quantitatem tuam desideratam in USDT in Deposit Amount capsula ‚Üí clicca Deposit ‚Üí tua wallet ostendet fenestram confirmationis. Si vis aliquas details personalizare, procede ad Gradum 3. Gradus 3: Personalizatio Negotiationis Tuae ‚Üí Clicca in iconem Customize sive ex pagina Earn sive ex pagina detalium producti mentionata in Gradum 2 ‚Üí In pagina Customize, potes mutare occasus negotiationis tuae. Elige parameters tuos desideratos: Base Yield Data Exspirationis (id est, Data Solutionis) Inferior Strike Price (K1) et Superior Strike Price (K2) Deposit Amount et clicca Request For Quote. ‚Üí Post setting parameters, clicca Deposit ut procedas Step 4: Confirmatio Negotiationis Tuae Cum rogatus, intercede cum sequentibus fenestris pro confirmatione negotiationis: Petitionem Signaturae: Fenestra petitionis signaturae primum apparebit. Clicca Signa ut auctoritatem praebeas. Exsecutio Negotiationis: Post signandum, fenestra confirmationis apparebit. Clicca Confirmare ut negotiationem finalizes. ‚úÖ Utere ut ambobus actionibus peractis negotiationem tuam feliciter exsequaris. Step 5: Exsecutio Negotiationis ‚Üí Gratulationes! Tua transactio feliciter in catena submissum est. ‚úÖ Step 6: Monitoratio Positionis Tuae ‚Üí Accede ad tabulam Positionis ut tua negotiationis singula post exsecutionem negotiationis videas. Step 7: Payouts Tuos Claudere ‚Üí In die solutionis (expirationis), ad tabulam Positionis vade, aperi tuum negotiationis tessera, et clicca Claude ut tua payouts accipias. Nota: Pro productis Earn (tutis), omnia deposita summa in protocollo Aave stabulabuntur ad redditus passivos generandos. Praeterea, pars reddituum Aave retinebitur ut Base Yield, et reliqua pars ad strategias optionum ad redditus potentiales Upside generandos adhibebitur. Trend Ursinus Sequitur eadem vestigia ut delineata pro productum Trend Taurinum.

title: Surge
body: Surge Rangebound Step 1: Selecting Your Product ‚Üí Navigate to the Protocol tab and click on Surge. ‚Üí Choose the Rangebound structured product. ‚Üí Select the underlying asset you prefer‚ÄîBTC or ETH. ‚Üí Select one of the Top Pick Trades listed for your chosen asset. Step 2: Setting Trade Details ‚Üí Quick Picks are displayed at the top for fast selection. ‚Üí Alternatively, customize your trade by setting the Price Range, Expiry Date, and Number of Tickets. Each ticket is valued at 20 USDT. ‚Üí Add additional trades for different products by clicking the + button. ‚Üí Review your selections and click Purchase All Tickets to proceed. Step 3: Confirming Your Trade When prompted, engage with the following windows for trade confirmation: Signature Request: A signature request window will appear first. Click Sign to authorize. Trade Execution: After signing, a confirmation window will appear. Click Confirm to finalize the trade. ‚úÖEnsure both actions are completed to successfully carry out your trade. Step 4: Trade Execution ‚Üí Congratulations! Your transaction has been successfully submitted on-chain. ‚úÖ Step 5: Monitoring Your Position ‚ÜíAccess the Position tab to view your trade details post trade-execution. Step 6: Claiming Your Payouts ‚Üí On settlement (expiry) date, go to the Position tab, open your trade ticket, and click Claim to receive your payouts. Bull Trend & Bear Trend Follows the same steps as outlined for the Rangebound product.

title: Surge
body: Surge Rangebound √âtape 1 : S√©lectionner votre produit ‚Üí Naviguez vers l'onglet Protocole et cliquez sur Surge. ‚Üí Choisissez le produit structur√© Rangebound. ‚Üí S√©lectionnez l'actif sous-jacent que vous pr√©f√©rez : BTC ou ETH. ‚Üí S√©lectionnez l'une des meilleures transactions recommand√©es pour l'actif choisi. √âtape 2 : D√©finir les d√©tails de la transaction ‚Üí Les s√©lections rapides sont affich√©es en haut pour une s√©lection rapide. ‚Üí Alternativement, personnalisez votre transaction en d√©finissant la Plage de Prix, la Date d'Expiration et le Nombre de Billets. Chaque billet est √©valu√© √† 20 USDT. ‚Üí Ajoutez des transactions suppl√©mentaires pour diff√©rents produits en cliquant sur le bouton +. ‚Üí Passez en revue vos s√©lections et cliquez sur Acheter Tous les Billets pour continuer. √âtape 3 : Confirmer votre transaction Lorsque vous y √™tes invit√©, interagissez avec les fen√™tres suivantes pour confirmer la transaction : Demande de Signature : Une fen√™tre de demande de signature appara√Ætra en premier. Cliquez sur Signer pour autoriser. Ex√©cution de la Transaction : Apr√®s avoir sign√©, une fen√™tre de confirmation appara√Ætra. Cliquez sur Confirmer pour finaliser la transaction. ‚úÖ Assurez-vous que les deux actions sont compl√©t√©es pour r√©aliser votre transaction avec succ√®s. √âtape 4 : Ex√©cution de la Transaction ‚Üí F√©licitations ! Votre transaction a √©t√© soumise avec succ√®s sur la cha√Æne. ‚úÖ √âtape 5 : Suivi de Votre Position ‚Üí Acc√©dez √† l'onglet Position pour voir les d√©tails de votre trade apr√®s l'ex√©cution de la transaction. √âtape 6 : R√©clamation de Vos Paiements ‚Üí √Ä la date de r√®glement (d'√©ch√©ance), allez √† l'onglet Position, ouvrez votre ticket de trade et cliquez sur R√©clamer pour recevoir vos paiements. Tendance Haussi√®re & Tendance Baissi√®re Suit les m√™mes √©tapes que celles d√©crites pour le produit Rangebound.

title: Surge
body: Surge Rangebound Step 1: Selectio Producti Tui ‚Üí Naviga ad tabulam Protocol et clicca in Surge. ‚Üí Elige productum structum Rangebound. ‚Üí Selecta fundamentum bonum quod malis‚ÄîBTC vel ETH. ‚Üí Selecta unum ex Optimum Electum Negotia enumerata pro bono tuo electo. Step 2: Statio Detalium Negotii ‚Üí Celeres Electus ostenduntur in summo pro celeri electione. ‚Üí Alternatim, personaliza negotium tuum statendo Range Pretii, Dies Exspirationis, et Numerum Tesserarum. Una tessera valet 20 USDT. ‚Üí Adde negotia additicia pro diversis productis cliccando in + puga. ‚Üí Recensere selectiones tuas et clicca Emere Omnes Tesseras ut procedas. Step 3: Confirmatio Negotii Tui Cum rogatus, interagere cum sequentibus fenestris pro confirmatione negotii: Petitionem Signaturae: Fenestram petitionis signaturae primum apparebit. Clicca Signa ut auctorizes. Exsecutio Negotii: Post signandum, fenestra confirmationis apparebit. Clicca Confirmare ut negotium finalizes. ‚úÖCerte utraque actio completa est ut negotium tuum feliciter peragatur. Step 4: Executio Negotiationis ‚Üí Gratulationes! Transactio tua in catena feliciter submissa est. ‚úÖ Step 5: Monitoratio Tuae Positionis ‚Üí Accede ad tabulam Positionis ut videas tua negotia post executionem negotiationis. Step 6: Postulationes Tuas Payoutorum ‚Üí In die solutionis (expirationis), ad tabulam Positionis vade, aperi tuum negotium ticket, et clicca Postula ut recipias tuas payouts. Trend Bull & Trend Bear Sequitur eadem vestigia quae pro productum Rangebound delineata sunt.

body: Surge Rangebound Step 1: Selecting Your Product ‚Üí ÿßŸÜÿ™ŸÇŸÑ ÿ•ŸÑŸâ ÿπŸÑÿßŸÖÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ®ŸàŸäÿ® Protocol ŸàÿßŸÜŸÇÿ± ÿπŸÑŸâ Surge. ‚Üí ÿßÿÆÿ™ÿ± ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ ÿßŸÑŸáŸäŸÉŸÑŸä Rangebound. ‚Üí ÿßÿÆÿ™ÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿµŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ≥ÿßÿ≥Ÿä ÿßŸÑÿ∞Ÿä ÿ™ŸÅÿ∂ŸÑŸá‚ÄîBTC ÿ£Ÿà ETH. ‚Üí ÿßÿÆÿ™ÿ± Ÿàÿßÿ≠ÿØÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿ£ŸÅÿ∂ŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿµŸÅŸÇÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿØÿ±ÿ¨ÿ© ŸÑŸÑÿ£ÿµŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿ∞Ÿä ÿßÿÆÿ™ÿ±ÿ™Ÿá. Step 2: Setting Trade Details ‚Üí Ÿäÿ™ŸÖ ÿπÿ±ÿ∂ ÿßŸÑÿßÿÆÿ™Ÿäÿßÿ±ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ÿ±Ÿäÿπÿ© ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿπŸÑŸâ ŸÑŸÑÿßÿÆÿ™Ÿäÿßÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ≥ÿ±Ÿäÿπ. ‚Üí ÿ®ÿØŸÑÿßŸã ŸÖŸÜ ÿ∞ŸÑŸÉÿå ŸÇŸÖ ÿ®ÿ™ÿÆÿµŸäÿµ ÿµŸÅŸÇÿ™ŸÉ ÿπŸÜ ÿ∑ÿ±ŸäŸÇ ÿ™ÿ≠ÿØŸäÿØ ŸÜÿ∑ÿßŸÇ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ÿπÿ±ÿå ÿ™ÿßÿ±ŸäÿÆ ÿßŸÑÿßŸÜÿ™Ÿáÿßÿ°ÿå ŸàÿπÿØÿØ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ∞ÿßŸÉÿ±. ŸÉŸÑ ÿ™ÿ∞ŸÉÿ±ÿ© ÿ™ÿ≥ÿßŸàŸä 20 USDT. ‚Üí ÿ£ÿ∂ŸÅ ÿµŸÅŸÇÿßÿ™ ÿ•ÿ∂ÿßŸÅŸäÿ© ŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ÿßÿ™ ŸÖÿÆÿ™ŸÑŸÅÿ© ÿπŸÜ ÿ∑ÿ±ŸäŸÇ ÿßŸÑŸÜŸÇÿ± ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿ≤ÿ± +. ‚Üí ÿ±ÿßÿ¨ÿπ ÿßÿÆÿ™Ÿäÿßÿ±ÿßÿ™ŸÉ ŸàÿßŸÜŸÇÿ± ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿ¥ÿ±ÿßÿ° ÿ¨ŸÖŸäÿπ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ∞ÿßŸÉÿ± ŸÑŸÑŸÖÿ™ÿßÿ®ÿπÿ©. Step 3: Confirming Your Trade ÿπŸÜÿØ ÿßŸÑÿ∑ŸÑÿ®ÿå ÿ™ŸÅÿßÿπŸÑ ŸÖÿπ ÿßŸÑŸÜŸàÿßŸÅÿ∞ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿßŸÑŸäÿ© ŸÑÿ™ÿ£ŸÉŸäÿØ ÿßŸÑÿµŸÅŸÇÿ©: ÿ∑ŸÑÿ® ÿßŸÑÿ™ŸàŸÇŸäÿπ: ÿ≥ÿ™ÿ∏Ÿáÿ± ŸÜÿßŸÅÿ∞ÿ© ÿ∑ŸÑÿ® ÿßŸÑÿ™ŸàŸÇŸäÿπ ÿ£ŸàŸÑÿßŸã. ÿßŸÜŸÇÿ± ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿ™ŸàŸÇŸäÿπ ŸÑŸÑÿ™ŸÅŸàŸäÿ∂. ÿ™ŸÜŸÅŸäÿ∞ ÿßŸÑÿµŸÅŸÇÿ©: ÿ®ÿπÿØ ÿßŸÑÿ™ŸàŸÇŸäÿπÿå ÿ≥ÿ™ÿ∏Ÿáÿ± ŸÜÿßŸÅÿ∞ÿ© ÿ™ÿ£ŸÉŸäÿØ. ÿßŸÜŸÇÿ± ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿ™ÿ£ŸÉŸäÿØ ŸÑÿ•ŸÜŸáÿßÿ° ÿßŸÑÿµŸÅŸÇÿ©. ‚úÖ ÿ™ÿ£ŸÉÿØ ŸÖŸÜ ÿ•ŸÉŸÖÿßŸÑ ŸÉŸÑÿß ÿßŸÑÿ•ÿ¨ÿ±ÿßÿ°ŸäŸÜ ŸÑÿ™ŸÜŸÅŸäÿ∞ ÿµŸÅŸÇÿ™ŸÉ ÿ®ŸÜÿ¨ÿßÿ≠. ÿßŸÑÿÆÿ∑Ÿàÿ© 4: ÿ™ŸÜŸÅŸäÿ∞ ÿßŸÑÿµŸÅŸÇÿ© ‚Üí ÿ™ŸáÿßŸÜŸäŸÜÿß! ÿ™ŸÖ ÿ™ŸÇÿØŸäŸÖ ŸÖÿπÿßŸÖŸÑÿ™ŸÉ ÿ®ŸÜÿ¨ÿßÿ≠ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ©. ‚úÖ ÿßŸÑÿÆÿ∑Ÿàÿ© 5: ŸÖÿ±ÿßŸÇÿ®ÿ© ŸÖÿ±ŸÉÿ≤ŸÉ ‚Üí ÿßŸÑŸàÿµŸàŸÑ ÿ•ŸÑŸâ ÿπŸÑÿßŸÖÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ±ŸÉÿ≤ ŸÑÿπÿ±ÿ∂ ÿ™ŸÅÿßÿµŸäŸÑ ÿµŸÅŸÇÿ™ŸÉ ÿ®ÿπÿØ ÿ™ŸÜŸÅŸäÿ∞ ÿßŸÑÿµŸÅŸÇÿ©. ÿßŸÑÿÆÿ∑Ÿàÿ© 6: ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ∑ÿßŸÑÿ®ÿ© ÿ®ŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿ≠ŸÇÿßÿ™ŸÉ ‚Üí ŸÅŸä ÿ™ÿßÿ±ŸäÿÆ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ≥ŸàŸäÿ© (ÿßŸÜÿ™Ÿáÿßÿ° ÿßŸÑÿµŸÑÿßÿ≠Ÿäÿ©)ÿå ÿßŸÜÿ™ŸÇŸÑ ÿ•ŸÑŸâ ÿπŸÑÿßŸÖÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ±ŸÉÿ≤ÿå ÿßŸÅÿ™ÿ≠ ÿ™ÿ∞ŸÉÿ±ÿ© ÿµŸÅŸÇÿ™ŸÉÿå ŸàÿßŸÜŸÇÿ± ÿπŸÑŸâ ŸÖÿ∑ÿßŸÑÿ®ÿ© ŸÑÿßÿ≥ÿ™ŸÑÿßŸÖ ŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿ≠ŸÇÿßÿ™ŸÉ. ÿßŸÑÿßÿ™ÿ¨ÿßŸá ÿßŸÑÿµÿßÿπÿØ ŸàÿßŸÑÿßÿ™ÿ¨ÿßŸá ÿßŸÑŸáÿßÿ®ÿ∑ Ÿäÿ™ÿ®ÿπ ŸÜŸÅÿ≥ ÿßŸÑÿÆÿ∑Ÿàÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸàÿ∂ÿ≠ÿ© ŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ ÿßŸÑŸÜÿ∑ÿßŸÇ.

body: Claiming your $RCH Rewards! üéÅ Click the Claim RCH button located at the upper right corner of the page. Then, press the Claim button to receive your $RCH token reward. Note: The system captures daily snapshots. $RCH tokens are available for claim every day at UTC 08:00 following the execution of your trade.

title: Technical Design
body: Product Scope The SOFA protocol will initially be focused on settling and tokenizing crypto structured products as our proof-of-concept. We are taking the 'road less travelled' to attack the most complex products first, where a successful deployment will see rapid expansion into all other crypto asset classes. The SOFA protocol will be launched on Ethereum and other L1 EVM blockchains to start. Protocol Workflow A high-level run-down of a typical trade execution via SOFA is as follows: Participating institutional market makers continuously stream executable prices on structured products to the protocol's dApp User selects and executes a particular structured product purchase based on the price shown User's committed assets are sent and locked in the product's DeFi vault The market maker's maximum premium exposure is also sent and locked in the vault Note: the transaction will not execute if either side fails to post their required assets at this point Corresponding Position Tokens claims (referencing asset details) will be minted to both the user and market maker, freely transferrable like any conventional ERC-20 token to any other wallet destination For 'Earn' structures only, the collateral in the vault would be staked into mature and safe yield earn protocols like Compound, AAVE and etc. to earn a base level of interest for users Extra careful scrutiny will be placed on this step, with eligible destinations voted on by the Governance Token holders Finally, upon product expiry, the relevant payout will be released and claimable in the vault by both the user and the market maker Should the respective Position Tokens be transferred to a new wallet, the owner of the address will instead be able to claim the asset at anytime post-expiry Token Standards (ERC-1155) The SOFA protocol tokenizes users' chain-locked positions via the ERC-1155 multi-token standard, recording vital position details such as [Expiry], [Anchor Prices], [Maker/Taker Toggle], and other fields as relevant to the instrument in question. Compared to conventional single-asset token standards, ERC-1155 allows the creation and management of multiple types of tokens within a single contract, with support for each type of token having different properties. Positions with the same parameters can still be merged or split, while enabling transfers as conveniently as standard ERC-20 tokens. This innovation strikes a balance between wide asset compatibility, high flexibility, and gas efficiency. Position Tokens with the same Strike Price and Expiry Time are fungible like any standard token, and can be batch settled in a single operation to allow significant gas savings.

title: Í∏∞Ïà† ÏÑ§Í≥Ñ
body: Ï†úÌíà Î≤îÏúÑ SOFA ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏùÄ Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò Í∞úÎÖê Ï¶ùÎ™ÖÏùÑ ÏúÑÌï¥ ÏïîÌò∏Ìôî Íµ¨Ï°∞ÌôîÎêú Ï†úÌíàÏùò Ï†ïÏÇ∞ Î∞è ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÌôîÏóê Ï≤òÏùå ÏßëÏ§ëÌï† Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Ïö∞Î¶¨Îäî Í∞ÄÏû• Î≥µÏû°Ìïú Ï†úÌíàÏùÑ Î®ºÏ†Ä Í≥µÍ≤©ÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ 'Îçú Ïó¨ÌñâÌïú Í∏∏'ÏùÑ ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌïòÍ≥† ÏûàÏúºÎ©∞, ÏÑ±Í≥µÏ†ÅÏù∏ Î∞∞Ìè¨Îäî Î™®Îì† Îã§Î•∏ ÏïîÌò∏ ÏûêÏÇ∞ ÌÅ¥ÎûòÏä§Ïóê Îπ†Î•∏ ÌôïÏû•ÏùÑ Í∞ÄÏ†∏Ïò¨ Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. SOFA ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏùÄ Ethereum Î∞è Í∏∞ÌÉÄ L1 EVM Î∏îÎ°ùÏ≤¥Ïù∏ÏóêÏÑú ÏãúÏûëÎê† Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú ÏõåÌÅ¨ÌîåÎ°úÏö∞ SOFAÎ•º ÌÜµÌïú Ï†ÑÌòïÏ†ÅÏù∏ Í±∞Îûò Ïã§ÌñâÏùò Í≥†ÏàòÏ§Ä Í∞úÏöîÎäî Îã§ÏùåÍ≥º Í∞ôÏäµÎãàÎã§: Ï∞∏Ïó¨ÌïòÎäî Í∏∞Í¥Ä ÏãúÏû• Ï°∞ÏÑ±ÏûêÎäî Íµ¨Ï°∞ÌôîÎêú Ï†úÌíàÏóê ÎåÄÌïú Ïã§Ìñâ Í∞ÄÎä•Ìïú Í∞ÄÍ≤©ÏùÑ ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏùò dAppÏóê ÏßÄÏÜçÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Ïä§Ìä∏Î¶¨Î∞çÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÎäî ÌëúÏãúÎêú Í∞ÄÍ≤©ÏùÑ Í∏∞Î∞òÏúºÎ°ú ÌäπÏ†ï Íµ¨Ï°∞ÌôîÎêú Ï†úÌíà Íµ¨Îß§Î•º ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌïòÍ≥† Ïã§ÌñâÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÍ∞Ä Ïª§Î∞ãÌïú ÏûêÏÇ∞ÏùÄ Ï†úÌíàÏùò DeFi Í∏àÍ≥†Î°ú Ï†ÑÏÜ°ÎêòÏñ¥ Ïû†Í∏àÎê©ÎãàÎã§. ÏãúÏû• Ï°∞ÏÑ±ÏûêÏùò ÏµúÎåÄ ÌîÑÎ¶¨ÎØ∏ÏóÑ ÎÖ∏Ï∂úÎèÑ Í∏àÍ≥†Ïóê Ï†ÑÏÜ°ÎêòÏñ¥ Ïû†Í∏àÎê©ÎãàÎã§. Ï∞∏Í≥†: Ïù¥ ÏãúÏ†êÏóêÏÑú Ïñ¥Îäê ÌïúÏ™ΩÏù¥ ÏöîÍµ¨Îêú ÏûêÏÇ∞ÏùÑ Í≤åÏãúÌïòÏßÄ ÏïäÏúºÎ©¥ Í±∞ÎûòÍ∞Ä Ïã§ÌñâÎêòÏßÄ ÏïäÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ìï¥Îãπ Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ Ï≤≠Íµ¨(ÏûêÏÇ∞ ÏÑ∏Î∂ÄÏ†ïÎ≥¥ Ï∞∏Ï°∞)Îäî ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÏôÄ ÏãúÏû• Ï°∞ÏÑ±Ïûê Î™®ÎëêÏóêÍ≤å Î∞úÌñâÎêòÎ©∞, ÏùºÎ∞òÏ†ÅÏù∏ ERC-20 ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞Ï≤òÎüº Îã§Î•∏ ÏßÄÍ∞ëÏúºÎ°ú ÏûêÏú†Î°≠Í≤å Ï†ÑÏÜ°Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. 'Earn' Íµ¨Ï°∞Ïóê ÎåÄÌï¥ÏÑúÎßå, Í∏àÍ≥†Ïùò Îã¥Î≥¥Îäî Compound, AAVE Îì±Í≥º Í∞ôÏùÄ ÏÑ±ÏàôÌïòÍ≥† ÏïàÏ†ÑÌïú ÏàòÏùµ Ï∞ΩÏ∂ú ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏóê Ïä§ÌÖåÏù¥ÌÇπÎêòÏñ¥ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÏóêÍ≤å Í∏∞Î≥∏ ÏàòÏ§ÄÏùò Ïù¥ÏûêÎ•º ÏñªÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥ Îã®Í≥ÑÏóê ÎåÄÌï¥ÏÑúÎäî Governance Token Î≥¥Ïú†ÏûêÏóê ÏùòÌï¥ Ìà¨ÌëúÎêú Ï†ÅÍ≤© Î™©Ï†ÅÏßÄÏóê ÎåÄÌï¥ Îß§Ïö∞ Ïã†Ï§ëÌïú Í≤ÄÌÜ†Í∞Ä Ïù¥Î£®Ïñ¥Ïßà Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. ÎßàÏßÄÎßâÏúºÎ°ú, Ï†úÌíà ÎßåÎ£å Ïãú Í¥ÄÎ†® ÏßÄÍ∏âÍ∏àÏù¥ Ìï¥Ï†úÎêòÏñ¥ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÏôÄ ÏãúÏû• Ï°∞ÏÑ±ÏûêÍ∞Ä Í∏àÍ≥†ÏóêÏÑú Ï≤≠Íµ¨Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ìï¥Îãπ Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞Ïù¥ ÏÉàÎ°úÏö¥ ÏßÄÍ∞ëÏúºÎ°ú Ï†ÑÏÜ°Îê† Í≤ΩÏö∞, Ï£ºÏÜåÏùò ÏÜåÏú†ÏûêÎäî ÎßåÎ£å ÌõÑ Ïñ∏Ï†úÎì†ÏßÄ ÏûêÏÇ∞ÏùÑ Ï≤≠Íµ¨Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ ÌëúÏ§Ä (ERC-1155) SOFA ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏùÄ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÏùò Ï≤¥Ïù∏ Ïû†Í∏à Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖòÏùÑ ERC-1155 Îã§Ï§ë ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ ÌëúÏ§ÄÏùÑ ÌÜµÌï¥ ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÌôîÌïòÎ©∞, [ÎßåÎ£å], [Í∏∞Ï§Ä Í∞ÄÍ≤©], [Ï†úÏûëÏûê/ÏàòÏ∑®Ïù∏ Ï†ÑÌôò] Î∞è Ìï¥Îãπ Í∏àÏúµ ÏÉÅÌíàÍ≥º Í¥ÄÎ†®Îêú Í∏∞ÌÉÄ ÌïÑÏàò ÏÑ∏Î∂ÄÏ†ïÎ≥¥Î•º Í∏∞Î°ùÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Ï†ÑÌÜµÏ†ÅÏù∏ Îã®Ïùº ÏûêÏÇ∞ ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ ÌëúÏ§ÄÏóê ÎπÑÌï¥ ERC-1155Îäî Îã®Ïùº Í≥ÑÏïΩ ÎÇ¥ÏóêÏÑú Ïó¨Îü¨ Ïú†ÌòïÏùò ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÏùÑ ÏÉùÏÑ±ÌïòÍ≥† Í¥ÄÎ¶¨Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏúºÎ©∞, Í∞Å Ïú†ÌòïÏùò ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞Ïù¥ ÏÑúÎ°ú Îã§Î•∏ ÏÜçÏÑ±ÏùÑ Í∞ÄÏßà Ïàò ÏûàÎèÑÎ°ù ÏßÄÏõêÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ÎèôÏùºÌïú Îß§Í∞úÎ≥ÄÏàòÎ•º Í∞ÄÏßÑ Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖòÏùÄ Ïó¨Ï†ÑÌûà Î≥ëÌï©ÎêòÍ±∞ÎÇò Î∂ÑÌï†Îê† Ïàò ÏûàÏúºÎ©∞, ÌëúÏ§Ä ERC-20 ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞Ï≤òÎüº Ìé∏Î¶¨ÌïòÍ≤å Ï†ÑÏÜ°Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥ ÌòÅÏã†ÏùÄ ÎÑìÏùÄ ÏûêÏÇ∞ Ìò∏ÌôòÏÑ±, ÎÜíÏùÄ Ïú†Ïó∞ÏÑ± Î∞è Í∞ÄÏä§ Ìö®Ïú®ÏÑ± Í∞ÑÏùò Í∑†ÌòïÏùÑ Ïù¥Î£πÎãàÎã§. ÎèôÏùºÌïú ÌñâÏÇ¨Í∞ÄÍ≤©Í≥º ÎßåÎ£å ÏãúÍ∞ÑÏùÑ Í∞ÄÏßÑ Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÏùÄ ÌëúÏ§Ä ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞Ï≤òÎüº ÎåÄÏ≤¥ Í∞ÄÎä•ÌïòÎ©∞, Îã®Ïùº ÏûëÏóÖÏúºÎ°ú ÏùºÍ¥Ñ Ï†ïÏÇ∞Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏñ¥ ÏÉÅÎãπÌïú Í∞ÄÏä§ Ï†àÏïΩÏù¥ Í∞ÄÎä•Ìï©ÎãàÎã§.

Â§ö‰ª£Â∏ÅÊ†áÂáÜÂØπÁî®Êà∑ÁöÑÈìæ‰∏äÈîÅÂÆöÂ§¥ÂØ∏ËøõË°å‰ª£Â∏ÅÂåñÔºåËÆ∞ÂΩïÈáçË¶ÅÁöÑÂ§¥ÂØ∏ÁªÜËäÇÔºåÂ¶Ç[Âà∞Êúü]„ÄÅ[ÈîöÂÆö‰ª∑Ê†º]„ÄÅ[ÂÅöÂ∏Ç/Êé•ÂçïÂàáÊç¢]‰ª•Âèä‰∏éÁõ∏ÂÖ≥Â∑•ÂÖ∑Áõ∏ÂÖ≥ÁöÑÂÖ∂‰ªñÂ≠óÊÆµ„ÄÇ ÂÖÅËÆ∏Âú®Âçï‰∏™ÂêàÁ∫¶‰∏≠ÂàõÂª∫ÂíåÁÆ°ÁêÜÂ§öÁßçÁ±ªÂûãÁöÑ‰ª£Â∏ÅÔºåÂπ∂ÊîØÊåÅÊØèÁßçÁ±ªÂûãÁöÑ‰ª£Â∏ÅÂÖ∑Êúâ‰∏çÂêåÁöÑÂ±ûÊÄß„ÄÇÂÖ∑ÊúâÁõ∏ÂêåÂèÇÊï∞ÁöÑÂ§¥ÂØ∏‰ªçÁÑ∂ÂèØ‰ª•ÂêàÂπ∂ÊàñÊãÜÂàÜÔºåÂêåÊó∂ÂÆûÁé∞ÂÉèÊ†áÂáÜ title: Conception technique
body: Port√©e du produit Le protocole SOFA sera initialement ax√© sur le r√®glement et la tokenisation des produits structur√©s crypto en tant que preuve de concept. Nous prenons le 'chemin moins fr√©quent√©' pour attaquer d'abord les produits les plus complexes, o√π un d√©ploiement r√©ussi verra une expansion rapide dans toutes les autres classes d'actifs crypto. Le protocole SOFA sera lanc√© sur Ethereum et d'autres blockchains L1 EVM pour commencer. Flux de travail du protocole Un aper√ßu de haut niveau d'une ex√©cution de trade typique via SOFA est le suivant : Les teneurs de march√© institutionnels participants diffusent en continu des prix ex√©cutables sur des produits structur√©s vers l'application d√©centralis√©e du protocole L'utilisateur s√©lectionne et ex√©cute un achat de produit structur√© particulier bas√© sur le prix affich√© Les actifs engag√©s de l'utilisateur sont envoy√©s et verrouill√©s dans le coffre DeFi du produit L'exposition maximale de prime du teneur de march√© est √©galement envoy√©e et verrouill√©e dans le coffre Remarque : la transaction ne s'ex√©cutera pas si l'une ou l'autre des parties ne parvient pas √† poster ses actifs requis √† ce stade Des revendications de jetons de position correspondants (r√©f√©rencant les d√©tails des actifs) seront frapp√©es pour l'utilisateur et le teneur de march√©, librement transf√©rables comme tout autre jeton ERC-20 conventionnel vers toute autre destination de portefeuille Pour les structures 'Earn' uniquement, la garantie dans le coffre serait mise en jeu dans des protocoles de rendement matures et s√ªrs comme Compound, AAVE, etc. pour g√©n√©rer un niveau de base d'int√©r√™t pour les utilisateurs Une attention particuli√®re sera port√©e √† cette √©tape, avec des destinations √©ligibles vot√©es par les d√©tenteurs de jetons de gouvernance Enfin, √† l'expiration du produit, le paiement pertinent sera lib√©r√© et r√©clamable dans le coffre par l'utilisateur et le teneur de march√© Si les jetons de position respectifs sont transf√©r√©s vers un nouveau portefeuille, le propri√©taire de l'adresse pourra alors r√©clamer l'actif √† tout moment apr√®s l'expiration Normes de jetons (ERC-1155) Le protocole SOFA tokenise les positions verrouill√©es sur la cha√Æne des utilisateurs via la norme de jeton multi-ERC-1155, enregistrant des d√©tails vitaux de position tels que [Expiration], [Prix d'ancrage], [Bascule Maker/Taker], et d'autres champs pertinents pour l'instrument en question. Compar√© aux normes de jetons √† actif unique conventionnelles, l'ERC-1155 permet la cr√©ation et la gestion de plusieurs types de jetons au sein d'un seul contrat, avec un support pour chaque type de jeton ayant des propri√©t√©s diff√©rentes. Les positions avec les m√™mes param√®tres peuvent toujours √™tre fusionn√©es ou divis√©es, tout en permettant des transferts aussi facilement que des jetons ERC-20 standard. Cette innovation trouve un √©quilibre entre une large compatibilit√© des actifs, une grande flexibilit√© et une efficacit√© en gaz. Les jetons de position avec le m√™me prix d'exercice et le m√™me temps d'expiration sont fongibles comme tout jeton standard, et peuvent √™tre r√©gl√©s en lot en une seule op√©ration pour permettre des √©conomies de gaz significatives.

title: Consilium Technicum
body: Productum Ambitum Protocolum SOFA initio in stabilendis et tokenizandis productis structuris crypto versabitur ut nostra probatio conceptus. Iter 'minus pervium' capimus ad primum complexissimas productas oppugnandas, ubi prospera exsecutio celerem expansionem in omnes alias classes crypto bonorum videbit. Protocolum SOFA in Ethereum et aliis L1 EVM blockchainibus ad initium lanched. Protocolum Laboris Fluxus Summarium altum exsecutio commercii typici per SOFA sequitur: Participantes institutionalium mercatus facientes continuas pretia exsecutabilia in productis structuris ad dApp protocolum fluunt Usor eliget et exsecutur emptio particularis producti structuri secundum pretium ostentum Bona compromissa usoris mittuntur et in vault DeFi producti clauduntur Maxima premium exposita mercatus facientis etiam mittitur et in vault clauditur Nota: transactio non exsecutur si utraque pars non sua bona requirenda ad hanc punctum ponit Correspondentes Position Tokens iura (referentia ad bona details) erunt ad utrumque usorem et mercatum facientem, libere transferibilia sicut quilibet conventionalis ERC-20 token ad quamlibet aliam destinationem nummariam Pro structuris 'Merere' tantum, collateralis in vault in maturis et tutis protocolis mercedis sicut Compound, AAVE et cetera stabulabitur ad mercedem basim usoribus Extra diligens scrutinio in hoc gradu impendetur, cum destinationibus eligibilibus a possessores Governance Token suffragatis Denique, post expirationem producti, relevantis solutio dimittetur et in vault a utroque usu et mercatu faciente reclamabilis erit Si respective Position Tokens ad novum nummarium transferantur, dominus inscriptionis poterit potius bonum reclamare quovis tempore post expirationem Token Standards (ERC-1155) Protocolum SOFA tokenizat positiones usorum in catena-clusis per standardum multi-token ERC-1155, vitales positionis details ut [Expirationem], [Pretium Anchor], [Maker/Taker Toggle], et alia campa relevantia instrumenti in quaestionem recordans. Comparatum ad conventionales standards token singularis bonorum, ERC-1155 creatio et administratio plurium generum tokenorum intra unam contractum permittit, cum subsidio pro quolibet genere token habentibus diversas proprietates. Positiones cum eadem parametris adhuc coniungi vel dividi possunt, dum transferentur tam commode quam standard ERC-20 tokens. Haec innovatio aequilibrium inter latam compatibilitatem bonorum, altam flexibilitatem, et efficientiam gasorum constituit. Position Tokens cum eodem Pretio Strike et Tempore Expirationis fungibiles sunt sicut quilibet standard token, et in una operatione batch solvuntur ad significantes gasum servationes permittere.

title: Vault Classification
body: Vault Classification The Vault contract uses the ERC-1155 standard to support fungibility of Position Tokens with the same strike price and expiry time. Tokens with different strike prices or the expiration time will have different Token IDs (ie. like a NFT) while still contained under the same Vault contract. The SOFA protocol is designed with the flexibility to support any structured product type and collateral denomination, though a distinction will be made on whether the underlying product contains a 'principal protection' feature or not. As such, our Vault designs are split into 2 major, self-explanatory product categories called 'Earn' and 'Surge'. Example Vault Taxonomy at SOFA Launch Available Products at Launch As our inaugural proof-of-concept, we will initially focus on three popular product structures called 'Rangebound' and 'Trend'. Furthermore, all of these products are available in either Earn or Surge protocols. Moreover, additional product types will be continually added based on user demand and ecosystem feedback. Rangebond Products Product Overview Rangebound products are a type of structured product based on price boundaries. Depositors can profit if the underlying asset does not touch the preset barriers during the observation period before maturity. These products are suitable for users who expect the market to stay in a sideways consolidation phase with subdued volatility. Referring to the payoff diagram below, a user believes that BTC will be stuck between a range as defined by the lower and upper barriers, but does not want to incur much downside even if the view proves to be wrong. The Rangebound product will guarantee the user a minimum base yield of (A) even if the price of Range breaks out from either side, but the user will be entitled to an extra profit return equivalent to (A+B) should prices stay contained within the barriers. For customization options, the user is free to adjust the width of the price range, which would incur a different profile of base and upside profits depending on the levels chosen. Naturally, specifying a tighter price range represents a more aggressive bet on low volatility, which would lead to higher upside returns. Conversely, a wider price range would lower excess profits in return a higher probability of winning. Finally, for ease of management, the product can specified to be automatically 're-rolled' upon maturity as a continuation bet at a later protocol upgrade . (The 're-roll' function will be rolled out in the next phase of the upgrade). Trend Products Product Overview The Trend product is suitable for depositors who expect that the market will soon undergo a smooth and steady trend, but still desires some downside protection. By defining both a lower and upper price barrier, users will start accruing income gains as soon as the underlying instrument crosses the initial price threshold, with increasing payouts until we hit a maximum at the 2nd boundary. Moreover, unlike the Rangebound product, the Trend product only observes at the time of settlement whether the price of the underlying asset falls within the set range to determine the final profit (ie. European option). This product is available via both Bullish and Bearish expressions. As an example, if a user is bullish on BTC and predicts that in the next seven days, the price of BTC will remain above $68,500 but will not exceed $71,500, they can choose to buy a Bull Trend product, setting $68,500 as the lower limit and $71,500 as the upper limit of the profit range. Referring to the diagram below, at the time of settlement, the user will be eligible for a payout between base profit of (A) to and upper limit of (A+B), depending on what the price of BTC is at the time. Applicable Scenarios The product might be suitable for depositors who believe that an asset will see a strong reaction to a specific economic event, but is also concerned about the risk of a price decline should they be wrong in their market prognosis. For example, the user might desire to speculate on BTC prices on the next FOMC decision, the having event, or the next ETF approval announcement. This strategy is appropriate for users holding a strong market conviction into these important but risky events, and wants to remain disciplined in managing downside losses should his/her view turn out to be wrong. Shark Fin (For Later) Product Overview Compared to Rangebound and Trend products, the 'Shark Fin' product is relatively more well-known in TradFi markets thanks to its memorable moniker. Its design and payoff are similar to Trend (ie. European option), with the main exception being that the depositor is speculating much more aggressively on prices being within a particular range. Said in another way, the Shark Fin product adopts a more conservative view on market volatility by sacrificing more upside on a large market move, in return for more aggressive profits within the lower price boundaries. As example, let's say an user is bullish on BTC, but holds a high conviction that it will not breach a certain upper bound at some strong technical resistance level. In such a scenario, the user can choose to buy a Bullish Shark Fin product with a payoff profile as per the diagram below. At product settlement, the user will receive a return ranging from (A) to (A+B) depending on where spot BTC is; however, unlike in Trend products, note that the return drops to (A+C) upon a breach of the upper price barrier, offering a trade-off in exchange for more aggressive profits in the preceding range.

body: Í∏àÍ≥† Î∂ÑÎ•ò Í∏àÍ≥† Í≥ÑÏïΩÏùÄ ERC-1155 ÌëúÏ§ÄÏùÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÏó¨ ÎèôÏùºÌïú ÌñâÏÇ¨Í∞ÄÍ≤©Í≥º ÎßåÍ∏∞ ÏãúÍ∞ÑÏùÑ Í∞ÄÏßÑ Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖò ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞Ïùò Ïú†ÎèôÏÑ±ÏùÑ ÏßÄÏõêÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ÌñâÏÇ¨Í∞ÄÍ≤©Ïù¥ÎÇò ÎßåÍ∏∞ ÏãúÍ∞ÑÏù¥ Îã§Î•∏ ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÏùÄ ÏÑúÎ°ú Îã§Î•∏ ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ ID(Ï¶â, NFTÏôÄ Ïú†ÏÇ¨)Î•º Í∞ÄÏßÄÏßÄÎßå Ïó¨Ï†ÑÌûà ÎèôÏùºÌïú Í∏àÍ≥† Í≥ÑÏïΩ ÎÇ¥Ïóê Ìè¨Ìï®Îê©ÎãàÎã§. SOFA ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏùÄ Î™®Îì† Íµ¨Ï°∞ÌôîÎêú Ï†úÌíà Ïú†ÌòïÍ≥º Îã¥Î≥¥ Îã®ÏúÑÎ•º ÏßÄÏõêÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÎäî Ïú†Ïó∞ÏÑ±ÏùÑ Í∞ÄÏßÄÍ≥† ÏÑ§Í≥ÑÎêòÏóàÏßÄÎßå, Í∏∞Î≥∏ Ï†úÌíàÏóê 'ÏõêÍ∏à Î≥¥Ìò∏' Í∏∞Îä•Ïù¥ Ìè¨Ìï®ÎêòÏñ¥ ÏûàÎäîÏßÄ Ïó¨Î∂ÄÏóê Îî∞Îùº Íµ¨Î∂ÑÏù¥ Ïù¥Î£®Ïñ¥ÏßëÎãàÎã§. Îî∞ÎùºÏÑú Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò Í∏àÍ≥† ÏÑ§Í≥ÑÎäî 'Earn'Í≥º 'Surge'ÎùºÎäî Îëê Í∞ÄÏßÄ Ï£ºÏöî ÏûêÎ™ÖÌïú Ï†úÌíà Ïπ¥ÌÖåÍ≥†Î¶¨Î°ú ÎÇòÎâ©ÎãàÎã§. SOFA Ï∂úÏãú Ïãú Í∏àÍ≥† Î∂ÑÎ•ò ÏòàÏãú Ï∂úÏãú Ïãú ÏÇ¨Ïö© Í∞ÄÎä•Ìïú Ï†úÌíà Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò Ï≤´ Î≤àÏß∏ Í∞úÎÖê Ï¶ùÎ™ÖÏúºÎ°ú, Ïö∞Î¶¨Îäî 'Rangebound'ÏôÄ 'Trend'ÎùºÎäî ÏÑ∏ Í∞ÄÏßÄ Ïù∏Í∏∞ ÏûàÎäî Ï†úÌíà Íµ¨Ï°∞Ïóê Ï≤òÏùå ÏßëÏ§ëÌï† Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. ÎòêÌïú, Ïù¥Îü¨Ìïú Î™®Îì† Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ Earn ÎòêÎäî Surge ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏóêÏÑú ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Í≤åÎã§Í∞Ä, ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê ÏàòÏöîÏôÄ ÏÉùÌÉúÍ≥Ñ ÌîºÎìúÎ∞±Ïóê Îî∞Îùº Ï∂îÍ∞Ä Ï†úÌíà Ïú†ÌòïÏù¥ ÏßÄÏÜçÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÎê† Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Î†àÏù∏ÏßÄÎ∞îÏö¥Îìú Ï†úÌíà Ï†úÌíà Í∞úÏöî Î†àÏù∏ÏßÄÎ∞îÏö¥Îìú Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ Í∞ÄÍ≤© Í≤ΩÍ≥ÑÏóê Í∏∞Î∞òÌïú Íµ¨Ï°∞ÌôîÎêú Ï†úÌíàÏùò ÏùºÏ¢ÖÏûÖÎãàÎã§. ÏòàÏπòÏûêÎäî Í∏∞Ï¥à ÏûêÏÇ∞Ïù¥ ÎßåÍ∏∞ Ï†Ñ Í¥ÄÏ∞∞ Í∏∞Í∞Ñ ÎèôÏïà ÏÑ§Ï†ïÎêú Ïû•Î≤ΩÏóê ÎãøÏßÄ ÏïäÏúºÎ©¥ Ïù¥ÏùµÏùÑ ÏñªÏùÑ Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥Îü¨Ìïú Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ ÏãúÏû•Ïù¥ Ï†ÄÏ°∞Ìïú Î≥ÄÎèôÏÑ±ÏúºÎ°ú Ï∏°Î©¥ ÌÜµÌï© Îã®Í≥ÑÏóê Î®∏Î¨¥Î•º Í≤ÉÏúºÎ°ú ÏòàÏÉÅÌïòÎäî ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÏóêÍ≤å Ï†ÅÌï©Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ÏïÑÎûòÏùò ÏàòÏùµ Îã§Ïù¥Ïñ¥Í∑∏Îû®ÏùÑ Ï∞∏Ï°∞ÌïòÎ©¥, ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÎäî BTCÍ∞Ä ÌïòÌïú Î∞è ÏÉÅÌïú Ïû•Î≤ΩÏúºÎ°ú Ï†ïÏùòÎêú Î≤îÏúÑ ÎÇ¥Ïóê Í∞áÌûê Í≤ÉÏù¥ÎùºÍ≥† ÎØøÏßÄÎßå, Í∑∏ Í≤¨Ìï¥Í∞Ä ÏûòÎ™ªÎêòÎçîÎùºÎèÑ ÌÅ∞ ÌïòÎùΩÏùÑ Í∞êÏàòÌïòÍ≥† Ïã∂ÏßÄ ÏïäÏäµÎãàÎã§. Î†àÏù∏ÏßÄÎ∞îÏö¥Îìú Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ Í∞ÄÍ≤©Ïù¥ Ïñ¥Îäê Ï™ΩÏóêÏÑúÎì† Î≤îÏúÑÎ•º Î≤óÏñ¥ÎÇòÎçîÎùºÎèÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÏóêÍ≤å ÏµúÏÜå Í∏∞Î≥∏ ÏàòÏùµ (A)ÏùÑ Î≥¥Ïû•ÌïòÏßÄÎßå, Í∞ÄÍ≤©Ïù¥ Ïû•Î≤Ω ÎÇ¥Ïóê Ïú†ÏßÄÎê† Í≤ΩÏö∞ (A+B)Ïóê Ìï¥ÎãπÌïòÎäî Ï∂îÍ∞Ä Ïù¥ÏùµÏùÑ Î∞õÏùÑ Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÎäî Í∞ÄÍ≤© Î≤îÏúÑÏùò ÎÑàÎπÑÎ•º Ï°∞Ï†ïÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏúºÎ©∞, ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌïú ÏàòÏ§ÄÏóê Îî∞Îùº Í∏∞Î≥∏ Î∞è ÏÉÅÏäπ Ïù¥ÏùµÏùò ÌîÑÎ°úÌïÑÏù¥ Îã¨ÎùºÏßëÎãàÎã§. ÏûêÏó∞Ïä§ÎüΩÍ≤å, Îçî Ï¢ÅÏùÄ Í∞ÄÍ≤© Î≤îÏúÑÎ•º ÏßÄÏ†ïÌïòÎ©¥ ÎÇÆÏùÄ Î≥ÄÎèôÏÑ±Ïóê ÎåÄÌïú Î≥¥Îã§ Í≥µÍ≤©Ï†ÅÏù∏ Î≤†ÌåÖÏùÑ ÎÇòÌÉÄÎÇ¥Î©∞, Ïù¥Îäî Îçî ÎÜíÏùÄ ÏÉÅÏäπ ÏàòÏùµÏúºÎ°ú Ïù¥Ïñ¥ÏßëÎãàÎã§. Î∞òÎåÄÎ°ú, Îçî ÎÑìÏùÄ Í∞ÄÍ≤© Î≤îÏúÑÎäî Îçî ÎÜíÏùÄ ÏäπÎ¶¨ ÌôïÎ•†Ïóê ÎåÄÌïú ÎåÄÍ∞ÄÎ°ú Ï¥àÍ≥º Ïù¥ÏùµÏùÑ Ï§ÑÏûÖÎãàÎã§. ÎßàÏßÄÎßâÏúºÎ°ú, Í¥ÄÎ¶¨Ïùò Ïö©Ïù¥ÏÑ±ÏùÑ ÏúÑÌï¥, Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ ÎßåÍ∏∞ Ïãú ÏûêÎèôÏúºÎ°ú 'Ïû¨Î°§'ÎêòÎèÑÎ°ù ÏßÄÏ†ïÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏúºÎ©∞, Ïù¥Îäî Ïù¥ÌõÑ ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú ÏóÖÍ∑∏Î†àÏù¥ÎìúÏóêÏÑúÏùò Ïó∞ÏÜç Î≤†ÌåÖÏúºÎ°ú Ïù¥Ïñ¥ÏßëÎãàÎã§. ('Ïû¨Î°§' Í∏∞Îä•ÏùÄ ÏóÖÍ∑∏Î†àÏù¥ÎìúÏùò Îã§Ïùå Îã®Í≥ÑÏóêÏÑú Ï∂úÏãúÎê† ÏòàÏ†ïÏûÖÎãàÎã§). Ìä∏Î†åÎìú Ï†úÌíà Ï†úÌíà Í∞úÏöî Ìä∏Î†åÎìú Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ ÏãúÏû•Ïù¥ Í≥ß Î∂ÄÎìúÎüΩÍ≥† ÏïàÏ†ïÏ†ÅÏù∏ Ï∂îÏÑ∏Î•º Í≤™ÏùÑ Í≤ÉÏúºÎ°ú ÏòàÏÉÅÌïòÏßÄÎßå Ïó¨Ï†ÑÌûà ÏùºÎ∂Ä ÌïòÎùΩ Î≥¥Ìò∏Î•º ÏõêÌïòÎäî ÏòàÏπòÏûêÏóêÍ≤å Ï†ÅÌï©Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ÌïòÌïú Î∞è ÏÉÅÌïú Í∞ÄÍ≤© Ïû•Î≤ΩÏùÑ Ï†ïÏùòÌï®ÏúºÎ°úÏç®, ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÎäî Í∏∞Ï¥à ÏûêÏÇ∞Ïù¥ Ï¥àÍ∏∞ Í∞ÄÍ≤© ÏûÑÍ≥ÑÍ∞íÏùÑ Ï¥àÍ≥ºÌïòÎäî Ï¶âÏãú ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ Ï∂ïÏ†ÅÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏãúÏûëÌïòÎ©∞, Îëê Î≤àÏß∏ Ïû•Î≤ΩÏóê ÎèÑÎã¨Ìï† ÎïåÍπåÏßÄ ÏßÄÍ∏âÏï°Ïù¥ Ï¶ùÍ∞ÄÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ÎòêÌïú, Î†àÏù∏ÏßÄÎ∞îÏö¥Îìú Ï†úÌíàÍ≥º Îã¨Î¶¨ Ìä∏Î†åÎìú Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ ÏµúÏ¢Ö Ïù¥ÏùµÏùÑ Í≤∞Ï†ïÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ Í∏∞Ï¥à ÏûêÏÇ∞Ïùò Í∞ÄÍ≤©Ïù¥ ÏÑ§Ï†ïÎêú Î≤îÏúÑ ÎÇ¥Ïóê ÏûàÎäîÏßÄ Ïó¨Î∂ÄÎ•º Ï†ïÏÇ∞ ÏãúÏ†êÏóêÏÑúÎßå Í¥ÄÏ∞∞Ìï©ÎãàÎã§(Ï¶â, Ïú†ÎüΩÏãù ÏòµÏÖò). Ïù¥ Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ Í∞ïÏÑ∏ Î∞è ÏïΩÏÑ∏ ÌëúÌòÑ Î™®ÎëêÏóêÏÑú ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÏòàÎ•º Îì§Ïñ¥, ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÍ∞Ä BTCÏóê ÎåÄÌï¥ Í∞ïÏÑ∏Î•º Î≥¥Ïù¥Í≥† Îã§Ïùå 7Ïùº ÎèôÏïà BTC Í∞ÄÍ≤©Ïù¥ $68,500 Ïù¥ÏÉÅÏù¥ÏßÄÎßå $71,500ÏùÑ Ï¥àÍ≥ºÌïòÏßÄ ÏïäÏùÑ Í≤ÉÏù¥ÎùºÍ≥† ÏòàÏ∏°ÌïòÎäî Í≤ΩÏö∞, Í∑∏Îì§ÏùÄ $68,500ÏùÑ ÌïòÌïúÏúºÎ°ú, $71,500ÏùÑ Ïù¥Ïùµ Î≤îÏúÑÏùò ÏÉÅÌïúÏúºÎ°ú ÏÑ§Ï†ïÌïòÏó¨ Bull Trend Ï†úÌíàÏùÑ Íµ¨Îß§Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÏïÑÎûòÏùò Îã§Ïù¥Ïñ¥Í∑∏Îû®ÏùÑ Ï∞∏Ï°∞ÌïòÎ©¥, Ï†ïÏÇ∞ ÏãúÏ†êÏóêÏÑú ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÎäî BTC Í∞ÄÍ≤©Ïóê Îî∞Îùº Í∏∞Î≥∏ Ïù¥Ïùµ (A)ÏóêÏÑú ÏÉÅÌïú (A+B) ÏÇ¨Ïù¥Ïùò ÏßÄÍ∏âÏùÑ Î∞õÏùÑ Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ï†ÅÏö© Í∞ÄÎä•Ìïú ÏãúÎÇòÎ¶¨Ïò§ The product might be ÌäπÏ†ï Í≤ΩÏ†ú ÏÇ¨Í±¥Ïóê Í∞ïÌïú Î∞òÏùëÏùÑ Î≥¥Ïùº Í≤ÉÏù¥ÎùºÍ≥† ÎØøÎäî ÏòàÍ∏àÏûêÏóêÍ≤å Ï†ÅÌï©ÌïòÏßÄÎßå, ÏãúÏû• ÏòàÏ∏°Ïù¥ ÏûòÎ™ªÎê† Í≤ΩÏö∞ Í∞ÄÍ≤© ÌïòÎùΩ ÏúÑÌóòÏóê ÎåÄÌïú Ïö∞Î†§ÎèÑ ÏûàÎäî Ï†úÌíàÏûÖÎãàÎã§. ÏòàÎ•º Îì§Ïñ¥, ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÎäî Îã§Ïùå FOMC Í≤∞Ï†ï, Î∞òÍ∞êÍ∏∞ Ïù¥Î≤§Ìä∏ ÎòêÎäî Îã§Ïùå ETF ÏäπÏù∏ Î∞úÌëúÏóê ÎåÄÌïú BTC Í∞ÄÍ≤©Ïóê ÎåÄÌï¥ Ìà¨Í∏∞ÌïòÍ≥† Ïã∂Ïñ¥Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥ Ï†ÑÎûµÏùÄ Ïù¥Îü¨Ìïú Ï§ëÏöîÌïòÏßÄÎßå ÏúÑÌóòÌïú Ïù¥Î≤§Ìä∏Ïóê ÎåÄÌï¥ Í∞ïÌïú ÏãúÏû• ÌôïÏã†ÏùÑ Í∞ÄÏßÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÏóêÍ≤å Ï†ÅÌï©ÌïòÎ©∞, ÏûêÏã†Ïùò Í≤¨Ìï¥Í∞Ä ÏûòÎ™ªÎê† Í≤ΩÏö∞ ÌïòÎ∞© ÏÜêÏã§ÏùÑ Í¥ÄÎ¶¨ÌïòÎäî Îç∞ ÏûàÏñ¥ Í∑úÏú®ÏùÑ Ïú†ÏßÄÌïòÍ≥†Ïûê Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ÏÉÅÏñ¥ ÏßÄÎäêÎü¨ÎØ∏ (ÎÇòÏ§ëÏóê) Ï†úÌíà Í∞úÏöî Rangebound Î∞è Trend Ï†úÌíàÏóê ÎπÑÌï¥ 'ÏÉÅÏñ¥ ÏßÄÎäêÎü¨ÎØ∏' Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ Í∏∞ÏñµÏóê ÎÇ®Îäî Ïù¥Î¶Ñ ÎçïÎ∂ÑÏóê TradFi ÏãúÏû•ÏóêÏÑú ÏÉÅÎåÄÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Îçî Ïûò ÏïåÎ†§Ï†∏ ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Í∑∏ ÏÑ§Í≥ÑÏôÄ ÏàòÏùµ Íµ¨Ï°∞Îäî Trend(Ï¶â, Ïú†ÎüΩÏãù ÏòµÏÖò)Í≥º Ïú†ÏÇ¨ÌïòÏßÄÎßå, Ï£ºÏöî Ï∞®Ïù¥Ï†êÏùÄ ÏòàÍ∏àÏûêÍ∞Ä ÌäπÏ†ï Î≤îÏúÑ ÎÇ¥ÏóêÏÑú Í∞ÄÍ≤©Ïù¥ ÌòïÏÑ±Îê† Í≤ÉÏóê ÎåÄÌï¥ Ìõ®Ïî¨ Îçî Í≥µÍ≤©Ï†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Ìà¨Í∏∞ÌïòÍ≥† ÏûàÎã§Îäî Ï†êÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Îã§Ïãú ÎßêÌï¥, ÏÉÅÏñ¥ ÏßÄÎäêÎü¨ÎØ∏ Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ ÌÅ∞ ÏãúÏû• ÏõÄÏßÅÏûÑÏóêÏÑú Îçî ÎßéÏùÄ ÏÉÅÏäπ Ïû†Ïû¨Î†•ÏùÑ Ìè¨Í∏∞ÌïòÎäî ÎåÄÏã†, ÌïòÏúÑ Í∞ÄÍ≤© Í≤ΩÍ≥Ñ ÎÇ¥ÏóêÏÑú Îçî Í≥µÍ≤©Ï†ÅÏù∏ ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ ÏñªÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ ÏãúÏû• Î≥ÄÎèôÏÑ±Ïóê ÎåÄÌï¥ Îçî Î≥¥ÏàòÏ†ÅÏù∏ Í¥ÄÏ†êÏùÑ Ï±ÑÌÉùÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ÏòàÎ•º Îì§Ïñ¥, ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÍ∞Ä BTCÏóê ÎåÄÌï¥ Í∞ïÏÑ∏Î•º Î≥¥Ïù¥Í≥† ÏûàÏßÄÎßå ÌäπÏ†ï Í∞ïÌïú Í∏∞Ïà† Ï†ÄÌï≠ ÏàòÏ§ÄÏóêÏÑú ÌäπÏ†ï ÏÉÅÌïúÏÑ†ÏùÑ ÎÑòÏßÄ ÏïäÏùÑ Í≤ÉÏù¥ÎùºÎäî ÎÜíÏùÄ ÌôïÏã†ÏùÑ Í∞ÄÏßÄÍ≥† ÏûàÎã§Í≥† Í∞ÄÏ†ïÌï¥ Î≥¥Í≤†ÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥Îü¨Ìïú ÏãúÎÇòÎ¶¨Ïò§ÏóêÏÑú ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÎäî ÏïÑÎûò Îã§Ïù¥Ïñ¥Í∑∏Îû®Ïóê Îî∞Îùº ÏàòÏùµ ÌîÑÎ°úÌïÑÏù¥ ÏûàÎäî Í∞ïÏÑ∏ ÏÉÅÏñ¥ ÏßÄÎäêÎü¨ÎØ∏ Ï†úÌíàÏùÑ Íµ¨Îß§Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ï†úÌíà Ï†ïÏÇ∞ Ïãú, ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÎäî ÌòÑÎ¨º BTCÍ∞Ä Ïñ¥ÎîîÏóê ÏûàÎäêÎÉêÏóê Îî∞Îùº (A)ÏóêÏÑú (A+B)ÍπåÏßÄÏùò ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ Î∞õÍ≤å Îê©ÎãàÎã§. Í∑∏Îü¨ÎÇò Trend Ï†úÌíàÍ≥ºÎäî Îã¨Î¶¨, ÏÉÅÌïú Í∞ÄÍ≤© Ïû•Î≤ΩÏùÑ ÎÑòÏùÑ Í≤ΩÏö∞ ÏàòÏùµÏù¥ (A+C)Î°ú ÌïòÎùΩÌïòÎØÄÎ°ú, Ïù¥Ï†Ñ Î≤îÏúÑÏóêÏÑú Îçî Í≥µÍ≤©Ï†ÅÏù∏ ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ ÏñªÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌïú Í±∞ÎûòÎ•º Ï†úÍ≥µÌï©ÎãàÎã§.

title: Classification des coffres
body: Classification des Coffres Le contrat Vault utilise la norme ERC-1155 pour supporter la fongibilit√© des Tokens de Position avec le m√™me prix d'exercice et la m√™me date d'expiration. Les tokens avec des prix d'exercice ou des dates d'expiration diff√©rents auront des IDs de Token diff√©rents (c'est-√†-dire comme un NFT) tout en √©tant contenus sous le m√™me contrat Vault. Le protocole SOFA est con√ßu avec la flexibilit√© de supporter tout type de produit structur√© et toute d√©nomination de garantie, bien qu'une distinction soit faite sur la question de savoir si le produit sous-jacent contient ou non une fonctionnalit√© de 'protection du principal'. En tant que tel, nos conceptions de Coffres sont divis√©es en 2 grandes cat√©gories de produits explicites appel√©es 'Gagner' et 'Surge'. Exemple de Taxonomie des Coffres au Lancement de SOFA Produits Disponibles au Lancement En tant que preuve de concept inaugurale, nous nous concentrerons initialement sur trois structures de produits populaires appel√©es 'Rangebound' et 'Trend'. De plus, tous ces produits sont disponibles dans les protocoles Gagner ou Surge. De plus, d'autres types de produits seront continuellement ajout√©s en fonction de la demande des utilisateurs et des retours de l'√©cosyst√®me. Produits Rangebond Aper√ßu du Produit Les produits Rangebound sont un type de produit structur√© bas√© sur des limites de prix. Les d√©posants peuvent r√©aliser un profit si l'actif sous-jacent ne touche pas les barri√®res pr√©d√©finies pendant la p√©riode d'observation avant l'√©ch√©ance. Ces produits conviennent aux utilisateurs qui s'attendent √† ce que le march√© reste dans une phase de consolidation lat√©rale avec une volatilit√© mod√©r√©e. En se r√©f√©rant au diagramme de paiement ci-dessous, un utilisateur croit que le BTC sera coinc√© entre une plage d√©finie par les barri√®res inf√©rieure et sup√©rieure, mais ne veut pas encourir beaucoup de pertes m√™me si cette opinion s'av√®re incorrecte. Le produit Rangebound garantira √† l'utilisateur un rendement de base minimum de (A) m√™me si le prix du Range sort de chaque c√¥t√©, mais l'utilisateur aura droit √† un retour de profit suppl√©mentaire √©quivalent √† (A+B) si les prix restent contenus dans les barri√®res. Pour les options de personnalisation, l'utilisateur est libre d'ajuster la largeur de la plage de prix, ce qui entra√Ænerait un profil diff√©rent de profits de base et de profits suppl√©mentaires selon les niveaux choisis. Naturellement, sp√©cifier une plage de prix plus √©troite repr√©sente un pari plus agressif sur une faible volatilit√©, ce qui entra√Ænerait des rendements suppl√©mentaires plus √©lev√©s. √Ä l'inverse, une plage de prix plus large r√©duirait les profits exc√©dentaires en retour d'une probabilit√© plus √©lev√©e de gagner. Enfin, pour faciliter la gestion, le produit peut √™tre sp√©cifi√© pour √™tre automatiquement 're-roul√©' √† l'√©ch√©ance comme un pari de continuation lors d'une mise √† niveau ult√©rieure du protocole. (La fonction 're-roll' sera d√©ploy√©e dans la prochaine phase de la mise √† niveau). Produits Trend Aper√ßu du Produit Le produit Trend est adapt√© aux d√©posants qui s'attendent √† ce que le march√© subisse bient√¥t une tendance douce et r√©guli√®re, mais qui d√©sire tout de m√™me une certaine protection contre les baisses. En d√©finissant √† la fois une barri√®re de prix inf√©rieure et sup√©rieure, les utilisateurs commenceront √† accumuler des gains de revenus d√®s que l'instrument sous-jacent franchit le seuil de prix initial, avec des paiements croissants jusqu'√† atteindre un maximum √† la 2√®me barri√®re. De plus, contrairement au produit Rangebound, le produit Trend n'observe qu'au moment du r√®glement si le prix de l'actif sous-jacent se situe dans la plage d√©finie pour d√©terminer le profit final (c'est-√†-dire option europ√©enne). Ce produit est disponible via des expressions haussi√®res et baissi√®res. Par exemple, si un utilisateur est haussier sur le BTC et pr√©dit que dans les sept prochains jours, le prix du BTC restera au-dessus de 68 500 $, mais ne d√©passera pas 71 500 $, il peut choisir d'acheter un produit Bull Trend, en fixant 68 500 $ comme limite inf√©rieure et 71 500 $ comme limite sup√©rieure de la plage de profit. En se r√©f√©rant au diagramme ci-dessous, au moment du r√®glement, l'utilisateur sera √©ligible √† un paiement entre un profit de base de (A) et une limite sup√©rieure de (A+B), selon ce que sera le prix du BTC √† ce moment-l√†. Sc√©narios Applicables Le produit pourrait √™tre adapt√© aux d√©posants qui croient qu'un actif conna√Ætra une forte r√©action √† un √©v√©nement √©conomique sp√©cifique, mais qui s'inqui√®tent √©galement du risque d'une baisse de prix s'ils se trompent dans leur pronostic de march√©. Par exemple, l'utilisateur pourrait d√©sirer sp√©culer sur les prix du BTC lors de la prochaine d√©cision du FOMC, l'√©v√©nement de halving, ou la prochaine annonce d'approbation d'ETF. Cette strat√©gie est appropri√©e pour les utilisateurs ayant une forte conviction sur le march√© concernant ces √©v√©nements importants mais risqu√©s, et qui souhaitent rester disciplin√©s dans la gestion des pertes potentielles si son avis s'av√®re erron√©. Aileron de requin (Pour plus tard) Aper√ßu du produit Compar√© aux produits Rangebound et Trend, le produit 'Aileron de requin' est relativement plus connu sur les march√©s TradFi gr√¢ce √† son nom m√©morable. Son design et son rendement sont similaires √† ceux des produits Trend (c'est-√†-dire une option europ√©enne), avec la principale exception que le d√©posant sp√©cule de mani√®re beaucoup plus agressive sur les prix se situant dans une plage particuli√®re. Dit autrement, le produit Aileron de requin adopte une vision plus conservatrice de la volatilit√© du march√© en sacrifiant plus de potentiel √† la hausse lors d'un grand mouvement du march√©, en √©change de profits plus agressifs dans les limites de prix inf√©rieures. Par exemple, supposons qu'un utilisateur soit haussier sur le BTC, mais qu'il ait une forte conviction qu'il ne franchira pas une certaine limite sup√©rieure √† un niveau de r√©sistance technique fort. Dans un tel sc√©nario, l'utilisateur peut choisir d'acheter un produit Aileron de requin haussier avec un profil de rendement comme indiqu√© dans le diagramme ci-dessous. √Ä la liquidation du produit, l'utilisateur recevra un retour allant de (A) √† (A+B) en fonction de l'endroit o√π se trouve le BTC au comptant ; cependant, contrairement aux produits Trend, notez que le retour diminue √† (A+C) en cas de franchissement de la barri√®re de prix sup√©rieure, offrant un compromis en √©change de profits plus agressifs dans la plage pr√©c√©dente.

title: Classificatio Thesauri
body: Classificatio Vault Contractus Vault usum facit standardi ERC-1155 ad sustentandum fungibilitatem Positionum Token cum eodem pretio et tempore expirationis. Tokens cum diversis pretia vel tempore expirationis habebunt diversas ID Token (id est, sicut NFT) dum adhuc continentur sub eodem contractu Vault. Protocolum SOFA designatum est cum flexibilitate ad sustentandum quocumque genere producti structi et denominationis collateralis, quamvis distinctio facienda sit an productum subiectum contineat 'protectionem principalem' vel non. Ita, nostra designatio Vault in 2 maiores, auto-explicativas categorias productorum vocatas 'Earn' et 'Surge' dividitur. Exemplum Taxonomiae Vault ad SOFA Launch Producta Disponibilia ad Launch Ut nostra inauguralis probatio conceptus, initio in tres populares structuras productorum vocatas 'Rangebound' et 'Trend' focus habebimus. Praeterea, omnia haec producta sunt disponibilia in protocolis Earn vel Surge. Insuper, additional producta genera continue addentur secundum postulationem usorum et responsionem ecosystematis. Producta Rangebond Overview Producti Producta Rangebound sunt genus producti structi basati in limitibus pretiorum. Depositores lucrari possunt si res subiecta non tangit limites praestitutos durante periodo observationis ante maturitatem. Haec producta apta sunt usoribus qui exspectant mercatum manere in statu consolidationis lateralis cum subiecta volatilitate. Referens ad diagramma lucri infra, usor credit BTC inter spatium definitum a limitibus inferioribus et superioribus haesurum esse, sed non vult multum detrimenti incurrere etiam si visio falsa sit. Productum Rangebound usori minimum fructum basem (A) garantizabit etiam si pretium Range ex utraque parte eruptione fiat, sed usor ius habebit ad extra lucrum aequivalens (A+B) si pretia intra limites contineantur. Ad optiones customizationis, usor liber est ad latitudinem spatii pretiorum iuvare, quod diversum profilium fructuum basium et superiorum afferet secundum gradus electos. Naturaliter, specificando angustius spatium pretiorum, bet magis aggressivum in volatilitate humilis repraesentat, quod ad superiores reditus ducit. Contrario, latior spatium pretiorum excessus lucrum minuet in commutatione maioris probabilitatis vincendi. Denique, ad facilitatem administrationis, productum potest specificari ut 're-rolled' automatice ad maturitatem ut bet continuationis ad posterioris protocoli upgrade. (Functione 're-roll' in proximo gradu upgrade explicabitur). Producta Trend Overview Producti Productum Trend aptum est pro depositariis qui exspectant mercatum mox lenem et stabilis trend subire, sed adhuc aliquod detrimentum protectionis desiderant. Definendo tam limitum inferiorum quam superiorum pretiorum, usores incipiant lucrum accrescere statim cum instrumentum subiectum limitem pretiorum initialem transierit, cum augendis solutionibus usque ad maximum ad secundum limitum. Praeterea, dissimile productum Rangebound, productum Trend tantum observat tempore solutionis an pretium rei subiectae intra constitutum spatium cadat ad determinandum ultimum lucrum (id est, optio Europaea). Hoc productum praesto est per ambas expressiones Bullish et Bearish. Ut exemplum, si usor bullish in BTC est et praedicit quod in proximis septem diebus, pretium BTC super $68,500 manebit sed non excedet $71,500, possunt eligere emere productum Bull Trend, statuendo $68,500 ut limitis inferioris et $71,500 ut limitis superioris spatii lucri. Referens ad diagramma infra, tempore solutionis, usor erit eligibilis ad solutionem inter fructum basem (A) et limitis superioris (A+B), secundum quid pretium BTC sit tempore. Scenaria Applicabilia The product might be aptum pro depositariis qui credunt rem esse validam reactionem ad certum eventum oeconomicum, sed etiam solliciti sunt de periculo declinationis pretii si errent in sua praedictione mercatus. For example, the user might desire to speculate on BTC prices on the next FOMC decision, the having event, or the next ETF approval announcement. This strategy is aptum pro usoribus tenentibus validam convictionem mercatus in his rebus maximis sed periculosis, et vult manere disciplinatum in administrando damna inferiora si eius vis falsa evadat. Shark Fin (Pro Postea) Product Overview Compared to Rangebound and Trend products, the 'Shark Fin' product is relatively more well-known in TradFi markets thanks to its memorable moniker. Its design and payoff are similar to Trend (ie. European option), with the principalis exceptio esse quod depositarius multo magis audacter speculat in pretia esse intra certum spatium. Said in another way, the Shark Fin product adoptat conservativam opinionem de volatilitate mercatus per sacrificandum maiorem ascensum in magno motu mercatus, in retributione pro magis audacibus lucris intra inferiores limites pretii. As example, let's say an user is bullish on BTC, but holds a high conviction that it will not breach a certain upper bound at some strong technical resistance level. In such a scenario, the user can choose to buy a Bullish Shark Fin product with a payoff profile as per the diagram below. At product settlement, the user will receive a return ranging from (A) to (A+B) depending on where spot BTC is; however, unlike in Trend products, note that the return decrescit ad (A+C) upon a breach of the upper price barrier, offering a trade-off in exchange for more aggressive profits in the preceding range.

Ÿáÿ∞Ÿá ÿßŸÑÿßÿ≥ÿ™ÿ±ÿßÿ™Ÿäÿ¨Ÿäÿ© ŸÖŸÜÿßÿ≥ÿ®ÿ© ŸÑŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖŸäŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ∞ŸäŸÜ Ÿäÿ≠ŸÖŸÑŸàŸÜ ŸÇŸÜÿßÿπÿ© ŸÇŸàŸäÿ© ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸàŸÇ ÿ®ÿ¥ÿ£ŸÜ Ÿáÿ∞Ÿá ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ≠ÿØÿßÿ´ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸáŸÖÿ© ŸàŸÑŸÉŸÜŸáÿß ŸÖÿ≠ŸÅŸàŸÅÿ© ÿ®ÿßŸÑŸÖÿÆÿßÿ∑ÿ±ÿå ŸàŸäÿ±ŸäÿØŸàŸÜ ÿ£ŸÜ Ÿäÿ∏ŸÑŸàÿß ŸÖŸÜÿ∂ÿ®ÿ∑ŸäŸÜ ŸÅŸä ÿ•ÿØÿßÿ±ÿ© ÿÆÿ≥ÿßÿ¶ÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ¨ÿßŸÜÿ® ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ®Ÿä ÿ•ÿ∞ÿß ÿßÿ™ÿ∂ÿ≠ ÿ£ŸÜ Ÿàÿ¨Ÿáÿ© ŸÜÿ∏ÿ±ŸáŸÖ ŸÉÿßŸÜÿ™ ÿÆÿßÿ∑ÿ¶ÿ©. ÿ≤ÿπŸÜŸÅÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÇÿ±ÿ¥ (ŸÑŸàŸÇÿ™ ŸÑÿßÿ≠ŸÇ) ŸÜÿ∏ÿ±ÿ© ÿπÿßŸÖÿ© ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ ŸÖŸÇÿßÿ±ŸÜÿ©Ÿã ÿ®ŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÜÿ∑ÿßŸÇ ÿßŸÑÿ´ÿßÿ®ÿ™ ŸàÿßŸÑÿßÿ™ÿ¨ÿßŸáÿå ŸÅÿ•ŸÜ ŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ "ÿ≤ÿπŸÜŸÅÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÇÿ±ÿ¥" ŸÖÿπÿ±ŸàŸÅ ŸÜÿ≥ÿ®ŸäŸãÿß ŸÅŸä ÿ£ÿ≥ŸàÿßŸÇ TradFi ÿ®ŸÅÿ∂ŸÑ ÿßÿ≥ŸÖŸá ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÖŸäÿ≤. ÿ™ÿµŸÖŸäŸÖŸá Ÿàÿπÿßÿ¶ÿØŸá ŸÖÿ¥ÿßÿ®ŸáÿßŸÜ ŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ™ÿ¨ÿßŸá (ÿ£Ÿä ÿßŸÑÿÆŸäÿßÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ£Ÿàÿ±Ÿàÿ®Ÿä)ÿå ŸÖÿπ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ≥ÿ™ÿ´ŸÜÿßÿ° ÿßŸÑÿ±ÿ¶Ÿäÿ≥Ÿä ŸàŸáŸà ÿ£ŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸàÿØÿπ Ÿäÿ™ŸÉŸáŸÜ ÿ®ÿ¥ŸÉŸÑ ÿ£ŸÉÿ´ÿ± ÿπÿØŸàÿßŸÜŸäÿ© ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ≥ÿπÿßÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ™Ÿä ÿ™ŸÉŸàŸÜ ÿ∂ŸÖŸÜ ŸÜÿ∑ÿßŸÇ ŸÖÿπŸäŸÜ. ÿ®ÿπÿ®ÿßÿ±ÿ© ÿ£ÿÆÿ±Ÿâÿå ŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ ÿ≤ÿπŸÜŸÅÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÇÿ±ÿ¥ Ÿäÿ™ÿ®ŸÜŸâ Ÿàÿ¨Ÿáÿ© ŸÜÿ∏ÿ± ÿ£ŸÉÿ´ÿ± ÿ™ÿ≠ŸÅÿ∏Ÿãÿß ÿ®ÿ¥ÿ£ŸÜ ÿ™ŸÇŸÑÿ®ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸàŸÇ ŸÖŸÜ ÿÆŸÑÿßŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ∂ÿ≠Ÿäÿ© ÿ®ŸÖÿ≤ŸäÿØ ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ±ÿ™ŸÅÿßÿπ ŸÅŸä ÿ≠ÿ±ŸÉÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸàŸÇ ÿßŸÑŸÉÿ®Ÿäÿ±ÿ©ÿå ŸÖŸÇÿßÿ®ŸÑ ÿ™ÿ≠ŸÇŸäŸÇ ÿ£ÿ±ÿ®ÿßÿ≠ ÿ£ŸÉÿ´ÿ± ÿπÿØŸàÿßŸÜŸäÿ© ÿ∂ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ≠ÿØŸàÿØ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ÿπÿ±Ÿäÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸÅŸÑŸäÿ©. ŸÉŸÖÿ´ÿßŸÑÿå ŸÑŸÜŸÅÿ™ÿ±ÿ∂ ÿ£ŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖ ŸÖÿ™ŸÅÿßÿ¶ŸÑ ÿ®ÿ¥ÿ£ŸÜ BTCÿå ŸÑŸÉŸÜŸá Ÿäÿ≠ŸÖŸÑ ŸÇŸÜÿßÿπÿ© ŸÇŸàŸäÿ© ÿ®ÿ£ŸÜŸá ŸÑŸÜ Ÿäÿ™ÿ¨ÿßŸàÿ≤ ÿ≠ÿØŸãÿß ÿ£ÿπŸÑŸâ ŸÖÿπŸäŸÜŸãÿß ÿπŸÜÿØ ŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ŸàŸâ ŸÖŸÇÿßŸàŸÖÿ© ŸÅŸÜŸä ŸÇŸàŸä. ŸÅŸä ŸÖÿ´ŸÑ Ÿáÿ∞ÿß ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸäŸÜÿßÿ±ŸäŸàÿå ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜ ŸÑŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖ ÿßÿÆÿ™Ÿäÿßÿ± ÿ¥ÿ±ÿßÿ° ŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ ÿ≤ÿπŸÜŸÅÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÇÿ±ÿ¥ ÿßŸÑÿµÿπŸàÿØŸäÿ© ŸÖÿπ ŸÖŸÑŸÅ ÿπÿßÿ¶ÿØ ŸÉŸÖÿß ŸáŸà ŸÖŸàÿ∂ÿ≠ ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿ±ÿ≥ŸÖ ÿßŸÑÿ®ŸäÿßŸÜŸä ÿ£ÿØŸÜÿßŸá. ÿπŸÜÿØ ÿ™ÿ≥ŸàŸäÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ÿå ÿ≥Ÿäÿ≠ÿµŸÑ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿπÿßÿ¶ÿØ Ÿäÿ™ÿ±ÿßŸàÿ≠ ŸÖŸÜ (A) ÿ•ŸÑŸâ (A+B) ÿßÿπÿ™ŸÖÿßÿØŸãÿß ÿπŸÑŸâ ŸÖŸÉÿßŸÜ Ÿàÿ¨ŸàÿØ BTC ÿßŸÑŸÅŸàÿ±Ÿäÿõ ŸàŸÖÿπ ÿ∞ŸÑŸÉÿå ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿπŸÉÿ≥ ŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ™ÿ¨ÿßŸáÿå ŸÑÿßÿ≠ÿ∏ ÿ£ŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿπÿßÿ¶ÿØ ŸäŸÜÿÆŸÅÿ∂ ÿ•ŸÑŸâ (A+C) ÿπŸÜÿØ ÿ™ÿ¨ÿßŸàÿ≤ ÿ≠ÿßÿ¨ÿ≤ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ÿπÿ± ÿßŸÑÿπŸÑŸàŸäÿå ŸÖŸÖÿß ŸäŸÇÿØŸÖ ÿ™ÿπŸàŸäÿ∂Ÿãÿß ŸÖŸÇÿßÿ®ŸÑ ÿ™ÿ≠ŸÇŸäŸÇ ÿ£ÿ±ÿ®ÿßÿ≠ ÿ£ŸÉÿ´ÿ± ÿπÿØŸàÿßŸÜŸäÿ© ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑŸÜÿ∑ÿßŸÇ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ÿßÿ®ŸÇ.

title: Defining Your Risk Preference
body: Defining Your Risk Preference How much downside risk do you wish to take? Earn Protocol The 'Earn' protocol category is designed for risk-averse depositors looking for the utmost downside protection of their capital. Earn vaults will stake users' deposited capital in safe-yielding protocols (eg. AAVE) to generate a base level of interest, and utilize a portion of that guaranteed income to fund option premium with market makers for upside potential. The end result will maximize downside protection, while still maintaining some upside potential should the market move favourably in the user's direction. With that being said, please note that a critical design component requires the passive yields offered by the eligible staking protocols to be meaningfully above the product's worst-case payout, in order to properly fund the option premium to generate the upside return. As such, should the user be holding ETH instead of USDT, he/she will need to convert the ETH into stETH in a liquid staking protocol such as Lido, before locking the stETH into the protocol vaults to benefit from the extra yield accretion. Surge Protocol For users with a greater risk-reward tolerance, the protocol also offers higher-return structures with an upfront capital 'ante'. Surge protocols are solely targeted at aggressive users who are desirious of substantially high returns in exchange for capital losses. With these Surge-based products, the protocol vault will lock in both the user's principal as well as the market makers' premium at trade inception, analogous to a 'poker-ante' of sorts**. The locked capital positions will not be restaked to any other protocols, and it serves as the committed-ante against the final payoff. Let's use the Surge-Rangebound product as an example. Should the price of the underlying asset remain strictly within the barriers by final maturity, the user will receive an exponentially higher return than he would have under the Earn version. However, should the opposite happen, the structure will be early-terminated, with the locked principal being transferred to the market maker as the 'winner' of this strategy. Once again, these products are intended for users holding a very strong market conviction, and would like to put that confidence to test in hopes of earning a very high rate of return in exchange for principal losses. PSA: Special Note on Rangebound Products Pictorial Illustration of How Rangebound Works in Practice While simple in theory, the Rangebound product actually has some design challenges, especially when it comes to DeFi on-chain compatibility: The product references a series of historical prices, rather than a 'point-in-time' check at expiry. The product can be 'knocked-out' should the price barriers get breached. The product can be knocked-out at any second, but it's technically unfeasible to refresh on-chain price references continuously throughout the day. By extension, range-checks are "backward-looking" out of necessity. The team has made the following design compromises against the preceding challenges: Daily Range Checks: In the interest of gas fees and on-chain TPS, our Rangebound product will only do a daily price check (at 4pm OTC+8) of whether the product has been knocked out over the past 24 hours. Knocked-out products will terminate with no more exposure going forward. Daily Product Cycles: Consistent with the daily range checks and settlement cadence, our observation cycle will always begin from the _next _4pm (OTC+8) period Nevertheless, users are free to subscribe and purchase a Rangebound product at anytime, and their Base+ Yield will start accruing immediately. Early Termination vs Final Withdrawal: Rangebound products which are 'knocked out' are effectively 'game over'; however, user deposits remain staked in Aave, and we must wait until final maturity for users to withdraw the principal in our current iteration.

title: ÏúÑÌóò ÏÑ†Ìò∏ÎèÑ Ï†ïÏùòÌïòÍ∏∞
body: Î¶¨Ïä§ÌÅ¨ ÏÑ†Ìò∏ÎèÑ Ï†ïÏùòÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏñºÎßàÎÇò ÎßéÏùÄ ÌïòÎùΩ Î¶¨Ïä§ÌÅ¨Î•º Í∞êÏàòÌïòÍ≥† Ïã∂ÏúºÏã†Í∞ÄÏöî? Earn ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú 'Earn' ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú Ïπ¥ÌÖåÍ≥†Î¶¨Îäî ÏûêÎ≥∏Ïùò ÏµúÎåÄ ÌïòÎùΩ Î≥¥Ìò∏Î•º ÏõêÌïòÎäî Î¶¨Ïä§ÌÅ¨ ÌöåÌîºÌòï ÏòàÍ∏àÏûêÎ•º ÏúÑÌï¥ ÏÑ§Í≥ÑÎêòÏóàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Earn Í∏àÍ≥†Îäî ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÍ∞Ä ÏòàÏπòÌïú ÏûêÎ≥∏ÏùÑ ÏïàÏ†ÑÌïú ÏàòÏùµ ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú(Ïòà: AAVE)Ïóê Ïä§ÌÖåÏù¥ÌÇπÌïòÏó¨ Í∏∞Î≥∏ ÏàòÏ§ÄÏùò Ïù¥ÏûêÎ•º ÏÉùÏÑ±ÌïòÍ≥†, Í∑∏ Î≥¥Ïû•Îêú ÏàòÏùµÏùò ÏùºÎ∂ÄÎ•º ÏòµÏÖò ÌîÑÎ¶¨ÎØ∏ÏóÑÏùÑ ÏãúÏû• Ï°∞ÏÑ±ÏûêÏóêÍ≤å ÏûêÍ∏à ÏßÄÏõêÌïòÏó¨ ÏÉÅÏäπ Ïû†Ïû¨Î†•ÏùÑ ÏúÑÌï¥ ÌôúÏö©Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ÏµúÏ¢Ö Í≤∞Í≥ºÎäî ÌïòÎùΩ Î≥¥Ìò∏Î•º Í∑πÎåÄÌôîÌïòÎ©¥ÏÑúÎèÑ ÏãúÏû•Ïù¥ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÏóêÍ≤å Ïú†Î¶¨ÌïòÍ≤å ÏõÄÏßÅÏùº Í≤ΩÏö∞ ÏùºÎ∂Ä ÏÉÅÏäπ Ïû†Ïû¨Î†•ÏùÑ Ïú†ÏßÄÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Í∑∏Î†áÍ∏¥ ÌïòÏßÄÎßå, Ï§ëÏöîÌïú ÏÑ§Í≥Ñ ÏöîÏÜåÎäî Ï†ÅÍ≤© Ïä§ÌÖåÏù¥ÌÇπ ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏù¥ Ï†úÍ≥µÌïòÎäî ÏàòÎèô ÏàòÏùµÏù¥ Ï†úÌíàÏùò ÏµúÏïÖÏùò Í≤ΩÏö∞ ÏßÄÍ∏âÏï°Î≥¥Îã§ ÏùòÎØ∏ ÏûàÍ≤å ÎÜíÏïÑÏïº ÏòµÏÖò ÌîÑÎ¶¨ÎØ∏ÏóÑÏùÑ Ï†ÅÏ†àÌûà ÏûêÍ∏à ÏßÄÏõêÌïòÏó¨ ÏÉÅÏäπ ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ ÏÉùÏÑ±Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÎã§Îäî Ï†êÏùÑ ÏöîÍµ¨Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. Îî∞ÎùºÏÑú ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÍ∞Ä USDT ÎåÄÏã† ETHÎ•º Î≥¥Ïú†ÌïòÍ≥† ÏûàÎã§Î©¥, LidoÏôÄ Í∞ôÏùÄ Ïú†Îèô Ïä§ÌÖåÏù¥ÌÇπ ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏóêÏÑú ETHÎ•º stETHÎ°ú Î≥ÄÌôòÌïú ÌõÑ, Ï∂îÍ∞Ä ÏàòÏùµ Ï∂ïÏ†ÅÏùò ÌòúÌÉùÏùÑ Î∞õÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ stETHÎ•º ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú Í∏àÍ≥†Ïóê Ïû†Í∞ÄÏïº Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. Surge ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú Îçî ÌÅ∞ Î¶¨Ïä§ÌÅ¨-Î≥¥ÏÉÅ ÌóàÏö© Î≤îÏúÑÎ•º Í∞ÄÏßÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÎ•º ÏúÑÌï¥, ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏùÄ ÏÑ†Î∂à ÏûêÎ≥∏ 'ÏïàÌÖå'Í∞Ä ÏûàÎäî Îçî ÎÜíÏùÄ ÏàòÏùµ Íµ¨Ï°∞ÎèÑ Ï†úÍ≥µÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Surge ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏùÄ ÏûêÎ≥∏ ÏÜêÏã§Ïóê ÎåÄÌïú ÎåÄÍ∞ÄÎ°ú ÏÉÅÎãπÌûà ÎÜíÏùÄ ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ ÏõêÌïòÎäî Í≥µÍ≤©Ï†ÅÏù∏ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÎßåÏùÑ ÎåÄÏÉÅÏúºÎ°ú Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥ Surge Í∏∞Î∞ò Ï†úÌíàÏùÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÎ©¥, ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú Í∏àÍ≥†Îäî Í±∞Îûò ÏãúÏûë Ïãú ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÏùò ÏõêÍ∏àÍ≥º ÏãúÏû• Ï°∞ÏÑ±ÏûêÏùò ÌîÑÎ¶¨ÎØ∏ÏóÑÏùÑ Î™®Îëê Ïû†Í∏âÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥Îäî ÏùºÏ¢ÖÏùò 'Ìè¨Ïª§ ÏïàÌÖå'ÏôÄ Ïú†ÏÇ¨Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. Ïû†Í∏¥ ÏûêÎ≥∏ Ìè¨ÏßÄÏÖòÏùÄ Îã§Î•∏ ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏóê Ïû¨Ïä§ÌÖåÏù¥ÌÇπÎêòÏßÄ ÏïäÏúºÎ©∞, ÏµúÏ¢Ö ÏßÄÍ∏âÏóê ÎåÄÌïú ÏïΩÏÜçÎêú ÏïàÌÖå Ïó≠Ìï†ÏùÑ Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. Surge-Rangebound Ï†úÌíàÏùÑ ÏòàÎ°ú Îì§Ïñ¥ Î≥¥Í≤†ÏäµÎãàÎã§. Í∏∞Ï¥à ÏûêÏÇ∞Ïùò Í∞ÄÍ≤©Ïù¥ ÏµúÏ¢Ö ÎßåÍ∏∞ÍπåÏßÄ ÏóÑÍ≤©Ìûà Ïû•Î≤Ω ÎÇ¥Ïóê Ïú†ÏßÄÎêúÎã§Î©¥, ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÎäî Earn Î≤ÑÏ†ÑÏóêÏÑúÎ≥¥Îã§ Í∏∞ÌïòÍ∏âÏàòÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú ÎÜíÏùÄ ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ Î∞õÏùÑ Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Í∑∏Îü¨ÎÇò Î∞òÎåÄÏùò ÏÉÅÌô©Ïù¥ Î∞úÏÉùÌï† Í≤ΩÏö∞, Íµ¨Ï°∞Îäî Ï°∞Í∏∞ Ï¢ÖÎ£åÎêòÎ©∞, Ïû†Í∏¥ ÏõêÍ∏àÏùÄ Ïù¥ Ï†ÑÎûµÏùò 'ÏäπÏûê'Ïù∏ ÏãúÏû• Ï°∞ÏÑ±ÏûêÏóêÍ≤å Ïù¥Ï†ÑÎê©ÎãàÎã§. Îã§Ïãú Ìïú Î≤à, Ïù¥ Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ Îß§Ïö∞ Í∞ïÌïú ÏãúÏû• ÌôïÏã†ÏùÑ Í∞ÄÏßÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÎ•º ÏúÑÌï¥ ÏÑ§Í≥ÑÎêòÏóàÏúºÎ©∞, ÏõêÍ∏à ÏÜêÏã§Ïóê ÎåÄÌïú ÎåÄÍ∞ÄÎ°ú Îß§Ïö∞ ÎÜíÏùÄ ÏàòÏùµÎ•†ÏùÑ ÏñªÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ Í∑∏ ÌôïÏã†ÏùÑ ÏãúÌóòÌïòÍ≥†Ïûê Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. PSA: Rangebound Ï†úÌíàÏóê ÎåÄÌïú ÌäπÎ≥Ñ Ï∞∏Í≥† ÏÇ¨Ìï≠ RangeboundÍ∞Ä Ïã§Ï†úÎ°ú ÏûëÎèôÌïòÎäî Î∞©ÏãùÏóê ÎåÄÌïú Í∑∏Î¶º ÏÑ§Î™Ö Ïù¥Î°†Ï†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Í∞ÑÎã®ÌïòÏßÄÎßå, Rangebound Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ Ïã§Ï†úÎ°ú Î™á Í∞ÄÏßÄ ÏÑ§Í≥Ñ Î¨∏Ï†úÎ•º Í∞ÄÏßÄÍ≥† ÏûàÏúºÎ©∞, ÌäπÌûà DeFi Ïò®Ï≤¥Ïù∏ Ìò∏ÌôòÏÑ±Ïóê Í¥ÄÌïú Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§: Ïù¥ Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ ÎßåÍ∏∞ Ïãú 'ÏãúÏ†ê' ÌôïÏù∏Ïù¥ ÏïÑÎãå ÏùºÎ†®Ïùò Ïó≠ÏÇ¨Ï†Å Í∞ÄÍ≤©ÏùÑ Ï∞∏Ï°∞Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. Í∞ÄÍ≤© Ïû•Î≤ΩÏù¥ Ïπ®Ìï¥Îê† Í≤ΩÏö∞ Ï†úÌíàÏù¥ 'ÌÉÄÍ≤©'ÏùÑ Î∞õÏùÑ Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ Ïñ¥Îñ§ ÏàúÍ∞ÑÏóêÎèÑ ÌÉÄÍ≤©ÏùÑ Î∞õÏùÑ Ïàò ÏûàÏßÄÎßå, Í∏∞Ïà†Ï†ÅÏúºÎ°ú ÌïòÎ£® Ï¢ÖÏùº Ïò®Ï≤¥Ïù∏ Í∞ÄÍ≤© Ï∞∏Ï°∞Î•º ÏßÄÏÜçÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú ÏÉàÎ°ú Í≥†ÏπòÎäî Í≤ÉÏùÄ Î∂àÍ∞ÄÎä•Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. Îî∞ÎùºÏÑú, Î≤îÏúÑ ÌôïÏù∏ÏùÄ ÌïÑÏó∞Ï†ÅÏúºÎ°ú "Í≥ºÍ±∞ ÏßÄÌñ•Ï†Å"ÏûÖÎãàÎã§. ÌåÄÏùÄ Ïù¥Ï†ÑÏùò ÎèÑÏ†ÑÏóê ÎåÄÌïú Îã§ÏùåÍ≥º Í∞ôÏùÄ ÎîîÏûêÏù∏ ÌÉÄÌòëÏùÑ ÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§: ÏùºÏùº Î≤îÏúÑ ÌôïÏù∏: Í∞ÄÏä§ ÏöîÍ∏àÍ≥º Ïò®Ï≤¥Ïù∏ TPSÎ•º Í≥†Î†§ÌïòÏó¨, Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò Rangebound Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ ÏßÄÎÇú 24ÏãúÍ∞Ñ ÎèôÏïà Ï†úÌíàÏù¥ ÌÉàÎùΩÎêòÏóàÎäîÏßÄÎ•º ÌôïÏù∏ÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ ÏùºÏùº Í∞ÄÍ≤© ÌôïÏù∏(Ïò§ÌõÑ 4Ïãú OTC+8)Îßå ÏàòÌñâÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ÌÉàÎùΩÎêú Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ Îçî Ïù¥ÏÉÅ ÎÖ∏Ï∂ú ÏóÜÏù¥ Ï¢ÖÎ£åÎê©ÎãàÎã§. ÏùºÏùº Ï†úÌíà Ï£ºÍ∏∞: ÏùºÏùº Î≤îÏúÑ ÌôïÏù∏ Î∞è Ï†ïÏÇ∞ Ï£ºÍ∏∞ÏôÄ ÏùºÍ¥ÄÎêòÍ≤å, Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò Í¥ÄÏ∞∞ Ï£ºÍ∏∞Îäî Ìï≠ÏÉÅ Îã§Ïùå Ïò§ÌõÑ 4Ïãú(OTC+8) Í∏∞Í∞ÑÎ∂ÄÌÑ∞ ÏãúÏûëÎê©ÎãàÎã§. Í∑∏ÎüºÏóêÎèÑ Î∂àÍµ¨ÌïòÍ≥†, ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÎäî Ïñ∏Ï†úÎì†ÏßÄ Rangebound Ï†úÌíàÏùÑ Íµ¨ÎèÖÌïòÍ≥† Íµ¨Îß§Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏúºÎ©∞, Í∑∏Îì§Ïùò Base+ ÏàòÏùµÏùÄ Ï¶âÏãú Î∞úÏÉùÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏãúÏûëÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Ï°∞Í∏∞ Ï¢ÖÎ£å ÎåÄ ÏµúÏ¢Ö Ïù∏Ï∂ú: 'ÌÉàÎùΩ'Îêú Rangebound Ï†úÌíàÏùÄ ÏÇ¨Ïã§ÏÉÅ 'Í≤åÏûÑ Ïò§Î≤Ñ'ÏûÖÎãàÎã§; Í∑∏Îü¨ÎÇò ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê ÏòàÏπòÎäî AaveÏóê Ïä§ÌÖåÏù¥ÌÇπÎêú ÏÉÅÌÉúÎ°ú ÎÇ®ÏïÑ ÏûàÏúºÎ©∞, ÌòÑÏû¨ Î≤ÑÏ†ÑÏóêÏÑúÎäî ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÍ∞Ä ÏõêÍ∏àÏùÑ Ïù∏Ï∂úÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ ÏµúÏ¢Ö ÎßåÍ∏∞Î•º Í∏∞Îã§Î†§Ïïº Ìï©ÎãàÎã§.
