title: D√©finir votre pr√©f√©rence de risque
body: D√©finir Votre Pr√©f√©rence de Risque Quel niveau de risque souhaitez-vous prendre ? Protocole Earn La cat√©gorie de protocole 'Earn' est con√ßue pour les d√©posants averses au risque cherchant la protection maximale de leur capital. Les coffres Earn stakeront le capital d√©pos√© des utilisateurs dans des protocoles √† rendement s√©curis√© (par exemple, AAVE) pour g√©n√©rer un niveau de base d'int√©r√™t**, et utiliseront une partie de ce revenu garanti pour financer la prime d'option avec des teneurs de march√© pour un potentiel de hausse. Le r√©sultat final sera maximiser la protection contre les baisses, tout en maintenant un certain potentiel de hausse si le march√© √©volue favorablement dans la direction de l'utilisateur. Cela dit, veuillez noter qu'un composant de conception critique exige que les rendements passifs offerts par les protocoles de staking √©ligibles soient significativement sup√©rieurs au paiement dans le pire des cas du produit, afin de financer correctement la prime d'option pour g√©n√©rer le retour potentiel. Ainsi, si l'utilisateur d√©tient de l'ETH au lieu de l'USDT, il/elle devra convertir l'ETH en stETH dans un protocole de staking liquide tel que Lido, avant de verrouiller le stETH dans les coffres du protocole pour b√©n√©ficier de l'accumulation de rendement suppl√©mentaire. Protocole Surge Pour les utilisateurs ayant une tol√©rance au risque-rendement plus √©lev√©e, le protocole propose √©galement des structures √† rendement plus √©lev√© avec un 'ante' de capital initial. Les protocoles Surge sont uniquement destin√©s aux utilisateurs agressifs d√©sireux d'obtenir des rendements substantiellement √©lev√©s en √©change de pertes en capital. Avec ces produits bas√©s sur Surge, le coffre du protocole verrouillera √† la fois le principal de l'utilisateur ainsi que la prime des teneurs de march√© au d√©but de la transaction, analogiquement √† un 'ante de poker'**. Les positions de capital verrouill√©es ne seront pas restak√©es dans d'autres protocoles, et elles servent d'ante engag√© contre le paiement final. Prenons le produit Surge-Rangebound comme exemple. Si le prix de l'actif sous-jacent reste strictement dans les barri√®res jusqu'√† l'√©ch√©ance finale, l'utilisateur recevra un retour exponentiellement plus √©lev√© que ce qu'il aurait eu sous la version Earn. Cependant, si l'inverse se produit, la structure sera r√©sili√©e pr√©matur√©ment, le principal verrouill√© √©tant transf√©r√© au teneur de march√© en tant que 'gagnant' de cette strat√©gie. Encore une fois, ces produits sont destin√©s aux utilisateurs ayant une conviction de march√© tr√®s forte, et qui souhaitent mettre cette confiance √† l'√©preuve dans l'espoir de gagner un taux de retour tr√®s √©lev√© en √©change de pertes en capital. PSA : Note Sp√©ciale sur les Produits Rangebound Illustration Picturale de Comment Fonctionne le Rangebound en Pratique Bien que simple en th√©orie, le produit Rangebound pr√©sente en r√©alit√© certains d√©fis de conception, notamment en ce qui concerne la compatibilit√© on-chain DeFi : Le produit fait r√©f√©rence √† une s√©rie de prix historiques, plut√¥t qu'√† un contr√¥le '√† un moment donn√©' √† l'expiration. Le produit peut √™tre 'knock√©-out' si les barri√®res de prix sont franchies. Le produit peut √™tre knock√©-out √† tout moment, mais il est techniquement infaisable de rafra√Æchir continuellement les r√©f√©rences de prix on-chain tout au long de la journ√©e. Par extension, les v√©rifications de plage sont "r√©trospectives" par n√©cessit√©. L'√©quipe a fait les compromis de conception suivants face aux d√©fis pr√©c√©dents : V√©rifications de Plage Quotidiennes : Dans l'int√©r√™t des frais de gaz et du TPS on-chain, notre produit Rangebound ne fera qu'une v√©rification de prix quotidienne (√† 16h OTC+8) pour d√©terminer si le produit a √©t√© √©limin√© au cours des 24 derni√®res heures. Les produits √©limin√©s se termineront sans plus d'exposition √† l'avenir. Cycles de Produit Quotidiens : Conform√©ment aux v√©rifications de plage quotidiennes et √† la cadence de r√®glement, notre cycle d'observation commencera toujours √† partir de la prochaine p√©riode de 16h (OTC+8). N√©anmoins, les utilisateurs sont libres de s'abonner et d'acheter un produit Rangebound √† tout moment, et leur rendement Base+ commencera √† s'accumuler imm√©diatement. R√©siliation Anticip√©e vs Retrait Final : Les produits Rangebound qui sont '√©limin√©s' sont effectivement 'game over' ; cependant, les d√©p√¥ts des utilisateurs restent stak√©s dans Aave, et nous devons attendre jusqu'√† la maturit√© finale pour que les utilisateurs puissent retirer le principal dans notre it√©ration actuelle.

title: Definire Tuam Praeferentiam Risci
body: Definire Tuae Rationis Praefectum Quantum periculi detrimenti vis capere? Protocollum Mercedis Categoria 'Mercedis' protocollum destinatur ad depositores timidos, qui summam protectionem detrimenti capitis quaerunt. Mercedis thesauri stakabunt caput depositum usorum in protocollis tutis fructiferis (ex. AAVE) ad generandum basim usurae**, et portionem illius reditus certi ad stipendium premium optionis cum mercatoribus ad potentiale augmentum. Finis erit maximare protectionem detrimenti, dum adhuc aliquod augmentum potentiale servatur, si mercatus in directionem usoris favorabiliter moveatur. Cum hoc dictum sit, quaeso nota quod componentis designandi criticae requirunt ut fructus passivi a protocollis stakandi idoneis significanter superent pessimum casum producti, ut recte stipendium premium optionis ad generandum reditum augmenti. Ita, si usor ETH tenet pro USDT, necesse erit ut ETH in stETH convertat in protocollum liquidum stakandi, ut Lido, antequam stETH in thesauris protocolli clauderet ad commoditatem extra incrementi accretionis. Protocollum Surge Pro usoribus cum maiori toleratione periculi-reward, protocollum etiam structuras altioris reditus cum 'ante' capitis priori offert. Protocolla Surge solum ad usores aggressivos destinata sunt, qui reditus substantialiter altos in commutatione pro damnis capitis desiderant. Cum his productis basatis Surge, thesaurus protocolli tam principium usoris quam premium mercatorum in initio negotiationis claudit, analogum ad 'poker-ante' quoddam**. Positiones capitis claudendae non ad alia protocolla restakabuntur, et fungitur ut ante obligatum contra ultimam solutionem. Ut exemplum adhibeam productum Surge-Rangebound. Si pretium subiecti boni stricte intra limites ad maturitatem finalem manet, usor reditum exponentially altiorum accipiet quam sub versione Mercedis. Tamen, si contrarium eveniat, structura ante tempus terminabitur, cum principium clausum ad mercatorem transferetur ut 'victrix' huius consilii. Iterum, haec producta destinata sunt usoribus validam convictionem mercati habentibus, et illam fiduciam in experimentum ponere volunt in spe obtinendi valde altum rate reditus in commutatione pro damnis principii. PSA: Nota Specialis de Productis Rangebound Illustratio Pictoria Quomodo Rangebound in Pratica Operatur Dum simplex in theoria, productum Rangebound re vera aliquas provocationes designandi habet, praesertim cum ad compatibilitatem DeFi on-chain pertinet: Productum seriem pretiorum historicorum refert, potius quam 'punctum-in-tempore' recognitionem ad expirationem. Productum 'excludi' potest si limites pretiorum transgrediantur. Productum excludi potest quovis momento, sed technice impossibile est continuas referentias pretiorum on-chain per diem renovare. Per extensionem, recognitiones spatii sunt "retrospicientes" ex necessitate. The team has made the following design compromises against the preceding challenges: Daily Range Checks: In the interest of gas fees and on-chain TPS, our Rangebound product will only do a daily price check (at 4pm OTC+8) of whether the product has been knocked out over the past 24 hours. Knocked-out products will terminate with no more exposure going forward. Daily Product Cycles: Consistent with the daily range checks and settlement cadence, our observation cycle will always begin from the _next _4pm (OTC+8) period Nevertheless, users are free to subscribe and purchase a Rangebound product at anytime, and their Base+ Yield will start accruing immediately. Early Termination vs Final Withdrawal: Rangebound products which are 'knocked out' are effectively 'game over'; however, user deposits remain staked in Aave, and we must wait until final maturity for users to withdraw the principal in our current iteration.

ŸàŸÖÿπ ÿ∞ŸÑŸÉÿå ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜ ŸÑŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖŸäŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ¥ÿ™ÿ±ÿßŸÉ Ÿàÿ¥ÿ±ÿßÿ° ŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ Rangebound ŸÅŸä ÿ£Ÿä ŸàŸÇÿ™ÿå Ÿàÿ≥ÿ™ÿ®ÿØÿ£ ÿπŸàÿßÿ¶ÿØ Base+ ÿßŸÑÿÆÿßÿµÿ© ÿ®ŸáŸÖ ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ±ÿßŸÉŸÖ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑŸÅŸàÿ±. ÿßŸÑÿ•ŸÜŸáÿßÿ° ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ®ŸÉÿ± ŸÖŸÇÿßÿ®ŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ÿ≠ÿ® ÿßŸÑŸÜŸáÿßÿ¶Ÿä: ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ™Ÿä ÿ™ŸÖ "ÿ•ŸÑÿ∫ÿßÿ§Ÿáÿß" ÿ™ÿπÿ™ÿ®ÿ± ŸÅÿπŸÑŸäÿßŸã "ŸÜŸáÿßŸäÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÑÿπÿ®ÿ©"; ŸàŸÖÿπ ÿ∞ŸÑŸÉÿå ÿ™ÿ∏ŸÑ ŸàÿØÿßÿ¶ÿπ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖŸäŸÜ ŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿ´ŸÖÿ±ÿ© ŸÅŸä Aaveÿå ŸàÿπŸÑŸäŸÜÿß ÿßŸÑÿßŸÜÿ™ÿ∏ÿßÿ± ÿ≠ÿ™Ÿâ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ≥ÿ™ÿ≠ŸÇÿßŸÇ ÿßŸÑŸÜŸáÿßÿ¶Ÿä ŸÑŸÑÿ≥ŸÖÿßÿ≠ ŸÑŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖŸäŸÜ ÿ®ÿ≥ÿ≠ÿ® ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ®ŸÑÿ∫ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ≥ÿßÿ≥Ÿä ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑŸÜÿ≥ÿÆÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ≠ÿßŸÑŸäÿ© ŸÑÿØŸäŸÜÿß.

title: Oracle Construction
body: Oracle Construction In the world of cryptocurrencies and DeFi, obtaining off-chain data in a timely and accurate manner is crucial. As smart contracts cannot directly access external systems or data sources, oracles serve to bridge this gap by bringing outside information onto the blockchain. The trustworthy data service must be provided to ensure full settlement transparency and traceability in settlement, while minimizing possible disputes. The ChainLink oracle service, known for its high degree of decentralization, reliability, and adaptability, has been chosen as SOFA's primary means of accessing off-chain data. Furthermore, the use of ChainLink price feeds has the additional benefit of protecting the protocol against 'flash loan attacks', while the source of data feeds will be from reputable trading platforms such as Coinbase to ensure sanctity of data. SOFA utilizes APRO Oracle to protect our assets on multiple chains. The support and protection from APRO Oracle allow us to maintain the stability and security of our on-chain assets. For more information, please refer to the APRO Oracle documentation. Spot Price / Price at Expiry Obtaining the current price of an underlying asset on-chain through an oracle is typically done in one of two ways: calling contracts from DEXs like Uniswap to get the Price or TWAP Price of the underlying asset obtaining the asset price through data feeds provided by an oracle service like ChainLink Considering the need for the Settlement Price to be as close as possible to CeFi exchange prices (for ease of hedging by users or market makers) and for security reasons (to avoid manipulation and attacks), we have chosen ChainLink's Data Feeds as the oracle source for our Price at Expiry. With ChainLink's decentralized data sources that aggregate pricing information from different exchanges, we ensure that our smart contract executions are based on up-to-date, reliable, and fairest sets of pricing data publicly available. Calculated Price Derived from Historical Closes For products like Rangebound, it is necessary to know the highest and lowest prices of the underlying token from mint inception to expiry in order to calculate the final payout. Common on-chain typically cannot provide this data, given that on-chain oracles do not provide continuous time-series data. Instead of deploying our own oracle contracts as a (common) centralization compromise, we have found a solution in ChainLink's Functions product. Thanks to the latest innovations, we are able to call off-chain APIs in a decentralized manner, and publish the obtained data on-chain through decentralized nodes like a typical data feed. Automation Regular Update Service SOFA utilizes ChainLink Automation to guarantee that prices are automatically updated and pushed to the blockchain on a regular basis. ChainLink Automation offers a decentralized network where smart contracts can schedule and automatically execute complex tasks, including interval data updates, trigger events, and even critical contract adjustments. This ensures that on-chain prices remain constantly up to date, and offers data confidence to SOFA's network of connected dApps. Decentralization and Traceability Staying true to our core DeFi spirit, SOFA's price data retrieval process will always be fully decentralized, offering full audit traceability at the contract level. Our advocacy for transparent processing ensures that every step within the system is openly verifiable by users, with pricing data details such as provider source and aggregation logic fully observable at all times. Continuous Innovation in Oracle Services While ChainLink remains a gold standard for DeFi data reliability, SOFA is continuously exploring and staying informed of the latest innovations in oracle services. We are cognizant of over-reliance on limited provider sources and will strive to diversify our protocol inputs as much as technologically possible. In the long-run, SOFA strives to offer users a robust, transparent, decentralized, and sustainable data acquisition system that can safeguard user interests while ensuring operational longevity.

title: Ïò§ÎùºÌÅ¥ Íµ¨Ï∂ï
body: Ïò§ÎùºÌÅ¥ Íµ¨Ï∂ï ÏïîÌò∏ÌôîÌèêÏôÄ DeFiÏùò ÏÑ∏Í≥ÑÏóêÏÑú, Ïò®Ï≤¥Ïù∏ Ïô∏Î∂Ä Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞Î•º Ï†ÅÏãúÏóê Ï†ïÌôïÌïòÍ≤å ÏñªÎäî Í≤ÉÏù¥ Ï§ëÏöîÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Ïä§ÎßàÌä∏ Í≥ÑÏïΩÏùÄ Ïô∏Î∂Ä ÏãúÏä§ÌÖúÏù¥ÎÇò Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÏÜåÏä§Ïóê ÏßÅÏ†ë Ï†ëÍ∑ºÌï† Ïàò ÏóÜÍ∏∞ ÎïåÎ¨∏Ïóê, Ïò§ÎùºÌÅ¥ÏùÄ Ïô∏Î∂Ä Ï†ïÎ≥¥Î•º Î∏îÎ°ùÏ≤¥Ïù∏ÏúºÎ°ú Í∞ÄÏ†∏Ïò§Îäî Ïó≠Ìï†ÏùÑ Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. Ïã†Î¢∞Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÎäî Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÏÑúÎπÑÏä§Îäî ÏôÑÏ†ÑÌïú Ï†ïÏÇ∞ Ìà¨Î™ÖÏÑ±Í≥º Ï∂îÏ†Å Í∞ÄÎä•ÏÑ±ÏùÑ Î≥¥Ïû•ÌïòÍ≥†, Í∞ÄÎä•Ìïú Î∂ÑÏüÅÏùÑ ÏµúÏÜåÌôîÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ Ï†úÍ≥µÎêòÏñ¥Ïïº Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ChainLink Ïò§ÎùºÌÅ¥ ÏÑúÎπÑÏä§Îäî ÎÜíÏùÄ Î∂ÑÏÇ∞Ìôî, Ïã†Î¢∞ÏÑ± Î∞è Ï†ÅÏùëÏÑ±ÏúºÎ°ú ÏïåÎ†§Ï†∏ ÏûàÏúºÎ©∞, SOFAÏùò Ï£ºÏöî Ïò®Ï≤¥Ïù∏ Ïô∏Î∂Ä Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ Ï†ëÍ∑º ÏàòÎã®ÏúºÎ°ú ÏÑ†ÌÉùÎêòÏóàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÎòêÌïú, ChainLink Í∞ÄÍ≤© ÌîºÎìúÎ•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÎ©¥ 'ÌîåÎûòÏãú Î°† Í≥µÍ≤©'ÏúºÎ°úÎ∂ÄÌÑ∞ ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏùÑ Î≥¥Ìò∏ÌïòÎäî Ï∂îÍ∞ÄÏ†ÅÏù∏ Ïù¥Ï†êÏù¥ ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÌîºÎìúÏùò Ï∂úÏ≤òÎäî CoinbaseÏôÄ Í∞ôÏùÄ Ïã†Î¢∞Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÎäî Í±∞Îûò ÌîåÎû´ÌèºÏóêÏÑú Ï†úÍ≥µÎêòÏñ¥ Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞Ïùò Ïã†Î¢∞ÏÑ±ÏùÑ Î≥¥Ïû•Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. SOFAÎäî APRO OracleÏùÑ ÌôúÏö©ÌïòÏó¨ Ïó¨Îü¨ Ï≤¥Ïù∏ÏóêÏÑú Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò ÏûêÏÇ∞ÏùÑ Î≥¥Ìò∏Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. APRO OracleÏùò ÏßÄÏõêÍ≥º Î≥¥Ìò∏Îäî Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò Ïò®Ï≤¥Ïù∏ ÏûêÏÇ∞Ïùò ÏïàÏ†ïÏÑ±Í≥º Î≥¥ÏïàÏùÑ Ïú†ÏßÄÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÍ≤å Ìï¥Ï§çÎãàÎã§. ÏûêÏÑ∏Ìïú ÎÇ¥Ïö©ÏùÄ APRO Oracle Î¨∏ÏÑúÎ•º Ï∞∏Ï°∞ÌïòÏãúÍ∏∞ Î∞îÎûçÎãàÎã§. ÌòÑÎ¨º Í∞ÄÍ≤© / ÎßåÍ∏∞ Ïãú Í∞ÄÍ≤© Ïò§ÎùºÌÅ¥ÏùÑ ÌÜµÌï¥ Ïò®Ï≤¥Ïù∏ÏóêÏÑú Í∏∞Ï¥à ÏûêÏÇ∞Ïùò ÌòÑÏû¨ Í∞ÄÍ≤©ÏùÑ ÏñªÎäî Í≤ÉÏùÄ ÏùºÎ∞òÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Îëê Í∞ÄÏßÄ Î∞©Î≤ï Ï§ë ÌïòÎÇòÎ°ú ÏàòÌñâÎê©ÎãàÎã§: UniswapÍ≥º Í∞ôÏùÄ DEXÏóêÏÑú Í≥ÑÏïΩÏùÑ Ìò∏Ï∂úÌïòÏó¨ Í∏∞Ï¥à ÏûêÏÇ∞Ïùò Í∞ÄÍ≤© ÎòêÎäî TWAP Í∞ÄÍ≤©ÏùÑ ÏñªÍ∏∞ ChainLinkÏôÄ Í∞ôÏùÄ Ïò§ÎùºÌÅ¥ ÏÑúÎπÑÏä§ÏóêÏÑú Ï†úÍ≥µÌïòÎäî Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÌîºÎìúÎ•º ÌÜµÌï¥ ÏûêÏÇ∞ Í∞ÄÍ≤© ÏñªÍ∏∞ Ï†ïÏÇ∞ Í∞ÄÍ≤©Ïù¥ CeFi Í±∞ÎûòÏÜå Í∞ÄÍ≤©Ïóê ÏµúÎåÄÌïú Í∞ÄÍπùÎèÑÎ°ù(ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÎÇò ÏãúÏû• Ï°∞ÏÑ±ÏûêÏùò Ìó§Ïßï Ïö©Ïù¥ÏÑ±ÏùÑ ÏúÑÌï¥) ÌïòÍ≥†, Ï°∞Ïûë Î∞è Í≥µÍ≤©ÏùÑ ÌîºÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ ChainLinkÏùò Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÌîºÎìúÎ•º Ï†ïÏÇ∞ ÎßåÍ∏∞ Í∞ÄÍ≤©Ïùò Ïò§ÎùºÌÅ¥ ÏÜåÏä§Î°ú ÏÑ†ÌÉùÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ChainLinkÏùò Î∂ÑÏÇ∞ Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÏÜåÏä§Îäî Îã§ÏñëÌïú Í±∞ÎûòÏÜåÏóêÏÑú Í∞ÄÍ≤© Ï†ïÎ≥¥Î•º ÏßëÍ≥ÑÌïòÏó¨, Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò Ïä§ÎßàÌä∏ Í≥ÑÏïΩ Ïã§ÌñâÏù¥ ÏµúÏã†Ïùò Ïã†Î¢∞Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÍ≥† Í≥µÏ†ïÌïú Í∞ÄÍ≤© Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÏÑ∏Ìä∏Î•º Í∏∞Î∞òÏúºÎ°ú Ïù¥Î£®Ïñ¥ÏßÄÎèÑÎ°ù Î≥¥Ïû•Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. Ïó≠ÏÇ¨Ï†Å Ï¢ÖÍ∞ÄÏóêÏÑú ÌååÏÉùÎêú Í≥ÑÏÇ∞ Í∞ÄÍ≤© RangeboundÏôÄ Í∞ôÏùÄ Ï†úÌíàÏùò Í≤ΩÏö∞, ÏµúÏ¢Ö ÏßÄÍ∏âÏï°ÏùÑ Í≥ÑÏÇ∞ÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ Î∞úÌñâ ÏãúÏûëÎ∂ÄÌÑ∞ ÎßåÍ∏∞ÍπåÏßÄ Í∏∞Ï¥à ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞Ïùò ÏµúÍ≥† Î∞è ÏµúÏ†Ä Í∞ÄÍ≤©ÏùÑ ÏïÑÎäî Í≤ÉÏù¥ ÌïÑÏöîÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ÏùºÎ∞òÏ†ÅÏù∏ Ïò®Ï≤¥Ïù∏ÏóêÏÑúÎäî Ïù¥Îü¨Ìïú Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞Î•º Ï†úÍ≥µÌï† Ïàò ÏóÜÏúºÎ©∞, Ïò®Ï≤¥Ïù∏ Ïò§ÎùºÌÅ¥ÏùÄ Ïó∞ÏÜçÏ†ÅÏù∏ ÏãúÍ≥ÑÏó¥ Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞Î•º Ï†úÍ≥µÌïòÏßÄ ÏïäÍ∏∞ ÎïåÎ¨∏ÏûÖÎãàÎã§. ÏûêÏ≤¥ Ïò§ÎùºÌÅ¥ Í≥ÑÏïΩÏùÑ Î∞∞Ìè¨ÌïòÎäî ÎåÄÏã†, ChainLinkÏùò Functions Ï†úÌíàÏóêÏÑú Ìï¥Í≤∞Ï±ÖÏùÑ Ï∞æÏïòÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÏµúÏã† ÌòÅÏã† ÎçïÎ∂ÑÏóê Ïö∞Î¶¨Îäî Î∂ÑÏÇ∞ Î∞©ÏãùÏúºÎ°ú Ïò§ÌîÑÏ≤¥Ïù∏ APIÎ•º Ìò∏Ï∂úÌïòÍ≥†, ÏùºÎ∞òÏ†ÅÏù∏ Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÌîºÎìúÏôÄ Í∞ôÏùÄ Î∂ÑÏÇ∞ ÎÖ∏ÎìúÎ•º ÌÜµÌï¥ ÏñªÏùÄ Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞Î•º Ïò®Ï≤¥Ïù∏Ïóê Í≤åÏãúÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÏûêÎèôÌôî Ï†ïÍ∏∞ ÏóÖÎç∞Ïù¥Ìä∏ ÏÑúÎπÑÏä§ SOFAÎäî ChainLink AutomationÏùÑ ÌôúÏö©ÌïòÏó¨ Í∞ÄÍ≤©Ïù¥ ÏûêÎèôÏúºÎ°ú ÏóÖÎç∞Ïù¥Ìä∏ÎêòÍ≥† Ï†ïÍ∏∞Ï†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Î∏îÎ°ùÏ≤¥Ïù∏Ïóê Ìë∏ÏãúÎêòÎèÑÎ°ù Î≥¥Ïû•Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ChainLink AutomationÏùÄ Ïä§ÎßàÌä∏ Í≥ÑÏïΩÏù¥ Í∞ÑÍ≤© Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÏóÖÎç∞Ïù¥Ìä∏, Ìä∏Î¶¨Í±∞ Ïù¥Î≤§Ìä∏ Î∞è Ï§ëÏöîÌïú Í≥ÑÏïΩ Ï°∞Ï†ïÏùÑ Ìè¨Ìï®Ìïú Î≥µÏû°Ìïú ÏûëÏóÖÏùÑ ÏòàÏïΩÌïòÍ≥† ÏûêÎèôÏúºÎ°ú Ïã§ÌñâÌï† Ïàò ÏûàÎäî Î∂ÑÏÇ∞ ÎÑ§Ìä∏ÏõåÌÅ¨Î•º Ï†úÍ≥µÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥Îäî Ïò®Ï≤¥Ïù∏ Í∞ÄÍ≤©Ïù¥ Ìï≠ÏÉÅ ÏµúÏã† ÏÉÅÌÉúÎ°ú Ïú†ÏßÄÎêòÎ©∞, SOFAÏùò Ïó∞Í≤∞Îêú dApp ÎÑ§Ìä∏ÏõåÌÅ¨Ïóê Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ Ïã†Î¢∞ÏÑ±ÏùÑ Ï†úÍ≥µÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Î∂ÑÏÇ∞Ìôî Î∞è Ï∂îÏ†Å Í∞ÄÎä•ÏÑ± Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò ÌïµÏã¨ DeFi Ï†ïÏã†Ïóê Ï∂©Ïã§ÌïòÍ≤å, SOFAÏùò Í∞ÄÍ≤© Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ Í≤ÄÏÉâ ÌîÑÎ°úÏÑ∏Ïä§Îäî Ìï≠ÏÉÅ ÏôÑÏ†ÑÌûà Î∂ÑÏÇ∞ÌôîÎê©ÎãàÎã§. Í≥ÑÏïΩ ÏàòÏ§ÄÏóêÏÑú ÏôÑÏ†ÑÌïú Í∞êÏÇ¨ Ï∂îÏ†Å Í∞ÄÎä•ÏÑ±ÏùÑ Ï†úÍ≥µÌï©ÎãàÎã§. Ìà¨Î™ÖÌïú Ï≤òÎ¶¨Ïóê ÎåÄÌïú Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò Ï£ºÏû•ÏùÄ ÏãúÏä§ÌÖú ÎÇ¥Ïùò Î™®Îì† Îã®Í≥ÑÍ∞Ä ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÏóê ÏùòÌï¥ Í≥µÍ∞úÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Í≤ÄÏ¶ù Í∞ÄÎä•ÌïòÎèÑÎ°ù Î≥¥Ïû•ÌïòÎ©∞, Í∞ÄÍ≤© Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ ÏÑ∏Î∂Ä ÏÇ¨Ìï≠Ïù∏ Ï†úÍ≥µÏûê Ï∂úÏ≤ò Î∞è ÏßëÍ≥Ñ ÎÖºÎ¶¨Îäî Ìï≠ÏÉÅ ÏôÑÏ†ÑÌûà Í¥ÄÏ∞∞ Í∞ÄÎä•Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. Ïò§ÎùºÌÅ¥ ÏÑúÎπÑÏä§Ïùò ÏßÄÏÜçÏ†ÅÏù∏ ÌòÅÏã† ChainLinkÍ∞Ä DeFi Îç∞Ïù¥ÌÑ∞ Ïã†Î¢∞ÏÑ±Ïùò Í∏àÎ≥∏ÏúÑÎ°ú ÎÇ®ÏïÑ ÏûàÎäî ÎèôÏïà, SOFAÎäî Ïò§ÎùºÌÅ¥ ÏÑúÎπÑÏä§Ïùò ÏµúÏã† ÌòÅÏã†ÏùÑ ÏßÄÏÜçÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú ÌÉêÏÉâÌïòÍ≥† Ï†ïÎ≥¥Î•º Ïú†ÏßÄÌïòÍ≥† ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïö∞Î¶¨Îäî Ï†úÌïúÎêú Í≥µÍ∏âÏûê ÏÜåÏä§Ïóê ÎåÄÌïú Í≥ºÎèÑÌïú ÏùòÏ°¥ÏùÑ Ïù∏ÏãùÌïòÍ≥† ÏûàÏúºÎ©∞ Í∏∞Ïà†Ï†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Í∞ÄÎä•Ìïú Ìïú Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú ÏûÖÎ†•ÏùÑ Îã§ÏñëÌôîÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ ÎÖ∏Î†•Ìï† Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. title: Construction d'oracle
body: Oracle Construction Dans le monde des cryptomonnaies et de la DeFi, l'obtention de donn√©es hors cha√Æne de mani√®re rapide et pr√©cise est cruciale. Comme les contrats intelligents ne peuvent pas acc√©der directement aux syst√®mes externes ou aux sources de donn√©es, les oracles servent √† combler cette lacune en apportant des informations externes sur la blockchain. De plus, l'utilisation des flux de prix ChainLink pr√©sente le b√©n√©fice suppl√©mentaire de prot√©ger le protocole contre les 'attaques de pr√™ts flash', tandis que la source des flux de donn√©es proviendra de plateformes de trading r√©put√©es telles que Coinbase pour garantir l'int√©grit√© des donn√©es. SOFA utilise APRO Oracle pour prot√©ger nos actifs sur plusieurs cha√Ænes. Pour plus d'informations, veuillez consulter la documentation d'APRO Oracle. Prix Spot / Prix √† l'√âch√©ance L'obtention du prix actuel d'un actif sous-jacent sur cha√Æne via un oracle se fait g√©n√©ralement de deux mani√®res : appeler des contrats de DEX comme Uniswap pour obtenir le prix ou le prix TWAP de l'actif sous-jacent obtenir le prix de l'actif via des flux de donn√©es fournis par un service oracle comme ChainLink Consid√©rant la n√©cessit√© que le prix de r√®glement soit aussi proche que possible des prix des √©changes CeFi (pour faciliter la couverture par les utilisateurs ou les teneurs de march√©) et pour des raisons de s√©curit√© (pour √©viter la manipulation et les attaques), nous avons choisi les flux de donn√©es de ChainLink comme source oracle pour notre prix √† l'√©ch√©ance. Avec les sources de donn√©es d√©centralis√©es de ChainLink qui agr√®gent les informations de prix provenant de diff√©rentes bourses, nous garantissons que l'ex√©cution de nos contrats intelligents est bas√©e sur des ensembles de donn√©es de prix √† jour, fiables et les plus √©quitables disponibles publiquement. Prix Calcul√© D√©riv√© des Cl√¥tures Historiques Pour des produits comme Rangebound, il est n√©cessaire de conna√Ætre les prix les plus √©lev√©s et les plus bas du jeton sous-jacent depuis la cr√©ation jusqu'√† l'√©ch√©ance afin de calculer le paiement final. Les oracles sur cha√Æne communs ne peuvent g√©n√©ralement pas fournir ces donn√©es, √©tant donn√© que les oracles sur cha√Æne ne fournissent pas de donn√©es en s√©rie temporelle continue. Au lieu de d√©ployer nos propres contrats oracle comme un compromis de centralisation (commun), nous avons trouv√© une solution dans le produit Functions de ChainLink. Gr√¢ce aux derni√®res innovations, nous sommes en mesure d'appeler des API hors cha√Æne de mani√®re d√©centralis√©e et de publier les donn√©es obtenues sur cha√Æne via des n≈ìuds d√©centralis√©s comme un flux de donn√©es typique. Nous sommes conscients de la d√©pendance excessive √† des sources de fournisseurs limit√©es et nous nous efforcerons de diversifier nos entr√©es de protocole autant que technologiquement possible. √Ä long terme, SOFA s'efforce d'offrir aux utilisateurs un syst√®me d'acquisition de donn√©es robuste, transparent, d√©centralis√© et durable qui puisse prot√©ger les int√©r√™ts des utilisateurs tout en garantissant la long√©vit√© op√©rationnelle.

title: Constructio Oraculi
body: Oracle Constructio In orbe cryptographiarum et DeFi, obtinentis data extra catena in tempore opportuno et accurate est cruciale. Cum contractus intelligentes directe ad systemata externa vel fontes datae accedere non possint, oracula hanc lacunam complent, informationem externam in blockchain adducendo. Servitium datae fiduciae praebendum est ad plenam transparentiam et traceabilitatem in solutione curandam, dum disputationes possibilis minuit. Servitium oraculi ChainLink, notum pro alto gradu decentralizationis, fiducia, et adaptabilitate, electum est ut principale medium SOFA ad accessum datae extra catena. Praeterea, usus ChainLink pretii alimentorum habet additamentum commodum tuendi protocolum contra 'flash loan impetum', dum fons datae alimentorum erit ex notis mercaturae tabulis sicut Coinbase ad sanctitatem datae curandam. SOFA utitur APRO Oracle ad tuenda nostra bona in pluribus catenae. Subsidium et protectio a APRO Oracle nobis permittunt stabilitatem et securitatem bonorum nostrorum in catena servare. Pro plura informatione, quaeso refer ad APRO Oracle documentationem. Pretium Spot / Pretium ad Expirationem Obtinentis pretium currentis boni subiecti in catena per oraculum typice fit uno ex duobus modis: vocando contractus ex DEXs sicut Uniswap ad obtinendum Pretium vel Pretium TWAP boni subiecti obtinendo pretium boni per alimenta datae a servitio oraculi sicut ChainLink praebita Considerans necessitatem Pretii Solutionis esse quam proximum ad pretii mercaturae CeFi (ad facilitatem hedging a usoribus vel fabricatoribus mercatus) et ob rationes securitatis (ad vitandum manipulationem et impetum), elegimus Alimenta Datae ChainLink ut fontem oraculi pro nostro Pretio ad Expirationem. Cum fontibus datae decentralizatis ChainLink, quae informationem de pretio ex diversis mercatibus aggregant, curamus ut executiones contractuum nostrorum intelligentium fundentur in data pretiorum recentissima, fideli, et aequissima publice praesto. Pretium Calculatum Ex Clusuris Historica Pro productis sicut Rangebound, necessarium est scire summa et minima pretia token subiecti ab initio mint ad expirationem ut finalem solutionem calculare possimus. Communis in catena typice hanc data non praebere potest, cum oracula in catena non praebent data temporis series continua. Proponendo nostra propria oracula contractus ut (communis) compromissum centralizationis, solutionem in Functionibus producti ChainLink invenimus. Gratias novissimis innovationibus, possumus vocare APIs extra catena modo decentralizato, et data obtenta in catena per nodos decentralizatos sicut typicum alimentum datae publicare. Automatio Regularis Update Servitium SOFA utitur ChainLink Automation ad garantiam ut pretia automatice renoventur et ad blockchain regulariter mittantur. ChainLink Automation offert reticulum decentralizatum ubi contractus intelligentes complexas operationes programmare et automatice exsequi possunt, inter data intervalla renovata, eventus incitantes, et etiam adjustmenta critica contractuum. Hoc curat ut pretia in catena constanter recentia maneant, et fiduciam datae praebet reticulo SOFA coniunctorum dApps. Decentralizatio et Traceabilitas Fidelis spiritui nostro core DeFi, processus retrieval datae pretii SOFA semper plene decentralizatus erit, plenam audit traceabilitatem ad gradum contractus offerens. Advocatio nostra pro processu transparenti curat ut omnis gradus intra systema ab usoribus aperte verificabilis sit, cum detailibus datae pretii sicut fons praebitoris et logica aggregationis semper observabilis. Innovatio Continua in Servitiis Oracle Dum ChainLink manet aurum signum pro fiducia data DeFi, SOFA continue explorat et informatur de novissimis innovationibus in servitiis oracle. Nos conscii sumus de nimia fiducia in limitatis fontibus praebitorum et conabimur diversificare nostra protocolla inputa quantum technice fieri potest. In longo tempore, SOFA conatur offerre usoribus robustum, transparentem, decentralizatum, et sustinendum systema acquisitionis datae quod potest tueri usorum iura dum operativam diuturnitatem curat.

ŸÖÿπ ŸÖÿµÿßÿØÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ®ŸäÿßŸÜÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÑÿßŸÖÿ±ŸÉÿ≤Ÿäÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ChainLink ÿßŸÑÿ™Ÿä ÿ™ÿ¨ŸÖÿπ ŸÖÿπŸÑŸàŸÖÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ≥ÿπŸäÿ± ŸÖŸÜ ÿ™ÿ®ÿßÿØŸÑÿßÿ™ ŸÖÿÆÿ™ŸÑŸÅÿ©ÿå ŸÜÿ∂ŸÖŸÜ ÿ£ŸÜ ÿ™ŸÜŸÅŸäÿ∞ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿπŸÇŸàÿØ ÿßŸÑÿ∞ŸÉŸäÿ© ŸÑÿØŸäŸÜÿß ÿ™ÿ≥ÿ™ŸÜÿØ ÿ•ŸÑŸâ ŸÖÿ¨ŸÖŸàÿπÿßÿ™ ÿ®ŸäÿßŸÜÿßÿ™ ÿ™ÿ≥ÿπŸäÿ± ŸÖŸàÿ´ŸàŸÇÿ© ŸàŸÖÿ≠ÿØÿ´ÿ© ŸàÿπÿßÿØŸÑÿ© ŸÖÿ™ÿßÿ≠ÿ© ŸÑŸÑÿ¨ŸÖŸáŸàÿ±. ÿßŸÑÿ≥ÿπÿ± ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≠ÿ≥Ÿàÿ® ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ŸÖÿØ ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ•ÿ∫ŸÑÿßŸÇÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿßÿ±ŸäÿÆŸäÿ© ÿ®ÿßŸÑŸÜÿ≥ÿ®ÿ© ŸÑŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ÿßÿ™ ŸÖÿ´ŸÑ Rangeboundÿå ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ∂ÿ±Ÿàÿ±Ÿä ŸÖÿπÿ±ŸÅÿ© ÿ£ÿπŸÑŸâ Ÿàÿ£ÿØŸÜŸâ ÿ£ÿ≥ÿπÿßÿ± ŸÑŸÑÿ±ŸÖÿ≤ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ≥ÿßÿ≥Ÿä ŸÖŸÜ ÿ®ÿØÿßŸäÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸÉ ÿ•ŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÜÿ™Ÿáÿßÿ° ÿßŸÑÿµŸÑÿßÿ≠Ÿäÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿ£ÿ¨ŸÑ ÿ≠ÿ≥ÿßÿ® ÿßŸÑÿØŸÅÿπ ÿßŸÑŸÜŸáÿßÿ¶Ÿä. ÿπÿßÿØÿ©Ÿã ŸÑÿß ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜ ÿ£ŸÜ ÿ™ŸàŸÅÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿßÿ≥ŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿπÿßŸÖÿ© Ÿáÿ∞Ÿá ÿßŸÑÿ®ŸäÿßŸÜÿßÿ™ÿå ŸÜÿ∏ÿ±Ÿãÿß ŸÑÿ£ŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ£Ÿàÿ±ÿßŸÉŸÑ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ© ŸÑÿß ÿ™ŸÇÿØŸÖ ÿ®ŸäÿßŸÜÿßÿ™ ÿ≤ŸÖŸÜŸäÿ© ŸÖÿ™ÿ≥ŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ© ŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ŸÖÿ±ÿ©. ÿ®ÿØŸÑÿßŸã ŸÖŸÜ ŸÜÿ¥ÿ± ÿπŸÇŸàÿØ ÿßŸÑÿ£Ÿàÿ±ÿßŸÉŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿÆÿßÿµÿ© ÿ®ŸÜÿß ŸÉÿ≠ŸÑ ŸÖÿ±ŸÉÿ≤Ÿä (ÿ¥ÿßÿ¶ÿπ)ÿå Ÿàÿ¨ÿØŸÜÿß ÿ≠ŸÑÿßŸã ŸÅŸä ŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ Ÿàÿ∏ÿßÿ¶ŸÅ ChainLink. ÿ®ŸÅÿ∂ŸÑ ÿ£ÿ≠ÿØÿ´ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ®ÿ™ŸÉÿßÿ±ÿßÿ™ÿå ŸÜÿ≠ŸÜ ŸÇÿßÿØÿ±ŸàŸÜ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßÿ≥ÿ™ÿØÿπÿßÿ° Ÿàÿßÿ¨Ÿáÿßÿ™ ÿ®ÿ±ŸÖÿ¨ÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ∑ÿ®ŸäŸÇÿßÿ™ ÿÆÿßÿ±ÿ¨ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ© ÿ®ÿ∑ÿ±ŸäŸÇÿ© ŸÑÿßŸÖÿ±ŸÉÿ≤Ÿäÿ©ÿå ŸàŸÜÿ¥ÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ®ŸäÿßŸÜÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ™Ÿä ÿ™ŸÖ ÿßŸÑÿ≠ÿµŸàŸÑ ÿπŸÑŸäŸáÿß ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿÆŸÑÿßŸÑ ÿπŸÇÿØ ŸÑÿßŸÖÿ±ŸÉÿ≤Ÿäÿ© ŸÖÿ´ŸÑ ÿ™ÿ∫ÿ∞Ÿäÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ®ŸäÿßŸÜÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÜŸÖŸàÿ∞ÿ¨Ÿäÿ©. ÿÆÿØŸÖÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ≠ÿØŸäÿ´ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ∏ŸÖ ÿßŸÑÿ¢ŸÑŸä ÿ™ÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖ SOFA ChainLink Automation ŸÑÿ∂ŸÖÿßŸÜ ÿ™ÿ≠ÿØŸäÿ´ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ≥ÿπÿßÿ± ÿ™ŸÑŸÇÿßÿ¶ŸäŸãÿß ŸàÿØŸÅÿπŸáÿß ÿ•ŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ®ŸÑŸàŸÉÿ¥ŸäŸÜ ÿ®ÿßŸÜÿ™ÿ∏ÿßŸÖ. ÿ™ŸÇÿØŸÖ ChainLink Automation ÿ¥ÿ®ŸÉÿ© ŸÑÿßŸÖÿ±ŸÉÿ≤Ÿäÿ© ÿ≠Ÿäÿ´ ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜ ŸÑŸÑÿπŸÇŸàÿØ ÿßŸÑÿ∞ŸÉŸäÿ© ÿ¨ÿØŸàŸÑÿ© Ÿàÿ™ŸÜŸÅŸäÿ∞ ŸÖŸáÿßŸÖ ŸÖÿπŸÇÿØÿ© ÿ™ŸÑŸÇÿßÿ¶ŸäŸãÿßÿå ÿ®ŸÖÿß ŸÅŸä ÿ∞ŸÑŸÉ ÿ™ÿ≠ÿØŸäÿ´ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ®ŸäÿßŸÜÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿØŸàÿ±Ÿäÿ©ÿå ÿ£ÿ≠ÿØÿßÿ´ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ≠ŸÅŸäÿ≤ÿå Ÿàÿ≠ÿ™Ÿâ ÿ™ÿπÿØŸäŸÑÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿπŸÇŸàÿØ ÿßŸÑÿ≠ÿ±ÿ¨ÿ©. Ÿáÿ∞ÿß Ÿäÿ∂ŸÖŸÜ ÿ£ŸÜ ÿ™ÿ∏ŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ≥ÿπÿßÿ± ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ© ŸÖÿ≠ÿØÿ´ÿ© ÿ®ÿßÿ≥ÿ™ŸÖÿ±ÿßÿ±ÿå ŸàŸäŸÇÿØŸÖ ÿ´ŸÇÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ®ŸäÿßŸÜÿßÿ™ ŸÑÿ¥ÿ®ŸÉÿ© SOFA ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ∑ÿ®ŸäŸÇÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÑÿßŸÖÿ±ŸÉÿ≤Ÿäÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ™ÿµŸÑÿ©. ÿßŸÑŸÑÿßŸÖÿ±ŸÉÿ≤Ÿäÿ© ŸàŸÇÿßÿ®ŸÑŸäÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ™ÿ®ÿπ ŸÖÿ™ŸÖÿ≥ŸÉŸäŸÜ ÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ≠ŸÜÿß ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ≥ÿßÿ≥Ÿäÿ© ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑÿ™ŸÖŸàŸäŸÑ ÿßŸÑŸÑÿßŸÖÿ±ŸÉÿ≤Ÿäÿå ÿ≥ÿ™ŸÉŸàŸÜ ÿπŸÖŸÑŸäÿ© ÿßÿ≥ÿ™ÿ±ÿ¨ÿßÿπ ÿ®ŸäÿßŸÜÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ≥ÿπÿßÿ± ŸÅŸä SOFA ÿØÿßÿ¶ŸÖŸãÿß ŸÑÿßŸÖÿ±ŸÉÿ≤Ÿäÿ© ÿ®ÿßŸÑŸÉÿßŸÖŸÑÿå ŸÖŸÖÿß ŸäŸàŸÅÿ± ŸÇÿßÿ®ŸÑŸäÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ™ÿ®ÿπ ÿßŸÑŸÉÿßŸÖŸÑÿ© ÿπŸÑŸâ ŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ŸàŸâ ÿßŸÑÿπŸÇÿØ. ÿ•ŸÜ ÿØÿπŸÖŸÜÿß ŸÑŸÑŸÖÿπÿßŸÑÿ¨ÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ¥ŸÅÿßŸÅÿ© Ÿäÿ∂ŸÖŸÜ ÿ£ŸÜ ŸÉŸÑ ÿÆÿ∑Ÿàÿ© ÿØÿßÿÆŸÑ ÿßŸÑŸÜÿ∏ÿßŸÖ ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ≠ŸÇŸÇ ŸÖŸÜŸáÿß ÿπŸÑŸÜŸãÿß ŸÖŸÜ ŸÇÿ®ŸÑ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖŸäŸÜÿå ŸÖÿπ ÿ™ŸÅÿßÿµŸäŸÑ ÿ®ŸäÿßŸÜÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ≥ÿπŸäÿ± ŸÖÿ´ŸÑ ŸÖÿµÿØÿ± ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≤ŸàÿØ ŸàŸÖŸÜÿ∑ŸÇ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ¨ŸÖŸäÿπ ŸÇÿßÿ®ŸÑÿ© ŸÑŸÑÿ±ÿ§Ÿäÿ© ÿ®ÿßŸÑŸÉÿßŸÖŸÑ ŸÅŸä ÿ¨ŸÖŸäÿπ ÿßŸÑÿ£ŸàŸÇÿßÿ™. ÿßŸÑÿßÿ®ÿ™ŸÉÿßÿ± ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ŸÖÿ± ŸÅŸä ÿÆÿØŸÖÿßÿ™ ÿ£Ÿàÿ±ÿßŸÉŸÑ ÿ®ŸäŸÜŸÖÿß ÿ™ÿ∏ŸÑ ChainLink ŸÖÿπŸäÿßÿ±Ÿãÿß ÿ∞Ÿáÿ®ŸäŸãÿß ŸÑŸÖŸàÿ´ŸàŸÇŸäÿ© ÿ®ŸäÿßŸÜÿßÿ™ DeFiÿå ÿ™ÿ≥ÿ™ŸÖÿ± SOFA ŸÅŸä ÿßÿ≥ÿ™ŸÉÿ¥ÿßŸÅ ŸàÿßŸÑÿ®ŸÇÿßÿ° ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßÿ∑ŸÑÿßÿπ ÿ®ÿ£ÿ≠ÿØÿ´ ÿßŸÑÿßÿ®ÿ™ŸÉÿßÿ±ÿßÿ™ ŸÅŸä ÿÆÿØŸÖÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ£Ÿàÿ±ÿßŸÉŸÑ. ŸÜÿ≠ŸÜ ŸÜÿØÿ±ŸÉ ÿßŸÑÿßÿπÿ™ŸÖÿßÿØ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÅÿ±ÿ∑ ÿπŸÑŸâ ŸÖÿµÿßÿØÿ± ŸÖÿ≤ŸàÿØŸäŸÜ ŸÖÿ≠ÿØŸàÿØÿ© Ÿàÿ≥ŸÜ ŸÜÿ≥ÿπŸâ ŸÑÿ™ŸÜŸàŸäÿπ ŸÖÿØÿÆŸÑÿßÿ™ ÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑŸÜÿß ŸÇÿØÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ•ŸÖŸÉÿßŸÜ ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÜÿßÿ≠Ÿäÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ™ŸÉŸÜŸàŸÑŸàÿ¨Ÿäÿ©. ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿØŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ∑ŸàŸäŸÑÿå ÿ™ÿ≥ÿπŸâ SOFA ŸÑÿ™ŸÇÿØŸäŸÖ ŸÜÿ∏ÿßŸÖ ŸÇŸàŸä Ÿàÿ¥ŸÅÿßŸÅ ŸàŸÖŸàÿ≤ÿπ ŸàŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿØÿßŸÖ ŸÑÿ¨ŸÖÿπ ÿßŸÑÿ®ŸäÿßŸÜÿßÿ™ ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜŸá ÿ≠ŸÖÿßŸäÿ© ŸÖÿµÿßŸÑÿ≠ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖŸäŸÜ ŸÖÿπ ÿ∂ŸÖÿßŸÜ ÿßÿ≥ÿ™ÿØÿßŸÖÿ© ÿßŸÑÿπŸÖŸÑŸäÿßÿ™.

title: On-Chain Settlement Considerations
body: On-Chain Settlement Considerations Settlement Logistics Job-scheduling challenges in the world of DeFi With trivial for conventional systems, time-scheduled data retrievals are challenging for blockchain, as smart contracts do not have a native 'Cron-like' job scheduler. How can we design an automated mechanism to ensure that prices are scheduled and updated on time in crypto? Crypto 'algo-stables' such as Basis Cash or ESD once swept through the DeFi sector, deploying an 'epoch' interval approach which required a manual trigger to advance operations at the end of each epoch and establish a new settlement price. Reward mechanisms were built-in to smart contract code to compel volunteers to 'trigger the advance' and keep the protocols in smooth operation. Similarly, a popular project called Keep3r founded by Andre Cronje (Yearn Finance, Fantom) created a virtual job board where one would post advance requests and specified job awards for this very specific purpose. Neither solution was far from perfect as they ultimately relied on human intervention (motivated self-interests), not to mention uncertainties over the actual final execution time, given the manual efforts required. This can lead to uncomfortable situations where the settlement fixing isn't updated until well after the expiry, leading to a less than satisfactory user-experience. Could we create and rely on off-chain solutions that call for a periodic triggering of price updates? While possible, we remain disinterested in centralized 'shortcuts' where the protocol could be critically impaired by risks such as a server failure. As covered in our oracle section, SOFA utilizes ChainLink's Automation service as our settlement pricing source. Their service enables conditional execution of smart contract functions through a reliable and decentralized automation platform with a proven network of external node operations, currently securing over billions in TVL. Finally, with the final settlement price in place, users and market makers can call the contract to burn their Position Token at anytime and receive their due payment, which calculations seamlessly handled by the smart contract with reliable data feeds from SOFA's decentralized oracles. Payoff Calculations The contract for calculating product payoffs is completely standardized, and is Vault-independent and collateral agnostic. Instead, calculation contracts are defined by the underlying type of structured product to calculate the model payouts. Some payoff examples are listed below: Rangebound Payoffmaker={X,HighSettlePrice‚â•HighStrikePrice‚à®LowSettlePrice‚â§LowStrikePrice0,HighSettlePrice<HisghStrikePrice‚àßLowSettlePrice>LowStrikePricePayoff{maker}=\begin{cases}X, HighSettlePrice\geq HighStrikePrice\vee LowSettlePrice\leq LowStrikePrice\\ 0, HighSettlePrice<HisghStrikePrice\wedge LowSettlePrice>LowStrikePrice\end{cases}Payoffmaker={‚ÄãX,HighSettlePrice‚â•HighStrikePrice‚à®LowSettlePrice‚â§LowStrikePrice‚Äã0,HighSettlePrice<HisghStrikePrice‚àßLowSettlePrice>LowStrikePrice‚Äã‚Äã Payoffuser=X‚àíPayoffmakerPayoff {user}=X - title: Consid√©rations sur le r√®glement en cha√Æne
body: Consid√©rations sur le r√®glement en cha√Æne Logistique de r√®glement D√©fis de planification des t√¢ches dans le monde de la DeFi Avec des syst√®mes conventionnels, la r√©cup√©ration de donn√©es programm√©e dans le temps est un d√©fi pour la blockchain, car les contrats intelligents n'ont pas de planificateur de t√¢ches 'Cron-like' natif. Comment pouvons-nous concevoir un m√©canisme automatis√© pour garantir que les prix sont programm√©s et mis √† jour √† temps dans la crypto ? Les 'algo-stables' crypto tels que Basis Cash ou ESD ont autrefois balay√© le secteur de la DeFi, d√©ployant une approche d'intervalle '√©poque' qui n√©cessitait un d√©clenchement manuel pour faire avancer les op√©rations √† la fin de chaque √©poque et √©tablir un nouveau prix de r√®glement. Des m√©canismes de r√©compense √©taient int√©gr√©s dans le code des contrats intelligents pour inciter les b√©n√©voles √† 'd√©clencher l'avance' et maintenir le bon fonctionnement des protocoles. De m√™me, un projet populaire appel√© Keep3r fond√© par Andre Cronje (Yearn Finance, Fantom) a cr√©√© un tableau d'offres d'emploi virtuel o√π l'on pouvait publier des demandes d'avance et des r√©compenses de travail sp√©cifi√©es pour ce but tr√®s sp√©cifique. Aucune des solutions n'√©tait parfaite car elles d√©pendaient finalement de l'intervention humaine (int√©r√™ts personnels motiv√©s), sans parler des incertitudes concernant le temps d'ex√©cution final r√©el, compte tenu des efforts manuels requis. Cela peut conduire √† des situations inconfortables o√π le r√®glement n'est pas mis √† jour jusqu'√† bien apr√®s l'expiration, entra√Ænant une exp√©rience utilisateur moins que satisfaisante. Pourrions-nous cr√©er et compter sur des solutions hors cha√Æne qui appellent √† un d√©clenchement p√©riodique des mises √† jour de prix ? Bien que cela soit possible, nous restons d√©sint√©ress√©s par des 'raccourcis' centralis√©s o√π le protocole pourrait √™tre gravement compromis par des risques tels qu'une d√©faillance de serveur. Comme couvert dans notre section oracle, SOFA utilise le service d'automatisation de ChainLink comme notre source de prix de r√®glement. Leur service permet l'ex√©cution conditionnelle des fonctions de contrat intelligent via une plateforme d'automatisation fiable et d√©centralis√©e avec un r√©seau √©prouv√© d'op√©rations de n≈ìuds externes, s√©curisant actuellement des milliards en TVL. Enfin, avec le prix de r√®glement final en place, les utilisateurs et les teneurs de march√© peuvent appeler le contrat pour br√ªler leur Position Token √† tout moment et recevoir leur paiement d√ª, dont les calculs sont g√©r√©s sans effort par le contrat intelligent avec des flux de donn√©es fiables provenant des oracles d√©centralis√©s de SOFA. Calculs de paiement Le contrat pour le calcul des paiements des produits est compl√®tement standardis√©, et est ind√©pendant du Vault et agnostique au collat√©ral. Au lieu de cela, les contrats de calcul sont d√©finis par le type sous-jacent de produit structur√© pour calculer les paiements mod√®les. Quelques exemples de paiements sont list√©s ci-dessous : Plage limit√©e Payoffmaker={X,HighSettlePrice‚â•HighStrikePrice‚à®LowSettlePrice‚â§LowStrikePrice0,HighSettlePrice<HisghStrikePrice‚àßLowSettlePrice>LowStrikePricePayoff{maker}=\begin{cases}X, HighSettlePrice\geq HighStrikePrice\vee LowSettlePrice\leq LowStrikePrice\\ 0, HighSettlePrice<HisghStrikePrice\wedge LowSettlePrice>LowStrikePrice\end{cases}Payoffmaker={‚ÄãX,HighSettlePrice‚â•HighStrikePrice‚à®LowSettlePrice‚â§LowStrikePrice‚Äã0,HighSettlePrice<HisghStrikePrice‚àßLowSettlePrice>LowStrikePrice‚Äã‚Äã Payoffuser=X‚àíPayoffmakerPayoff {user}=X - title: Considerationes Solvendi In-Chain
body: Considerationes de Solutione On-Chain Logistica Solutionis Difficultates in schedulando opera in mundo DeFi Cum trivialibus pro systematibus conventionalibus, retrievals data temporis-schedulati sunt difficiles pro blockchain, cum contractus intelligentes non habeant 'Cron-simile' schedulatore operum native. Quomodo possumus mechanismum automaticum designare ad curandum ut pretia schedulentur et in tempore in crypto renoventur? Crypto 'algo-stables' sicut Basis Cash vel ESD olim per sector DeFi pervagati sunt, adhibentes accessum intervalli 'epoch' qui manualem impulsionem requireret ad operationes ad finem cuiusque epochae promovere et novum pretium solutionis constituere. Mechanismi praemiorum in codice contractus intelligentis inclusi sunt ad coactum voluntarios 'impulsionem promovere' et protocolla in operatione leni servare. Similiter, projectum populare vocatum Keep3r, a Andre Cronje (Yearn Finance, Fantom) conditum, tabulam operum virtualem creavit ubi quis postulata promotionis et praemia operum specificata pro hoc ipso proposito publicare posset. Utraque solutio longe a perfectione erat, cum ultimatum in interventionem humanam (motivationes propriae) confideret, necnon incertitudines de tempore exsecutionis finalis actuali, data manualibus conatibus requisitis. Hoc ad incommoda ducere potest, ubi fixatio solutionis non renovatur usque ad post expirationem, ducens ad minus satisfactoria experientia usoris. Possumusne creare et confidere in solutionibus off-chain quae periodicum impulsionem renovatorum pretiorum postulant? Dum possibile est, remansimus indifferentes ad 'breviaria' centralizata ubi protocolum periculose impedi potest per pericula sicut defectio servitoris. Ut in sectione nostra oraculi tractatum est, SOFA servitium Automation ChainLink ut fontem nostrorum pretiorum solutionis utitur. Eorum servitium executionem conditionalem functionum contractuum intelligentium per reliable et decentralizatum suggestum automationis cum retis operum nodorum externorum probatorum, nunc plus quam miliarda in TVL securans, permittit. Denique, cum pretium solutionis finale in loco sit, usores et fabricatores mercatus possunt contractum vocare ut suum Position Token quovis tempore exurant et suum debitum solvendum accipiant, quod calculationes a contractu intelligenti sine interruptionibus per reliable data feeds ex oraculis decentralizatis SOFA tractantur. Calculationes Praemiorum Contractus ad calculandum praemia productorum omnino standardizatus est, et est Vault-indifferentis et collateral agnosticus. Proinde, contractus calculationis definiuntur per genus structurae producti subiacente ad calculandum praemia exemplorum. Nonnulla exempla praemiorum infra enumerantur: Rangebound Payoffmaker={X,HighSettlePrice‚â•HighStrikePrice‚à®LowSettlePrice‚â§LowStrikePrice0,HighSettlePrice<HighStrikePrice‚àßLowSettlePrice>LowStrikePricePayoff{maker}=\begin{cases}X, HighSettlePrice\geq HighStrikePrice\vee LowSettlePrice\leq LowStrikePrice\\ 0, HighSettlePrice<HighStrikePrice\wedge LowSettlePrice>LowStrikePrice\end{cases}Payoffmaker={‚ÄãX,HighSettlePrice‚â•HighStrikePrice‚à®LowSettlePrice‚â§LowStrikePrice‚Äã0,HighSettlePrice<HighStrikePrice‚àßLowSettlePrice>LowStrikePrice‚Äã‚Äã Payoffuser=X‚àíPayoffmakerPayoff {user}=X - ŸÉŸäŸÅ ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜŸÜÿß ÿ™ÿµŸÖŸäŸÖ ÿ¢ŸÑŸäÿ© ŸÖÿ§ÿ™ŸÖÿ™ÿ© ŸÑÿ∂ŸÖÿßŸÜ ÿ¨ÿØŸàŸÑÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ≥ÿπÿßÿ± Ÿàÿ™ÿ≠ÿØŸäÿ´Ÿáÿß ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑŸàŸÇÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≠ÿØÿØ ŸÅŸä ÿπÿßŸÑŸÖ ÿßŸÑÿπŸÖŸÑÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ¥ŸÅÿ±ÿ©ÿü ŸÉÿßŸÜÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿπŸÖŸÑÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ¥ŸÅÿ±ÿ© 'ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ŸÇÿ±ÿ© ÿßŸÑÿÆŸàÿßÿ±ÿ≤ŸÖŸäÿ©' ŸÖÿ´ŸÑ Basis Cash ÿ£Ÿà ESD ŸÇÿØ ÿßÿ¨ÿ™ÿßÿ≠ÿ™ ŸÇÿ∑ÿßÿπ ÿßŸÑÿ™ŸÖŸàŸäŸÑ ÿßŸÑŸÑÿßŸÖÿ±ŸÉÿ≤Ÿäÿå ÿ≠Ÿäÿ´ ÿßÿπÿ™ŸÖÿØÿ™ ŸÜŸáÿ¨ ÿßŸÑŸÅÿ™ÿ±ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ≤ŸÖŸÜŸäÿ© 'ÿßŸÑÿπÿµÿ±' ÿßŸÑÿ∞Ÿä Ÿäÿ™ÿ∑ŸÑÿ® ŸÖÿ≠ŸÅÿ≤ÿßŸã ŸäÿØŸàŸäÿßŸã ŸÑÿ™ŸÇÿØŸÖ ÿßŸÑÿπŸÖŸÑŸäÿßÿ™ ŸÅŸä ŸÜŸáÿßŸäÿ© ŸÉŸÑ ÿπÿµÿ± Ÿàÿ™ÿ≠ÿØŸäÿØ ÿ≥ÿπÿ± ÿ™ÿ≥ŸàŸäÿ© ÿ¨ÿØŸäÿØ. ÿ™ŸÖ ÿ®ŸÜÿßÿ° ÿ¢ŸÑŸäÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÉÿßŸÅÿ¢ÿ™ ŸÅŸä ŸÉŸàÿØ ÿßŸÑÿπŸÇÿØ ÿßŸÑÿ∞ŸÉŸä ŸÑÿ•ÿ¨ÿ®ÿßÿ± ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ™ÿ∑ŸàÿπŸäŸÜ ÿπŸÑŸâ 'ÿ™ÿ≠ŸÅŸäÿ≤ ÿßŸÑÿ™ŸÇÿØŸÖ' ŸàÿßŸÑÿ≠ŸÅÿßÿ∏ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿ™ÿ¥ÿ∫ŸäŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑÿßÿ™ ÿ®ÿ≥ŸÑÿßÿ≥ÿ©. Ÿàÿ®ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ´ŸÑÿå ÿ£ŸÜÿ¥ÿ£ ŸÖÿ¥ÿ±Ÿàÿπ ÿ¥ÿßÿ¶ÿπ Ÿäÿ≥ŸÖŸâ Keep3r ÿ£ÿ≥ÿ≥Ÿá ÿ£ŸÜÿØÿ±Ÿä ŸÉÿ±ŸàŸÜÿ¨Ÿä (Yearn Financeÿå Fantom) ŸÑŸàÿ≠ÿ© Ÿàÿ∏ÿßÿ¶ŸÅ ÿßŸÅÿ™ÿ±ÿßÿ∂Ÿäÿ© ÿ≠Ÿäÿ´ ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜ ŸÑŸÑŸÖÿ±ÿ° ŸÜÿ¥ÿ± ÿ∑ŸÑÿ®ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ™ŸÇÿØŸÖ Ÿàÿ™ÿ≠ÿØŸäÿØ ÿ¨Ÿàÿßÿ¶ÿ≤ ÿßŸÑŸàÿ∏ÿßÿ¶ŸÅ ŸÑŸáÿ∞ÿß ÿßŸÑÿ∫ÿ±ÿ∂ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≠ÿØÿØ ÿ¨ÿØÿßŸã. ŸÑŸÖ ÿ™ŸÉŸÜ ÿ£Ÿä ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ≠ŸÑŸàŸÑ ÿ®ÿπŸäÿØÿ© ÿπŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÉŸÖÿßŸÑ ÿ≠Ÿäÿ´ ÿßÿπÿ™ŸÖÿØÿ™ ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑŸÜŸáÿßŸäÿ© ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿØÿÆŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿ®ÿ¥ÿ±Ÿä (ÿßŸÑŸÖÿµÿßŸÑÿ≠ ÿßŸÑÿ∞ÿßÿ™Ÿäÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≠ŸÅÿ≤ÿ©)ÿå ŸÜÿßŸáŸäŸÉ ÿπŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ¥ŸÉŸàŸÉ ÿ≠ŸàŸÑ ÿßŸÑŸàŸÇÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÅÿπŸÑŸä ŸÑŸÑÿ™ŸÜŸÅŸäÿ∞ ÿßŸÑŸÜŸáÿßÿ¶Ÿäÿå ŸÜÿ∏ÿ±ÿßŸã ŸÑŸÑÿ¨ŸáŸàÿØ ÿßŸÑŸäÿØŸàŸäÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ∑ŸÑŸàÿ®ÿ©. ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜ ÿ£ŸÜ Ÿäÿ§ÿØŸä ÿ∞ŸÑŸÉ ÿ•ŸÑŸâ ŸÖŸàÿßŸÇŸÅ ÿ∫Ÿäÿ± ŸÖÿ±Ÿäÿ≠ÿ© ÿ≠Ÿäÿ´ ŸÑÿß Ÿäÿ™ŸÖ ÿ™ÿ≠ÿØŸäÿ´ ÿ™ÿ´ÿ®Ÿäÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ≥ŸàŸäÿ© ÿ≠ÿ™Ÿâ ÿ®ÿπÿØ ÿßŸÜÿ™Ÿáÿßÿ° ÿßŸÑŸÖÿØÿ©ÿå ŸÖŸÖÿß Ÿäÿ§ÿØŸä ÿ•ŸÑŸâ ÿ™ÿ¨ÿ±ÿ®ÿ© ŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖ ÿ£ŸÇŸÑ ŸÖŸÜ ŸÖÿ±ÿ∂Ÿäÿ©. ŸáŸÑ ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜŸÜÿß ÿ•ŸÜÿ¥ÿßÿ° ŸàÿßŸÑÿßÿπÿ™ŸÖÿßÿØ ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿ≠ŸÑŸàŸÑ ÿÆÿßÿ±ÿ¨ ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ≥ŸÑÿ© ÿ™ÿ™ÿ∑ŸÑÿ® ÿ™ÿ≠ŸÅŸäÿ≤ÿßŸã ÿØŸàÿ±ŸäÿßŸã ŸÑÿ™ÿ≠ÿØŸäÿ´ ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ≥ÿπÿßÿ±ÿü ÿ®ŸäŸÜŸÖÿß Ÿáÿ∞ÿß ŸÖŸÖŸÉŸÜÿå ŸÜÿ≠ŸÜ ÿ∫Ÿäÿ± ŸÖŸáÿ™ŸÖŸäŸÜ ÿ®ŸÄ 'ÿßŸÑÿßÿÆÿ™ÿµÿßÿ±ÿßÿ™' ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ±ŸÉÿ≤Ÿäÿ© ÿ≠Ÿäÿ´ ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜ ÿ£ŸÜ Ÿäÿ™ÿπÿ±ÿ∂ ÿßŸÑÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑ ŸÑŸÑÿÆÿ∑ÿ± ÿ®ÿ¥ŸÉŸÑ ÿ≠ÿ±ÿ¨ ÿ®ÿ≥ÿ®ÿ® ŸÖÿÆÿßÿ∑ÿ± ŸÖÿ´ŸÑ ŸÅÿ¥ŸÑ ÿßŸÑÿÆÿßÿØŸÖ. ŸÉŸÖÿß ÿ™ŸÖ ÿ™ÿ∫ÿ∑Ÿäÿ™Ÿá ŸÅŸä ŸÇÿ≥ŸÖ ÿßŸÑÿ£Ÿàÿ±ŸÉŸÑ ŸÑÿØŸäŸÜÿßÿå ÿ™ÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖ SOFA ÿÆÿØŸÖÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ™ŸÖÿ™ÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ChainLink ŸÉŸÖÿµÿØÿ± ŸÑÿ™ÿ≥ÿπŸäÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ≥ŸàŸäÿ©. ÿ™ÿ™Ÿäÿ≠ ÿÆÿØŸÖÿ™ŸáŸÖ ÿßŸÑÿ™ŸÜŸÅŸäÿ∞ ÿßŸÑÿ¥ÿ±ÿ∑Ÿä ŸÑŸàÿ∏ÿßÿ¶ŸÅ ÿßŸÑÿπŸÇŸàÿØ ÿßŸÑÿ∞ŸÉŸäÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿÆŸÑÿßŸÑ ŸÖŸÜÿµÿ© ÿ£ÿ™ŸÖÿ™ÿ© ŸÖŸàÿ´ŸàŸÇÿ© ŸàŸÑÿß ŸÖÿ±ŸÉÿ≤Ÿäÿ© ŸÖÿπ ÿ¥ÿ®ŸÉÿ© ŸÖÿ´ÿ®ÿ™ÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿπŸÖŸÑŸäÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿπŸÇÿØ ÿßŸÑÿÆÿßÿ±ÿ¨Ÿäÿå ŸàÿßŸÑÿ™Ÿä ÿ™ÿ§ŸÖŸÜ ÿ≠ÿßŸÑŸäÿßŸã ÿ£ŸÉÿ´ÿ± ŸÖŸÜ ŸÖŸÑŸäÿßÿ±ÿßÿ™ ŸÅŸä ÿßŸÑŸÇŸäŸÖÿ© ÿßŸÑÿ•ÿ¨ŸÖÿßŸÑŸäÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÇŸÅŸÑÿ©. ÿ£ÿÆŸäÿ±ÿßŸãÿå ŸÖÿπ ÿ™ÿ≠ÿØŸäÿØ ÿ≥ÿπÿ± ÿßŸÑÿ™ÿ≥ŸàŸäÿ© ÿßŸÑŸÜŸáÿßÿ¶Ÿäÿå ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜ ŸÑŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖŸäŸÜ ŸàÿµÿßŸÜÿπŸä ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸàŸÇ ÿßÿ≥ÿ™ÿØÿπÿßÿ° ÿßŸÑÿπŸÇÿØ ŸÑÿ≠ÿ±ŸÇ ÿ±ŸÖÿ≤ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸàŸÇŸÅ ÿßŸÑÿÆÿßÿµ ÿ®ŸáŸÖ ŸÅŸä ÿ£Ÿä ŸàŸÇÿ™ Ÿàÿßÿ≥ÿ™ŸÑÿßŸÖ ŸÖÿØŸÅŸàÿπÿßÿ™ŸáŸÖ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿ≠ŸÇÿ©ÿå ŸàÿßŸÑÿ™Ÿä Ÿäÿ™ŸÖ ÿ≠ÿ≥ÿßÿ®Ÿáÿß ÿ®ÿ≥ŸÑÿßÿ≥ÿ© ÿ®Ÿàÿßÿ≥ÿ∑ÿ© ÿßŸÑÿπŸÇÿØ ÿßŸÑÿ∞ŸÉŸä ŸÖÿπ ÿ™ÿØŸÅŸÇÿßÿ™ ÿ®ŸäÿßŸÜÿßÿ™ ŸÖŸàÿ´ŸàŸÇÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿ£Ÿàÿ±ŸÉŸÑÿ≤ SOFA ÿßŸÑŸÑÿßŸÖÿ±ŸÉÿ≤Ÿäÿ©. ÿ≠ÿ≥ÿßÿ®ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑÿπŸàÿßÿ¶ÿØ ÿßŸÑÿπŸÇÿØ ÿßŸÑÿÆÿßÿµ ÿ®ÿ≠ÿ≥ÿßÿ® ÿπŸàÿßÿ¶ÿØ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ÿßÿ™ ŸÖŸàÿ≠ÿØ ÿ™ŸÖÿßŸÖÿßŸãÿå ŸàŸáŸà ŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ŸÇŸÑ ÿπŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿÆÿ≤ÿßÿ¶ŸÜ Ÿàÿ∫Ÿäÿ± ŸÖÿ±ÿ™ÿ®ÿ∑ ÿ®ÿßŸÑÿ∂ŸÖÿßŸÜÿßÿ™. ÿ®ÿØŸÑÿßŸã ŸÖŸÜ ÿ∞ŸÑŸÉÿå ÿ™Ÿèÿ≠ÿØÿØ ÿπŸÇŸàÿØ ÿßŸÑÿ≠ÿ≥ÿßÿ®ÿßÿ™ ÿ≠ÿ≥ÿ® ŸÜŸàÿπ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ ÿßŸÑŸáŸäŸÉŸÑŸä ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ≥ÿßÿ≥Ÿä ŸÑÿ≠ÿ≥ÿßÿ® ÿßŸÑŸÖÿØŸÅŸàÿπÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÜŸÖŸàÿ∞ÿ¨Ÿäÿ©. ÿ®ÿπÿ∂ ÿ£ŸÖÿ´ŸÑÿ© ÿßŸÑÿπŸàÿßÿ¶ÿØ ŸÖÿØÿ±ÿ¨ÿ© ÿ£ÿØŸÜÿßŸá: ŸÖÿ≠ÿØŸàÿØ ÿßŸÑŸÜÿ∑ÿßŸÇ Payoffmaker={X,HighSettlePrice‚â•HighStrikePrice‚à®LowSettlePrice‚â§LowStrikePrice0,HighSettlePrice<HighStrikePrice‚àßLowSettlePrice>LowStrikePricePayoff{maker}=\begin{cases}X, HighSettlePrice\geq HighStrikePrice\vee LowSettlePrice\leq LowStrikePrice\\ 0, HighSettlePrice<HighStrikePrice\wedge LowSettlePrice>LowStrikePrice\end{cases}Payoffmaker={‚ÄãX,HighSettlePrice‚â•HighStrikePrice‚à®LowSettlePrice‚â§LowStrikePrice‚Äã0,HighSettlePrice<HighStrikePrice‚àßLowSettlePrice>LowStrikePrice‚Äã‚Äã Payoffuser=X‚àíPayoffmakerPayoff {user}=X - title: Protocol Fees
body: Protocol Fees At SOFA, we are committed to creating a fair and transparent financial ecosystem where users can democratically purchase in a wide gamut of structured products with transparent and fair pricing from market makers. Furthermore, as a fully decentralized project, we want to ensure that any protocol gains are primarily shared with our underlying users, ensuring full incentive alignment rather than privileged payouts to special interest groups. As such, we have devised a series of fee structures with 'fair-launch' tokenomics to ensure proper value-accrual and support long-term platform longevity. There will be no VC joy-riding or exit-liquidity dumps within SOFA. Protocol Fees üí∞ SOFA will collect 15% of the user's option premium as a base trading fee. Furthermore, in the event of a 'winning' payout occurring for the user, a further 5% settlement fee will be charged against the total Gross Upside Payout. Fee Calculations For full transparency, please see the following example of how fees and payoffs are calculated in our protocols. Definitions: Premium=NotionalDeposit‚àó(1+AAVE1MonthAverage‚àíBaseYield)FullDays/365‚àíNotionalDepositPremium = Notional_{Deposit} * (1 + AAVE_{1MonthAverage} - BaseYield)^{Full Days/365} - Notional_{Deposit}Premium=Notional‚ÄãDeposit‚Äã‚Äã‚àó(1+AAVE‚Äã1MonthAverage‚Äã‚Äã‚àíBaseYield)‚ÄãFullDays/365‚Äã‚Äã‚àíNotional‚ÄãDeposit‚Äã‚Äã MM's Collateral = Vault-Locked Collateral from Market Maker Observation Window: From the next 16:00 (UTC+8) to Expiry Day 16:00 (UTC+8) User Payoffs at Expiry: If Knocked-Out PayoffinUSDT=NotionalDeposit+AAVEInterestActual‚àíPremium‚àó(1+0.15)Payoff_{inUSDT} = Notional_{Deposit} + AAVEInterest_{Actual} - Premium * (1 + 0.15)Payoff‚ÄãinUSDT‚Äã‚Äã=Notional‚ÄãDeposit‚Äã‚Äã+AAVEInterest‚ÄãActual‚Äã‚Äã‚àíPremium‚àó(1+0.15) No Knocked-Out PayoffinUSDT=NotionalDeposit+AAVEInterestActual+Premium‚àó(1‚àí0.15‚àí0.05)+MM‚Ä≤sCollateral‚àó(1‚àí0.05)Payoff_{inUSDT} = Notional_{Deposit} + AAVEInterest_{Actual} + Premium * (1 - 0.15 - 0.05) + MM'sCollateral * (1 - 0.05)Payoff‚ÄãinUSDT‚Äã‚Äã=Notional‚ÄãDeposit‚Äã‚Äã+AAVEInterest‚ÄãActual‚Äã‚Äã+Premium‚àó(1‚àí0.15‚àí0.05)+MM‚Äã‚Ä≤‚Äã‚ÄãsCollateral‚àó(1‚àí0.05) Numerical Example (Rangebound) Distribution Waterfall (USDT) Native Token ($RCH) Buyback Aligning protocol success with Token performance At SOFA, we believe that the most straight-forward way to align user and hodler incentives are through token buybacks, with $RCH being our native utility token. We will commit all protocol income to be exclusively used for $RCH buybacks, creating a virtuous loop of token price gains being driven off protocol usage. With a fixed deflationary supply, methodical release schedule, and usage-driven airdops, the long-term value accretion for $RCH is largely a function of protocol revenue, which in itself is a direct measure of adoption success. Furthermore, with Token airdrops exclusively limited to protocol users and supporters, we can ensure that they stand best to benefit from SOFA's long-term success, staying true to DeFi's commerical ideals of 'giving back' to true core users and early adopters. The token buyback logic is an integral part of the SOFA protocol smart contract. Protocol administrators will regularly trigger this process to purchase and burn $RCH with protocol revenue through supported DEX venues. Destroyed $RCH will be no longer enter circulation, and the total amount of $RCH will gradually decrease over time on rising protocol usage. More details of our Tokenomics model will be covered in its own dedicated section below.

body: –ü—Ä–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ —Å–±–æ—Ä—ã –í SOFA –º—ã —Å—Ç—Ä–µ–º–∏–º—Å—è —Å–æ–∑–¥–∞—Ç—å —Å–ø—Ä–∞–≤–µ–¥–ª–∏–≤—É—é –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–∑—Ä–∞—á–Ω—É—é —Ñ–∏–Ω–∞–Ω—Å–æ–≤—É—é —ç–∫–æ—Å–∏—Å—Ç–µ–º—É, –≥–¥–µ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–∏ –º–æ–≥—É—Ç –¥–µ–º–æ–∫—Ä–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏ –ø—Ä–∏–æ–±—Ä–µ—Ç–∞—Ç—å —à–∏—Ä–æ–∫–∏–π —Å–ø–µ–∫—Ç—Ä —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤ —Å –ø—Ä–æ–∑—Ä–∞—á–Ω—ã–º –∏ —Å–ø—Ä–∞–≤–µ–¥–ª–∏–≤—ã–º —Ü–µ–Ω–æ–æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ–º –æ—Ç –º–∞—Ä–∫–µ—Ç-–º–µ–π–∫–µ—Ä–æ–≤. –ë–æ–ª–µ–µ —Ç–æ–≥–æ, –∫–∞–∫ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å—é –¥–µ—Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–∞–ª–∏–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç, –º—ã —Ö–æ—Ç–∏–º –≥–∞—Ä–∞–Ω—Ç–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞—Ç—å, —á—Ç–æ –ª—é–±—ã–µ –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –¥–æ—Ö–æ–¥—ã –≤ –ø–µ—Ä–≤—É—é –æ—á–µ—Ä–µ–¥—å –¥–µ–ª—è—Ç—Å—è —Å –Ω–∞—à–∏–º–∏ –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–Ω—ã–º–∏ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è–º–∏, –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–∏–≤–∞—è –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–µ —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å—Ç–∏–º—É–ª–æ–≤, –∞ –Ω–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≤–∏–ª–µ–≥–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –≤—ã–ø–ª–∞—Ç—ã —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–º –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å–∞–º. –í —Å–≤—è–∑–∏ —Å —ç—Ç–∏–º –º—ã —Ä–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∞–ª–∏ —Ä—è–¥ —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä —Å–±–æ—Ä–æ–≤ —Å 'fair-launch' —Ç–æ–∫–µ–Ω–æ–º–∏–∫–æ–π, —á—Ç–æ–±—ã –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–∏—Ç—å –ø—Ä–∞–≤–∏–ª—å–Ω–æ–µ –Ω–∞–∫–æ–ø–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ü–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ –ø–æ–¥–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∏–≤–∞—Ç—å –¥–æ–ª–≥–æ—Å—Ä–æ—á–Ω—É—é –∂–∏–∑–Ω–µ—Å–ø–æ—Å–æ–±–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –ø–ª–∞—Ç—Ñ–æ—Ä–º—ã. –í SOFA –Ω–µ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –Ω–∏ —Ä–∞–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –≤–µ–Ω—á—É—Ä–Ω—ã—Ö –∫–∞–ø–∏—Ç–∞–ª–∏—Å—Ç–æ–≤, –Ω–∏ —Å–±—Ä–æ—Å–æ–≤ –ª–∏–∫–≤–∏–¥–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –ø—Ä–∏ –≤—ã—Ö–æ–¥–µ. –ü—Ä–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ —Å–±–æ—Ä—ã üí∞ SOFA –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –≤–∑–∏–º–∞—Ç—å 15% –æ—Ç –ø—Ä–µ–º–∏–∏ –æ–ø—Ü–∏–æ–Ω–∞ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è –≤ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ –±–∞–∑–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ —Ç–æ—Ä–≥–æ–≤–æ–≥–æ —Å–±–æ—Ä–∞. –ë–æ–ª–µ–µ —Ç–æ–≥–æ, –≤ —Å–ª—É—á–∞–µ, –µ—Å–ª–∏ –¥–ª—è –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è –ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–æ–π–¥–µ—Ç '–≤—ã–∏–≥—Ä—ã—à–Ω–∞—è' –≤—ã–ø–ª–∞—Ç–∞, –±—É–¥–µ—Ç –≤–∑–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –¥–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–π —Å–±–æ—Ä –∑–∞ —Ä–∞—Å—á–µ—Ç –≤ —Ä–∞–∑–º–µ—Ä–µ 5% –æ—Ç –∫–∞–∫ —Ä–∞—Å—Å—á–∏—Ç—ã–≤–∞—é—Ç—Å—è —Å–±–æ—Ä—ã –∏ –≤—ã–ø–ª–∞—Ç—ã –≤ –Ω–∞—à–∏—Ö –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–ª–∞—Ö. –û–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–∏—è: –≤—ã–ø—É—Å–∫–∞ –∏ –∞–∏—Ä–¥—Ä–æ–ø–∞–º–∏, –æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏ –Ω–∞ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–∏, –¥–æ–ª–≥–æ—Å—Ä–æ—á–Ω–æ–µ –Ω–∞–∫–æ–ø–ª–µ–Ω–∏–µ —Ü–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –¥–ª—è $RCH –≤ –∑–Ω–∞—á–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–π —Å—Ç–µ–ø–µ–Ω–∏ –∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏—Ç –æ—Ç –¥–æ—Ö–æ–¥–æ–≤ –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–ª–∞, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ —Å–∞–º–∏ –ø–æ —Å–µ–±–µ —è–≤–ª—è—é—Ç—Å—è –ø—Ä—è–º–æ–π –º–µ—Ä–æ–π —É—Å–ø–µ—Ö–∞ –ø—Ä–∏–Ω—è—Ç–∏—è. –ë–æ–ª–µ–µ —Ç–æ–≥–æ, —Å –∞–∏—Ä–¥—Ä–æ–ø–∞–º–∏ —Ç–æ–∫–µ–Ω–æ–≤, –æ–≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—á–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–º–∏ –∏—Å–∫–ª—é—á–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª—è–º–∏ –∏ —Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω–∏–∫–∞–º–∏ –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–ª–∞, –º—ã –º–æ–∂–µ–º —É–≤–µ–ª–∏—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ–º –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è –ø—Ä–æ—Ç–æ–∫–æ–ª–∞. –ë–æ–ª–µ–µ –ø–æ–¥—Ä–æ–±–Ω–∞—è –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è –æ –Ω–∞—à–µ–π –º–æ–¥–µ–ª–∏ —Ç–æ–∫–µ–Ω–æ–º–∏–∫–∏ –±—É–¥–µ—Ç title: ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú ÏàòÏàòÎ£å
body: ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú ÏàòÏàòÎ£å SOFAÏóêÏÑúÎäî ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÍ∞Ä ÏãúÏû• Ï°∞ÏÑ±ÏûêÎ°úÎ∂ÄÌÑ∞ Ìà¨Î™ÖÌïòÍ≥† Í≥µÏ†ïÌïú Í∞ÄÍ≤©ÏúºÎ°ú Îã§ÏñëÌïú Íµ¨Ï°∞ÌôîÎêú Ï†úÌíàÏùÑ ÎØºÏ£ºÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Íµ¨Îß§Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÎäî Í≥µÏ†ïÌïòÍ≥† Ìà¨Î™ÖÌïú Í∏àÏúµ ÏÉùÌÉúÍ≥ÑÎ•º ÎßåÎìúÎäî Îç∞ Ï†ÑÎÖêÌïòÍ≥† ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÎòêÌïú, ÏôÑÏ†ÑÌïú Î∂ÑÏÇ∞Ìòï ÌîÑÎ°úÏ†ùÌä∏Î°úÏÑú, Ïö∞Î¶¨Îäî Î™®Îì† ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú Ïù¥ÏùµÏù¥ Ï£ºÎ°ú Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò Í∏∞Î≥∏ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÏôÄ Í≥µÏú†ÎêòÎèÑÎ°ù ÌïòÏó¨ ÌäπÎ≥ÑÌïú Ïù¥Ìï¥Í¥ÄÍ≥Ñ Í∑∏Î£πÏóê ÎåÄÌïú ÌäπÍ∂å ÏßÄÍ∏âÏù¥ ÏïÑÎãå ÏôÑÏ†ÑÌïú Ïù∏ÏÑºÌã∞Î∏å Ï†ïÎ†¨ÏùÑ Î≥¥Ïû•ÌïòÍ≥†Ïûê Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. Îî∞ÎùºÏÑú Ïö∞Î¶¨Îäî Ï†ÅÏ†àÌïú Í∞ÄÏπò Ï∂ïÏ†ÅÏùÑ Î≥¥Ïû•ÌïòÍ≥† Ïû•Í∏∞Ï†ÅÏù∏ ÌîåÎû´Ìèº ÏßÄÏÜç Í∞ÄÎä•ÏÑ±ÏùÑ ÏßÄÏõêÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ 'Í≥µÏ†ï Ï∂úÏãú' ÌÜ†ÌÅ¨ÎÖ∏ÎØπÏä§Î•º Í∞ñÏ∂ò ÏùºÎ†®Ïùò ÏàòÏàòÎ£å Íµ¨Ï°∞Î•º Í≥†ÏïàÌñàÏäµÎãàÎã§. SOFA ÎÇ¥ÏóêÏÑúÎäî VCÏùò Í∏∞ÏÅ®ÏùÑ ÏúÑÌïú Ï¶êÍ∏∞Í∏∞ÎÇò Ï∂úÍµ¨ Ïú†ÎèôÏÑ± Îç§ÌîÑÍ∞Ä ÏóÜÏäµÎãàÎã§. ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú ÏàòÏàòÎ£å üí∞ SOFAÎäî ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÏùò ÏòµÏÖò ÌîÑÎ¶¨ÎØ∏ÏóÑÏùò 15%Î•º Í∏∞Î≥∏ Í±∞Îûò ÏàòÏàòÎ£åÎ°ú ÏàòÏßëÌï©ÎãàÎã§. ÎòêÌïú, ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÍ∞Ä 'ÏäπÎ¶¨' ÏßÄÍ∏âÏùÑ Î∞õÏùÑ Í≤ΩÏö∞, Ï¥ù Ï¥ù ÏÉÅÏäπ ÏßÄÍ∏âÏóê ÎåÄÌï¥ Ï∂îÍ∞Ä 5%Ïùò Ï†ïÏÇ∞ ÏàòÏàòÎ£åÍ∞Ä Î∂ÄÍ≥ºÎê©ÎãàÎã§. ÏàòÏàòÎ£å Í≥ÑÏÇ∞ ÏôÑÏ†ÑÌïú Ìà¨Î™ÖÏÑ±ÏùÑ ÏúÑÌï¥, Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏóêÏÑú ÏàòÏàòÎ£åÏôÄ ÏßÄÍ∏âÏù¥ Ïñ¥ÎñªÍ≤å Í≥ÑÏÇ∞ÎêòÎäîÏßÄÏóê ÎåÄÌïú Îã§Ïùå ÏòàÏ†úÎ•º Ï∞∏Ï°∞ÌïòÏã≠ÏãúÏò§. Ï†ïÏùò: Premium=NotionalDeposit‚àó(1+AAVE1MonthAverage‚àíBaseYield)FullDays/365‚àíNotionalDepositPremium = Notional_{Deposit} * (1 + AAVE_{1MonthAverage} - BaseYield)^{Full Days/365} - Notional_{Deposit}Premium=Notional‚ÄãDeposit‚Äã‚Äã‚àó(1+AAVE‚Äã1MonthAverage‚Äã‚Äã‚àíBaseYield)‚ÄãFullDays/365‚Äã‚Äã‚àíNotional‚ÄãDeposit‚Äã‚Äã MMÏùò Îã¥Î≥¥ = ÏãúÏû• Ï°∞ÏÑ±ÏûêÎ°úÎ∂ÄÌÑ∞Ïùò Í∏àÍ≥† Ïû†Í∏à Îã¥Î≥¥ Í¥ÄÏ∞∞ Ï∞Ω: Îã§Ïùå 16:00 (UTC+8)Î∂ÄÌÑ∞ ÎßåÎ£åÏùº 16:00 (UTC+8)ÍπåÏßÄ ÎßåÎ£å Ïãú ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïûê ÏßÄÍ∏â: ÎÖ∏ÌÅ¨ÏïÑÏõÉÎêú Í≤ΩÏö∞ PayoffinUSDT=NotionalDeposit+AAVEInterestActual‚àíPremium‚àó(1+0.15)Payoff_{inUSDT} = Notional_{Deposit} + AAVEInterest_{Actual} - Premium * (1 + 0.15)Payoff‚ÄãinUSDT‚Äã‚Äã=Notional‚ÄãDeposit‚Äã‚Äã+AAVEInterest‚ÄãActual‚Äã‚Äã‚àíPremium‚àó(1+0.15) ÎÖ∏ÌÅ¨ÏïÑÏõÉÎêòÏßÄ ÏïäÏùÄ Í≤ΩÏö∞ PayoffinUSDT=NotionalDeposit+AAVEInterestActual+Premium‚àó(1‚àí0.15‚àí0.05)+MM‚Ä≤sCollateral‚àó(1‚àí0.05)Payoff_{inUSDT} = Notional_{Deposit} + AAVEInterest_{Actual} + Premium * (1 - 0.15 - 0.05) + MM'sCollateral * (1 - 0.05)Payoff‚ÄãinUSDT‚Äã‚Äã=Notional‚ÄãDeposit‚Äã‚Äã+AAVEInterest‚ÄãActual‚Äã‚Äã+Premium‚àó(1‚àí0.15‚àí0.05)+MM‚Äã‚Ä≤‚Äã‚ÄãsCollateral‚àó(1‚àí0.05) ÏàòÏπò ÏòàÏ†ú (Î≤îÏúÑ Ï†úÌïú) Î∂ÑÎ∞∞ ÏõåÌÑ∞Ìè¥ (USDT) ÎÑ§Ïù¥Ìã∞Î∏å ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ ($RCH) Îß§ÏûÖ ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩúÏùò ÏÑ±Í≥µÍ≥º ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ ÏÑ±Í≥ºÏùò Ï†ïÎ†¨ SOFAÏóêÏÑúÎäî ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÏôÄ ÌôÄÎçîÏùò Ïù∏ÏÑºÌã∞Î∏åÎ•º Ï†ïÎ†¨ÌïòÎäî Í∞ÄÏû• Í∞ÑÎã®Ìïú Î∞©Î≤ïÏùÄ ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ Îß§ÏûÖÏùÑ ÌÜµÌï¥ Ïù¥Î£®Ïñ¥ÏßÑÎã§Í≥† ÎØøÏäµÎãàÎã§. $RCHÎäî Ïö∞Î¶¨Ïùò ÎÑ§Ïù¥Ìã∞Î∏å Ïú†Ìã∏Î¶¨Ìã∞ ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Ïö∞Î¶¨Îäî Î™®Îì† ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ $RCH Îß§ÏûÖÏóê ÎèÖÏ†êÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÍ∏∞Î°ú ÏïΩÏÜçÌï† Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥Îäî ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ïóê ÏùòÌï¥ Ï£ºÎèÑÎêòÎäî ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ Í∞ÄÍ≤© ÏÉÅÏäπÏùò ÏÑ†ÏàúÌôòÏùÑ ÎßåÎì§Ïñ¥ÎÉÖÎãàÎã§. Í≥†Ï†ïÎêú ÎîîÌîåÎ†àÏù¥ÏÖò Í≥µÍ∏â, Ï≤¥Í≥ÑÏ†ÅÏù∏ Ï∂úÏãú ÏùºÏ†ï, Í∑∏Î¶¨Í≥† ÏÇ¨Ïö© Í∏∞Î∞ò ÏóêÏñ¥ÎìúÎûçÏùÑ ÌÜµÌï¥ $RCHÏùò Ïû•Í∏∞ Í∞ÄÏπò Ï¶ùÍ∞ÄÎäî Ï£ºÎ°ú ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú ÏàòÏùµÏùò Ìï®ÏàòÏûÖÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥Îäî Ï±ÑÌÉù ÏÑ±Í≥µÏùò ÏßÅÏ†ëÏ†ÅÏù∏ Ï≤ôÎèÑÏûÖÎãàÎã§. ÎòêÌïú, ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ ÏóêÏñ¥ÎìúÎûçÏùÄ ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÏôÄ ÏßÄÏßÄÏûêÎ°ú ÌïúÏ†ïÎêòÏñ¥ Ïù¥Î£®Ïñ¥ÏßÄÎØÄÎ°ú, Ïö∞Î¶¨Îäî Í∑∏Îì§Ïù¥ SOFAÏùò Ïû•Í∏∞Ï†ÅÏù∏ ÏÑ±Í≥µÏúºÎ°úÎ∂ÄÌÑ∞ Í∞ÄÏû• ÌÅ∞ ÌòúÌÉùÏùÑ Î∞õÏùÑ Ïàò ÏûàÎèÑÎ°ù Î≥¥Ïû•Ìï† Ïàò ÏûàÏäµÎãàÎã§. Ïù¥Îäî ÏßÑÏ†ïÌïú ÌïµÏã¨ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÏûêÏôÄ Ï¥àÍ∏∞ Ï±ÑÌÉùÏûêÏóêÍ≤å 'ÌôòÏõê'ÌïòÎäî DeFiÏùò ÏÉÅÏóÖÏ†Å Ïù¥ÏÉÅÏóê Ï∂©Ïã§Ìï©ÎãàÎã§. ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ Îß§ÏûÖ ÎÖºÎ¶¨Îäî SOFA ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú Ïä§ÎßàÌä∏ Í≥ÑÏïΩÏùò ÌïÑÏàòÏ†ÅÏù∏ Î∂ÄÎ∂ÑÏûÖÎãàÎã§. ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú Í¥ÄÎ¶¨ÏûêÎäî Ï†ïÍ∏∞Ï†ÅÏúºÎ°ú Ïù¥ Í≥ºÏ†ïÏùÑ Ìä∏Î¶¨Í±∞ÌïòÏó¨ ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú ÏàòÏùµÏùÑ ÌÜµÌï¥ ÏßÄÏõêÎêòÎäî DEX ÌîåÎû´ÌèºÏóêÏÑú $RCHÎ•º Íµ¨Îß§ÌïòÍ≥† ÏÜåÍ∞ÅÌï† Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. ÏÜåÍ∞ÅÎêú $RCHÎäî Îçî Ïù¥ÏÉÅ Ïú†ÌÜµÎêòÏßÄ ÏïäÏúºÎ©∞, $RCHÏùò Ï¥ùÎüâÏùÄ ÌîÑÎ°úÌÜ†ÏΩú ÏÇ¨Ïö© Ï¶ùÍ∞ÄÏóê Îî∞Îùº Ï†êÏ∞® Í∞êÏÜåÌï† Í≤ÉÏûÖÎãàÎã§. title: Frais de protocole
body: Frais de Protocole Chez SOFA, nous nous engageons √† cr√©er un √©cosyst√®me financier juste et transparent o√π les utilisateurs peuvent acheter d√©mocratiquement une large gamme de produits structur√©s avec des prix transparents et √©quitables de la part des teneurs de march√©. De plus, en tant que projet enti√®rement d√©centralis√©, nous voulons nous assurer que les gains du protocole sont principalement partag√©s avec nos utilisateurs sous-jacents, garantissant ainsi un alignement complet des incitations plut√¥t que des paiements privil√©gi√©s √† des groupes d'int√©r√™ts sp√©ciaux. En tant que tel, nous avons con√ßu une s√©rie de structures de frais avec une tokenomique de 'lancement √©quitable' pour garantir une bonne accumulation de valeur et soutenir la long√©vit√© √† long terme de la plateforme. Il n'y aura pas de joy-riding de VC ou de dumps de liquidit√© de sortie au sein de SOFA. Frais de Protocole üí∞ SOFA percevra 15 % de la prime d'option de l'utilisateur en tant que frais de trading de base. De plus, en cas de paiement 'gagnant' pour l'utilisateur, des frais de r√®glement suppl√©mentaires de 5 % seront factur√©s sur le total du paiement brut. Calculs des Frais Pour une transparence totale, veuillez consulter l'exemple suivant de la mani√®re dont les frais et les paiements sont calcul√©s dans nos protocoles. D√©finitions : Premium=NotionalDeposit‚àó(1+AAVE1MonthAverage‚àíBaseYield)FullDays/365‚àíNotionalDepositPremium = Notional_{Deposit} * (1 + AAVE_{1MonthAverage} - BaseYield)^{Full Days/365} - Notional_{Deposit}Premium=Notional‚ÄãDeposit‚Äã‚Äã‚àó(1+AAVE‚Äã1MonthAverage‚Äã‚Äã‚àíBaseYield)‚ÄãFullDays/365‚Äã‚Äã‚àíNotional‚ÄãDeposit‚Äã‚Äã Collat√©ral de MM = Collat√©ral verrouill√© dans le coffre du teneur de march√© Fen√™tre d'Observation : De 16:00 (UTC+8) suivant jusqu'au jour d'expiration 16:00 (UTC+8) Paiements des Utilisateurs √† l'Expiration : Si Knocked-Out PayoffinUSDT=NotionalDeposit+AAVEInterestActual‚àíPremium‚àó(1+0.15)Payoff_{inUSDT} = Notional_{Deposit} + AAVEInterest_{Actual} - Premium * (1 + 0.15)Payoff‚ÄãinUSDT‚Äã‚Äã=Notional‚ÄãDeposit‚Äã‚Äã+AAVEInterest‚ÄãActual‚Äã‚Äã‚àíPremium‚àó(1+0.15) Pas Knocked-Out PayoffinUSDT=NotionalDeposit+AAVEInterestActual+Premium‚àó(1‚àí0.15‚àí0.05)+MM‚Ä≤sCollateral‚àó(1‚àí0.05)Payoff_{inUSDT} = Notional_{Deposit} + AAVEInterest_{Actual} + Premium * (1 - 0.15 - 0.05) + MM'sCollateral * (1 - 0.05)Payoff‚ÄãinUSDT‚Äã‚Äã=Notional‚ÄãDeposit‚Äã‚Äã+AAVEInterest‚ÄãActual‚Äã‚Äã+Premium‚àó(1‚àí0.15‚àí0.05)+MM‚Äã‚Ä≤‚Äã‚ÄãsCollateral‚àó(1‚àí0.05) Exemple Num√©rique (Limit√©) Cascade de Distribution (USDT) Rachat de Token Natifs ($RCH) Aligner le succ√®s du protocole avec la performance du Token Chez SOFA, nous croyons que la mani√®re la plus simple d'aligner les incitations des utilisateurs et des d√©tenteurs est √† travers les rachats de tokens, avec $RCH √©tant notre token utilitaire natif. Nous nous engageons √† ce que tous les revenus du protocole soient exclusivement utilis√©s pour les rachats de $RCH, cr√©ant ainsi une boucle vertueuse o√π les gains de prix des tokens sont aliment√©s par l'utilisation du protocole. Avec une offre d√©flationniste fixe, un calendrier de lib√©ration m√©thodique et des airdrops bas√©s sur l'utilisation, l'accumulation de valeur √† long terme pour $RCH est largement fonction des revenus du protocole, qui est en soi une mesure directe du succ√®s de l'adoption. De plus, avec des airdrops de tokens exclusivement limit√©s aux utilisateurs et aux supporters du protocole, nous pouvons nous assurer qu'ils sont les mieux plac√©s pour b√©n√©ficier du succ√®s √† long terme de SOFA, restant fid√®les aux id√©aux commerciaux de DeFi de 'redonner' aux v√©ritables utilisateurs de base et aux premiers adoptants. La logique de rachat de tokens est une partie int√©grante du contrat intelligent du protocole SOFA. Les administrateurs du protocole d√©clencheront r√©guli√®rement ce processus pour acheter et br√ªler des $RCH avec les revenus du protocole via des plateformes DEX soutenues. Les $RCH d√©truits ne seront plus en circulation, et le montant total de $RCH diminuera progressivement au fil du temps avec l'augmentation de l'utilisation du protocole. Plus de d√©tails sur notre mod√®le de Tokenomics seront abord√©s dans sa propre section d√©di√©e ci-dessous.

title: Feoda Protocoli
body: Feoda Protocolorum Apud SOFA, nos ad creandum aequum et apertum oeconomicum systema dedicati sumus, ubi usores democratically in ampla varietate productorum structorum cum pretio aperto et aequo a fabricatoribus mercatus emere possunt. Praeterea, ut plene decentralizatum consilium, volumus curare ut quaelibet lucrum protocolorum praecipue cum nostris usoribus subiectis communicetur, plenum incentivum concordiam assecurans potius quam privilegium solvendum coetibus specialibus. Quare, seriem structurarum feodum excogitavimus cum 'aequae-launch' tokenomica ad curandum rectam valoris accumulationem et sustentationem diuturnitatis platformae. Non erit gaudium VC aut exitus liquiditatis in SOFA. Feoda Protocolorum üí∞ SOFA 15% premium optionis usoris ut feodum mercaturae fundamentale colliget. Praeterea, in eventu 'victricis' solutionis pro usu, ulterius 5% feodum solutionis contra totum Gross Upside Payout exigetur. Calculi Feodorum Ad plenam transparentiam, quaeso vide sequentem exemplum quomodo feoda et solutiones in nostris protocolis calculentur. Definitiones: Premium=NotionalDeposit‚àó(1+AAVE1MonthAverage‚àíBaseYield)FullDays/365‚àíNotionalDepositPremium = Notional_{Deposit} * (1 + AAVE_{1MonthAverage} - BaseYield)^{Full Days/365} - Notional_{Deposit}Premium=Notional‚ÄãDeposit‚Äã‚Äã‚àó(1+AAVE‚Äã1MonthAverage‚Äã‚Äã‚àíBaseYield)‚ÄãFullDays/365‚Äã‚Äã‚àíNotional‚ÄãDeposit‚Äã‚Äã MM's Collateral = Collateralis Vault-Locked a Fabricatore Mercatus Observatio Fenestrarum: Ab proximo 16:00 (UTC+8) ad Expiry Die 16:00 (UTC+8) Usoris Solutiones ad Expiry: Si Knocked-Out PayoffinUSDT=NotionalDeposit+AAVEInterestActual‚àíPremium‚àó(1+0.15)Payoff_{inUSDT} = Notional_{Deposit} + AAVEInterest_{Actual} - Premium * (1 + 0.15)Payoff‚ÄãinUSDT‚Äã‚Äã=Notional‚ÄãDeposit‚Äã‚Äã+AAVEInterest‚ÄãActual‚Äã‚Äã‚àíPremium‚àó(1+0.15) Non Knocked-Out PayoffinUSDT=NotionalDeposit+AAVEInterestActual+Premium‚àó(1‚àí0.15‚àí0.05)+MM‚Ä≤sCollateral‚àó(1‚àí0.05)Payoff_{inUSDT} = Notional_{Deposit} + AAVEInterest_{Actual} + Premium * (1 - 0.15 - 0.05) + MM'sCollateral * (1 - 0.05)Payoff‚ÄãinUSDT‚Äã‚Äã=Notional‚ÄãDeposit‚Äã‚Äã+AAVEInterest‚ÄãActual‚Äã‚Äã+Premium‚àó(1‚àí0.15‚àí0.05)+MM‚Äã‚Ä≤‚Äã‚ÄãsCollateral‚àó(1‚àí0.05) Exemplum Numerale (Rangebound) Distribuenda Cascada (USDT) Native Token ($RCH) Buyback Coniungens successum protocoli cum perficiendi Token Apud SOFA, credimus quod via simplicissima ad coniungendas incitamenta usorum et tenentium per token buybacks est, cum $RCH sit noster nativus utilitatis token. Nos omnem reditum protocoli ad $RCH buybacks excludendum compromittimus, creando virtuosum circulum augmentorum pretii token, quae ex usu protocoli ducuntur. Cum fixa deflationaria copia, methodica programmatis emissionis, et usus-ducta airdrops, longum tempus valor accretionis pro $RCH plerumque est functio reditus protocoli, qui ipse est directum mensurae successus adoptionis. Praeterea, cum Token airdrops excludente tantum ad usores et fautores protocoli, possumus curare ut optimam utilitatem ex longo successu SOFA capiant, manentes fideles idealibus commercialibus DeFi 'reddendi' veris usoribus et primis adoptoribus. Logica token buyback est pars integralis contractus intelligentis protocoli SOFA. Administratores protocoli hanc processum regulariter incipient ad emendum et comburendum $RCH cum reditu protocoli per DEX loca supporta. $RCH destructum non amplius in circulationem intrabit, et totalis quantitas $RCH paulatim decrescet tempore cum usu protocoli crescente. Plura de nostro Tokenomics modelo in sua propria sectione dedicata infra tractabuntur.

body: ÂçîË≠∞Ë≤ªÁî® Âú® SOFAÔºåÊàëÂÄëËá¥ÂäõÊñºÂâµÂª∫‰∏ÄÂÄãÂÖ¨Âπ≥ÈÄèÊòéÁöÑÈáëËûçÁîüÊÖãÁ≥ªÁµ±ÔºåËÆìÁî®Êà∂ÂèØ‰ª•‰ª•Ê∞ë‰∏ªÁöÑÊñπÂºèÂæûÂÅöÂ∏ÇÂïÜÈÇ£Ë£°Ë≥ºË≤∑ÂêÑÁ®ÆÁµêÊßãÂåñÁî¢ÂìÅÔºå‰∏¶‰∫´ÊúâÈÄèÊòéÂíåÂÖ¨Âπ≥ÁöÑÂÆöÂÉπ„ÄÇÊ≠§Â§ñÔºå‰ΩúÁÇ∫‰∏ÄÂÄãÂÆåÂÖ®Âéª‰∏≠ÂøÉÂåñÁöÑÈ†ÖÁõÆÔºåÊàëÂÄëÂ∏åÊúõÁ¢∫‰øù‰ªª‰ΩïÂçîË≠∞Êî∂Áõä‰∏ªË¶ÅËàáÊàëÂÄëÁöÑÂü∫Á§éÁî®Êà∂ÂÖ±‰∫´ÔºåÁ¢∫‰øùÂÆåÂÖ®ÁöÑÊøÄÂãµ‰∏ÄËá¥ÊÄßÔºåËÄå‰∏çÊòØÁµ¶‰∫àÁâπÊÆäÂà©ÁõäÈõÜÂúòÁâπÊ¨äÊîØ‰ªò„ÄÇÂõ†Ê≠§ÔºåÊàëÂÄëË®≠Ë®à‰∫Ü‰∏ÄÁ≥ªÂàóË≤ªÁî®ÁµêÊßãÔºå‰ª•‚ÄúÂÖ¨Âπ≥ÂïüÂãï‚ÄùÁöÑ‰ª£Âπ£Á∂ìÊøüÂ≠∏Á¢∫‰øùÈÅ©Áï∂ÁöÑÂÉπÂÄºÁ¥ØÁ©ç‰∏¶ÊîØÊåÅÂπ≥Âè∞ÁöÑÈï∑ÊúüÊåÅ‰πÖÊÄß„ÄÇÂú® SOFA ÂÖßÈÉ®Ôºå‰∏çÊúÉÊúâÈ¢®Èö™ÊäïË≥áÁöÑÂø´Ê®ÇÈ®éË°åÊàñÈÄÄÂá∫ÊµÅÂãïÊÄßÊããÂîÆ„ÄÇ ÂçîË≠∞Ë≤ªÁî® üí∞ SOFA Â∞áÊî∂ÂèñÁî®Êà∂ÊúüÊ¨äÊ∫¢ÂÉπÁöÑ 15% ‰ΩúÁÇ∫Âü∫Êú¨‰∫§ÊòìË≤ª„ÄÇÊ≠§Â§ñÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÁî®Êà∂Áç≤Âæó‚ÄúË¥èÂæó‚ÄùÊîØ‰ªòÔºåÂ∞áÂ∞çÁ∏ΩÊØõÂà©ÊîØ‰ªòÊî∂ÂèñÈ°çÂ§ñ 5% ÁöÑÁµêÁÆóË≤ª„ÄÇ Ë≤ªÁî®Ë®àÁÆó ÁÇ∫‰∫ÜÂÆåÂÖ®ÈÄèÊòéÔºåË´ãÂèÉÈñ±‰ª•‰∏ãÊàëÂÄëÂçîË≠∞‰∏≠Â¶Ç‰ΩïË®àÁÆóË≤ªÁî®ÂíåÊîØ‰ªòÁöÑÁ§∫‰æã„ÄÇ ÂÆöÁæ©Ôºö Premium=NotionalDeposit‚àó(1+AAVE1MonthAverage‚àíBaseYield)FullDays/365‚àíNotionalDepositPremium = Notional_{Deposit} * (1 + AAVE_{1MonthAverage} - title: ÿ±ÿ≥ŸàŸÖ ÿßŸÑÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑ
body: ÿ±ÿ≥ŸàŸÖ ÿßŸÑÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑ ŸÅŸä SOFAÿå ŸÜÿ≠ŸÜ ŸÖŸÑÿ™ÿ≤ŸÖŸàŸÜ ÿ®ÿ•ŸÜÿ¥ÿßÿ° ŸÜÿ∏ÿßŸÖ ŸÖÿßŸÑŸä ÿπÿßÿØŸÑ Ÿàÿ¥ŸÅÿßŸÅ ÿ≠Ÿäÿ´ ŸäŸÖŸÉŸÜ ŸÑŸÑŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖŸäŸÜ ÿ¥ÿ±ÿßÿ° ŸÖÿ¨ŸÖŸàÿπÿ© Ÿàÿßÿ≥ÿπÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ™ÿ¨ÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÜÿ∏ŸÖÿ© ÿ®ÿ£ÿ≥ÿπÿßÿ± ÿ¥ŸÅÿßŸÅÿ© ŸàÿπÿßÿØŸÑÿ© ŸÖŸÜ ÿµÿßŸÜÿπŸä ÿßŸÑÿ≥ŸàŸÇ. ÿπŸÑÿßŸàÿ© ÿπŸÑŸâ ÿ∞ŸÑŸÉÿå ŸÉŸÖÿ¥ÿ±Ÿàÿπ ŸÑÿßŸÖÿ±ŸÉÿ≤Ÿä ÿ®ÿßŸÑŸÉÿßŸÖŸÑÿå ŸÜÿ±ŸäÿØ ÿ£ŸÜ ŸÜÿ∂ŸÖŸÜ ÿ£ŸÜ ÿ£Ÿä ŸÖŸÉÿßÿ≥ÿ® ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ®ÿ±Ÿàÿ™ŸàŸÉŸàŸÑ ÿ™Ÿèÿ¥ÿßÿ±ŸÉ ÿ®ÿ¥ŸÉŸÑ ÿ£ÿ≥ÿßÿ≥Ÿä ŸÖÿπ ŸÖÿ≥ÿ™ÿÆÿØŸÖŸäŸÜÿß ÿßŸÑÿ£ÿ≥ÿßÿ≥ŸäŸäŸÜÿå ŸÖŸÖÿß Ÿäÿ∂ŸÖŸÜ ÿ™ŸàÿßŸÅŸÇ ÿßŸÑÿ≠ŸàÿßŸÅÿ≤ ÿ®ÿßŸÑŸÉÿßŸÖŸÑ ÿ®ÿØŸÑÿßŸã ŸÖŸÜ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿØŸÅŸàÿπÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖŸÖŸäÿ≤ÿ© ŸÑŸÖÿ¨ŸÖŸàÿπÿßÿ™ ÿßŸÑŸÖÿµÿßŸÑÿ≠ ÿßŸÑÿÆÿßÿµÿ©. title: Automator
body: Automator Introduction In our mission to democratise option trading for the masses, the SOFA team has created Automator as an intuitive way for users to earn strategy yields passively. By leveraging a community of strategy managers, collectively known as Optivisors, users are able to participate in their favourite managed strategies in return for sharing a small upside profit fee. This win-win model will provide decentralized and on-chain access for depositors to earn a variety of high quality returns with an evolving base of community recognized Optivisors. Key Automator Features Community Driven Design. The launch of Automator reflects our dedication to community engagement, providing decentralized tools to democratize DeFi options trading journey, while expanding user access to secure yield solutions that will evolve with time. Intuitive Interface. Complex option strategies have been distilled into an intuitive and simple to use interface, while offering full on-chain transparency and strategy disclosure consistent with the DeFi ethos. Market Agnostic. Benefit from volatility movements in either direction, with SOFA products giving Optivisors full strategy flexibility regardless of market outlook. Substantial Gas Savings. Optivisors will be able to 'roll' their on-going strategies on Automator will zero additional gas costs, promoting long-term profitability and sustainability. Optivisors: Our Community Strategy Champions One of Automator‚Äôs standout features lies in its community-driven approach. By engaging the collective wisdom of our DeFi community, strategy creators, aka Optivisors, are able to design, execute, and monitor ongoing SOFA strategies for the benefit of passive depositers. In return for their expertise, Optivisors will receive a share of the total strategy upside to create a win-win outcome that aligns economic incentives and promotes long-running engagement. As SOFA continues to expand its product offerings and chain connectivity, Optivisors will play an increasingly important role in our ecosystem as their strategies scale in complexity and reach. Protocol expansion into additional instruments and CeFi connectivity offer feasible milestones that we can look forward to, and we encourage ongoing community feedback to power us towards the next steps. Automator WorkFlow Automator FAQ A. How does Automator work? Automator involves three key participants: Users, Optivisors, and Market Makers. Users Users can select their preferred Automator and deposit tokens. Under the Optivisor‚Äôs expertise, the Automator generates returns, which are distributed among participating users. Additionally, users benefit from incentive $RCH token airdrops as part of their participation. Optivisors Optivisors are responsible for creating Automators and executing trading strategies‚Äîsuch as bullish and bearish positions‚Äîby interacting with SOFA Vaults. As a reward for their expertise, Optivisors earn a share of the profits. Market Makers Similar to other SOFA products, Market Makers provide pricing for SOFA Vaults. Optivisors managers leverage these quotes to allocate Automator funds and participate in SOFA Vault strategies. Once these strategies are settled, profits are distributed accordingly. B. What fees will I be charged? The protocol charges a 15% service fee on the profits generated by Automators. If no profit is generated, no service fees are charged. Optivisors can also set a management fee when creating an Automator. This fee applies only to profits but is recorded as a liability during periods of losses. The Optivisor can only collect management fees again once the Automator‚Äôs cumulative profits turn positive. C. How to become an Optivisor and create an Automator? Anyone can create an Automator as an Optivisor. However, each address is limited to creating one Automator per chain and deposit token type. To unlock the strategy quota, the Optivisor must burn 500 $RCH tokens. D. How about the gas fees within the Automator? The Optivisor is responsible for covering all gas fees related to transactions executed within the Automator. E. How can I withdraw my funds after depositing into an Automator? Automators function like funds, featuring a redemption lock-up period to manage liquidity and strategy execution. Withdrawals can be initiated anytime but require waiting until the lock-up period ends, which can be up to 30 days, as set by the Optivisor during creation. F. What kinds of returns can I expect with an Automator? Automator returns are composed of three key components: Interest Funds deposited into the Automator are automatically staked in low-risk protocols like Aave or Curve, generating passive interest. These returns are updated in real-time and distributed to users based on their share when withdrawing. Trading PNL Returns generated from the Optivisor‚Äôs trading strategies These returns are reflected only after the trading strategy expires, allowing the Optivisor to claim the positions. Users receive their share upon withdrawal. $RCH incentive $RCH token airdrops earned through the Optivisor‚Äôs trading activities. Airdrops are distributed daily based on the current holders of the Automator and their respective ownership shares. Users can claim their $RCH tokens directly from the Claim $RCH page. G. What are the risks associated with using an Automator? Automators involve risks as the Optivisor manages user funds for options trading and low-risk protocols. The Optivisor decides the balance between using interest earnings or principal for trading, affecting the Automator's risk level. Each Automator has a buffer limit, which can range up to 99.9%, indicating the portion of funds reserved for lower-risk protocols. Users can view the specific buffer for each Automator to select one that aligns with their risk tolerance. SOFA doesn't guarantee risk-free trading, and principal loss is possible. Assess your risk tolerance carefully before participating. H. How is the $RCH airdrop generated and distributed to user's account? $RCH tokens are earned through the Optivisor's trading activities and can be claimed by users afterward, just like in other SOFA Vaults. You can check the $RCH airdrop info here: https://docs.sofa.org/en/tokenomics/
